src: I was recovering from a stroke.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepata mafuta.
ref: Nilikuwa nikipata nafuu kutokana na kiharusi.

src: Bob hated it because he was nothing like that character.
mt: Bob alikuwa na hasira kwa sababu alikuwa hakuna kama kichwa hicho.
ref: Bob aliichukia kwa sababu hakuwa kama mtu huyo.

src: Her kids insisted that she sit down to watch it with them.
mt: Wanao wakataja kwamba aangalie na wao.
ref: Watoto wake wakasisitiza kwamba akae chini watazame pamoja.

src: She realized it was the light bulb in her kitchen burning out.
mt: Alijua kwamba ni jiko lake la nyumbani linaloza.
ref: Akagundua ilikuwa ni balbu ya taa iliyokuwa ikiungua jikoni mwake.

src: But then she got an important phone call.
mt: Lakini baadaye alipata simu ya kujitolea.
ref: Lakini akapata simu muhimu.

src: He realizes that his coffee buying habit is very expensive.
mt: Anajua kwamba haba yake ya kupata kahawa ni kubwa sana.
ref: Akagundua kwamba tabia yake ya kununua kahawa ilikuwa inagharimu mno.

src: When she walked into the school she went looking for her.
mt: Alipokwenda shule alipokuwa anavyotembea alipaswa kufika.
ref: Alipoingia shuleni alienda kumtafuta msichana huyo.

src: During the race he felt frustrated when so many people passed him.
mt: Katika mashindano alikuwa na wasiwasi wakati wengi wengi walipita kama alivyopita.
ref: Wakati wa mbio hizo alihisi kufadhaika wakati watu wengi walimpita.

src: Her date picked her up and gave her a beautiful rose.
mt: Yeye alipata kwa mpenzi wake na kutoa mbingu ya kazi.
ref: Mpenziwe alimchukua na kumpa ua maridadi la waridi.

src: He rode into Scranton, Pennsylvania.
mt: Alipanda Scranton, Pennsylvania.
ref: Akaenda hadi Scranton, Pennsylvania.

src: He planned to wait to put on his gaudy nautical uniform.
mt: Alikuwa anatarajia kuwaacha kufanya kazi yake kama mwanamitaji kwa sasa.
ref: Alipanga kusubiri kuvaa sara zake za baharini.

src: I told her that my dog bites.
mt: Nilimwambia kwamba mbwa wangu anamnyanyasa.
ref: Nikamwambia kwamba mbwa wangu huuma.

src: He decides to try to draw a picture of a flower one day.
mt: Anamchukua hatua ya kujitafiti kujenga picha ya mwezi mmoja.
ref: Akaamua kujaribu kuchora picha ya ua siku moja.

src: He read a book in school on how to do this.
mt: Alielewa kwa kutumia kitabu chake katika shule.
ref: Alisoma kitabu shuleni kuhusu jinsi ya kufanya hivi.

src: Many of her favorite movies were in Japanese.
mt: Zaidi ya nusu ya filamu zake zilizovumilia zilikuwa za kijapani.
ref: Filamu zake nyingi anazozipenda zilikuwa kwa Kijapani.

src: He put on his jacket and went outside.
mt: Alivaa kanzu yake na kufika nje.
ref: Akavaa jaketi yake na kwenda nje.

src: As night approached he surveyed the work he'd done.
mt: Kama usiku ulipita alivyoangalia kazi yake iliyofanyika.
ref: Usiku ulipokaribia alichunguza kazi aliyokuwa ameifanya.

src: As I was passing an exit, I felt cold, hard steel on my arm.
mt: Kama nilivyopita kifurushi, nilipata chuma kimekataa kwa nguvu, kwa nguvu.
ref: Nilipokuwa nikipita njia ya kutoka, nikahisi chuma baridi, ngumu mkononi mwangu.

src: The blood ran down her foot and into her shoe.
mt: Damu ilipanda kichwa chake na kuingia katika kofia yake.

src: He was very smart but struggled with reading.
mt: Alikuwa na akili nyingi lakini alikuwa na shida na kusoma.

src: She decided to make a fruit salad for everyone.
mt: Aliamua kufanya salad ya matunda kwa wote.

src: She took it with her everywhere.
mt: Aliingiza na yeye kila mahali.

src: I was 22 and he was 38 years old.
mt: Nilikuwa na umri wa miaka 22 na alikuwa na umri wa miaka 38.

src: He studied the part carefully.
mt: Alieleza kwa makini.

src: She is envied throughout the class.
mt: Anajitambulisha katika kila kipindi.

src: She always wants it put on.

src: I absolutely loved it.

src: He would make mud pies every chance he got.

mt: Rob's marafiki walimpa yeye tiketi ya kibali kwa siku sita ya six flags.
ref: Marafiki wa Rob wakampa tikiti ya bila malipo ya six flags.

src: He promised to on Friday.
mt: Alimwambia atakapotoa kwa siku ya Jumatatu.

mt: Alitukana kwamba wote walikuwa wameviona siku yake ya kujifungua.

mt: Becky na Ashley walikuwa rafiki wao wakati wao wakijitukana.

mt: Jirani yao mwenye mawazo yasiyosikia mara nyingi alitupa mbwa wake nje kwa kuyumbika kwa siku nzima.

src: She took the bus to her new school.
mt: Alienda kwa basi kwenda shule yake mpya.
ref: Alitumia basi kwenda shule yake mpya.

src: She wanted the dentist to put her to sleep.
mt: Alitaka daktari wa dandora kuchimba.
ref: Alimtaka daktari wa meno kumfanya alale.

src: He worked every evening on assignments in order to improve it.
mt: Ali kazi kila jioni kwa kufanya kazi ili kuboresha.

src: That I don't have many hobbies or interests.
mt: Hivi sijawahi kuwa na mashabiki au mashaka.
ref: Kwamba sina mambo au vivutio vingine nivipendavyo.

src: But she could not afford anything fancy.
mt: Lakini alikuwa hana pesa kwa kujenga kitu kama vile.
ref: Lakini hangeweza kumudu kitu chochote kizuri.

mt: Mmoja wa siku alikuwa kwenye njia na akakuta nyumba ya miti.
ref: Siku moja alikuwa njiani na akapata nyumba ya mti.

mt: Tracey alikuwa na nia ya kufika kwa barabara za mawimbi kwa nyumba yake.
ref: Tracey akaamua kwenda kutembea msituni nyuma ya nyumba yake.

src: Unfortunately, he didn't have any money.
mt: Kwa hakika, alikuwa bila pesa.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, hakuwa na pesa zozote.

src: His wife would be there in an hour.
mt: Mke yake atakuwepo kwa masaa mawili.
ref: Mke wake atakuwa hapo ndani ya saa moja.

src: He worked really hard in school, was on the soccer team.
mt: Alifanya kazi kubwa katika shule, alikuwa katika timu ya mpira.
ref: Alifanya kazi kwa bidii sana shuleni, alikuwa kwenye timu ya soka.

src: Gina wanted one but didn't know where to buy one.
mt: Gina alitaka moja lakini hakujua wapi kupata.
ref: Gina alitaka moja lakini hakujua ni wapi atanunua moja.

src: One day, she left to go to the store.
mt: Jana, alikuwa anapita kwa kuuza.
ref: Siku moja, aliondoka kwenda dukani.

src: It was becoming worn out.
mt: Ilivyokuwa kimepotea.
ref: Kilikuwa kimeanza kuchakaa.

src: He realizes he hasn't prepared anything for guests to eat with cheese.
mt: Anasikitika kwamba hana yeyote kwa wageni kwa ajili ya chakula na nyama.
ref: Akagundua hakuwa ameandaa chochote kwa wageni wake kula na jibini.

src: One day she was very sick but still went to work.
mt: Moja siku alikuwa na ugonjwa kubwa lakini alikuwa anafanya kazi.
ref: Siku moja alikuwa mgonjwa sana lakini bado alienda kazini.

src: They had won every game and made it to the championship.
mt: Waliwahi kushinda kila mchezo na kufika katika mashindano.
ref: Walikuwa wameshinda kila mchezo na kufika katika mchuano.

src: One day the wind was strong, partly due to the height of the building.
mt: Jana mawingu ulikuwa mkali, kwa sababu ya kina cha uwanja.

src: She saved up for months to afford a good keyboard.
mt: Aliyafanya kazi kwa muda mrefu ili kupata kifaa cha kuchapisha.
ref: Aliweka akiba kwa miezi ili kumudu kibodi nzuri.

src: He applied for jobs in his field every day.
mt: Alifanya kufanya kazi katika sehemu yake kila siku.
ref: Akatuma maombi ya kazi katika nyanja yake kila siku.

src: Most of her time was spent in the library.
mt: Kwa kawaida alikuwa anapendelea kutumia chumba cha kutafuta habari.
ref: Muda wake mwingi ulikuwa katika maktaba.

src: She sat patiently in the car waiting to arrive.
mt: Aliwakililia chakula katika gari wakati wa kuwakiliana.
ref: Alikaa kwa uvumilivu ndani ya gari akisubiri kuwasili.

src: On the highway, Steve drove his car very fast.
mt: Kwenye barabara, Steve alikuwa anavyovamia gari lake kwa kasi.
ref: Njiani, Steve aliendesha gari lake kwa kasi mno.

src: She was so excited leading up to the party.
mt: Aliwa na furaha kubwa kabla ya kufanya kipindi hicho.
ref: Alisisimka sana kuwadia siku ya sherehe hiyo.

src: He was sad that he couldn't eat because he had no money.
mt: Alikuwa na hasira kwamba hakuwa na pesa, kwa hiyo hakutaka kula.
ref: Alikuwa na huzuni kwamba hakuweza kula kwa sababu hakuwa na pesa.

src: It was about six miles and I worked real hard.
mt: Nilikuwa kama saba mile na nilifanya kazi kubwa.
ref: Zilikuwa za takriban maili sita na nilifanya kazi kwa bidii sana.

src: He wound up his arm and threw roll-up airplane as hard as he could.
mt: Alifanya kifua chake na kutoa ndege ya kawaida kama kipindi chake kikichokaa.
ref: Akamaliza na kurusha ndege kwa nguvu kadri awezavyo.

src: Suddenly he sat bolt upright.
mt: Kabla hajakwama, akajifungua.
ref: Ghafla akasimama wima.

src: John loved Meg, and wanted to marry her.
mt: John alivunja Meg, na alikuwa na ahadi ya kuoa.
ref: John alimpenda Meg, na alitaka kumuoa.

src: Bobby tried throwing his shoe, but it got stuck.
mt: Bobby alijaribu kupiga kofia, lakini ilipata kama ilikuwa imepanga.
ref: Bobby akajaribu kurusha kiatu chake, lakini kikakwama.

src: She was finally able to eat food after 4 days.
mt: Aliweza kula chakula baada ya siku 4.
ref: Aliweza mwishowe kula chakula baada ya siku 4.

src: She loved them.
mt: Alimwita.
ref: Alizipenda.

src: Marcus hated the way the boat rose up and crashed down.
mt: Marcus alikuwa na hasira kwa njia ambavyo meli ilivuta na kufurudia.
ref: Marcus alichukia jinsi boti iliinuka na kwenda chini kwa kishindo.

src: She got comfortable in her chair and closed her eyes.
mt: Alijifungua kwenye kiti chake na kufunga macho yake.

src: He goes there all the time with friends.
mt: Anapokwenda huko kila wakati na wenzake.

src: While at the cafe, he usually read a book.
mt: Alipokuwa katika kanda, alielewa kitabu.

src: His driver's license was in the wallet.
mt: Kitambulisho cha kifurushi cha kijani kilikuwa katika kitambulisho cha kifurushi.
ref: Leseni yake ya dereva ilikuwa ndani ya pochi.

src: He was not just outside of the escape room adventure.
mt: Alisimama kwa kawaida kwenye mchezo wa kupata nafasi ya kupata nafasi.
ref: Hakuwa tu nje ya vituko vya chumba cha mafumbo.

src: But it had to be done.
mt: Lakini ilipaswa kufanyika.
ref: Lakini lazima kingesafishwa.

src: The school roof buckled under the weight.
mt: Kanisa la shule lilipungua kwa uwezo.
ref: Paa la shule likaanguka kwa sababu ya uzani.

src: To my surprise my friends planned a party for me.
mt: Kwa habari yangu wenzangu walikuwa wamepanga kipindi kwa mimi.

src: I retrieved it from the trash.
mt: Nilimwambia kutoka kwa mafuta.

src: We took a ferry from Rowes Wharf in Boston.
mt: Kwa sasa tunatoka kwa feri kutoka Rowes Wharf Boston.

src: I used to think it was real when I was young.
mt: Nilikuwa ninaamini kwamba ni halisi wakati nilikuwa mdogo.

src: She passed people with children and animals.
mt: Aliwafikia watu na watoto na wanyama.

src: One cat didn't mind the new dog, but the other cat was scared.
mt: Kisu kimoja hakikumbukia kuuza kwenye mbwa mpya, lakini kisu lingine lilikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Paka mmoja hakujali kuhusu mbwa mgeni, lakini paka yule mwingine aliogopa.

src: I can't usually see them because it's an African antelope.
mt: Sijui kwa kiasi gani kwa sababu ni kinyonga cha Afrika.
ref: Kwa kawaida siwaona kwa sababu ni paa wa Afrika.

src: I finally decided that it is her own responsibility.
mt: Nilikubali kwa mwisho kwamba ni wajibu wake.

mt: Alimudu nyingi na wanao.

src: She could not figure out what it was.
mt: Alitafuta kwanini.
ref: Hakuweza kujua kilikuwa nini.

src: He decides to visit his dentist to see what is the matter.
mt: Anamchukua hatua ya kufika kwa daktari wa panya ili kujua nini kinaendelea.

src: She had a dishwasher for the first time.
mt: Aliwa na mafuta ya majini kwa mara ya kwanza.

src: The came running in for their food.
mt: Waliingia kwa kasi wao kwa chakula chao.

mt: Alikuwa na shida ya kufungua kambani yake kwa mkia ulioanguka.

src: Her boss tells her that she needs to sell a car soon.
mt: Mwanaume wake anasema kwamba lazima anapimishe gari yake.
ref: Bosi wake akamwambia kwamba anahitaji kuuza gari hivi karibuni.

src: The two cats hated each other.
mt: Kaka na kaka wana hata kwa wenzao.
ref: Paka hao wawili walichukiana.

src: His was old and cracked.
mt: Yake ilikuwa ya kike na kimechafuka.
ref: Yake ilikuwa ni nzee na imepasuka.

src: He ordered a few tickets.
mt: Alimfurahisha kifurahisi.
ref: Akaagiza tikiti chache.

src: 12 men brought a casket.
mt: 12 wanaume wakati wa kufungua kifuniko.
ref: Wanaume 12 walileta jeneza.

src: He dominated the first four rounds.
mt: Alidominishe kipindi cha kwanza cha mabao.
ref: Aliongoza katika raundi nne za kwanza.

src: He picked up a bag of potato chips from his bedroom floor.
mt: Alipiga kichwa chake kwa kitu cha chakula cha nyanya.
ref: Alichukua pakiti ya chipsi za viazi kutoka kwenye ghorofa ya chumba chake cha kulala.

src: Father and son teams designed small matchbox cars.
mt: Wanaume na wanao wanaendesha gari ndogo za mabao.
ref: Timu za baba na watoto wa kiume ziliunda magari madogo ya viberiti.

src: Unfortunately he did not make the team.
mt: Kwa hakika alikuwa hakitakuwa katika timu.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, hakutoboa kujiunga na timu.

src: She looked back and saw a wall of snow coming towards her.
mt: Aliangalia nyuma na kuona kifaru cha barafu kilichokwenda kama kifaru.
ref: Aliangalia nyuma na kuona ukuta wa theluji ukija upande wake.

src: He waited in line at the box office on opening day.
mt: Alimwamini barabara kwa kutumia kadi ya kibali siku ya kwanza.
ref: Alisubiri kwenye foleni ya sinema siku ya kufunguliwa.

src: He was nervous about being around so many strangers.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu kuwa karibu na wengi wengi wanao jificha.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu kuzungukwa na watu wengi wageni.

src: One morning Ellen did not hear her baby fussing, so she went to check.
mt: Juma moja Ellen hakutambua kuwa mtoto wake anafanya kuchimba, kwa hiyo alipata kujua.
ref: Asubuhi moja Ellen hakumsikia mtoto wake akihangaika, kwa hivyo akaenda kuangalia.

src: She prized a jazz CD with two dolphins photoshopped together.
mt: Aliwaheshimu CD ya jazz na picha mbili za wanyama wadogo waliotengenezwa kwa kompyuta.
ref: Alithamini CD ya jazi iliyo na pomboo wawili waliowekwa pamoja kupitia programu ya kompyuta.

src: The tide drew out, and she saw a tide pool.
mt: Kutokana na kipindi cha kuziba, aliona kifua cha maji.
ref: Wimbi liliondoka, na akaona kidimbwi cha maji chenye viumbe wengi wa baharini.

src: It would ruin her hair and nails and there was no tv.
mt: Ingevunja nywele na mabavu yake na hakuna televisheni.
ref: Itaharibu nywele na kucha zake na hakukuwa na tv.

src: Then she realized she was lost!
mt: Baadaye alijua kwamba alikuwa amekwama!
ref: Kisha akagundua alikuwa amepotea!

src: His team was playing in the championship game tonight.
mt: Kikundi chake kinacheza katika mechi ya kufuzu leo.
ref: Timu yake ilikuwa ikicheza katika mchuano usiku huo.

src: He thought back on all the restaurants he's recently visited.
mt: Alielewa kwa kila restoranti alivyoangalia.
ref: Akafikiria kuhusu mikahawa yote aliyokuwa ametembelea hivi karibuni.

src: One day he was at a picnic.
mt: Yule siku alikuwa katika kikao.
ref: Siku moja alikuwa kwenye mandari.

src: He gave one to his son, Christian.
mt: Alimpa mmoja kwa binti yake, Christian.
ref: Akampa moja mtoto wake wa kiume, Christian.

src: He whined to his parents that it just wasn't Christmas without it.
mt: Alimwambia wazazi wake kwamba sio kama kwa kila kipindi cha Krismasi bila yake.
ref: Aliwalalamikia wazazi wake kwamba Krisimasi sio Krisimasi bila theluji.

src: Now that his children are grown up, he has more spare time.
mt: Sasa kwake watoto wamejaa, anapata zaidi wakati wa kujitahidi.
ref: Kwa kuwa sasa watoto wake wamekua wakubwa, ana muda zaidi wa ziada.

src: Benson began losing sleep about it.
mt: Benson alianza kupata shida za kuangalia.
ref: Benson akaanza kupoteza usingizi kuihusu.

src: We dug for several minutes trying to make room.
mt: Tulitafuta kwa dakika kadhaa kujitolea ili kutoa nafasi.
ref: Tulichimba kwa dakika kadhaa tukijaribu kupata nafasi.

src: Sam was missing Karen, but he had a plan to fix that.
mt: Sam alikuwa akilalamikia Karen, lakini alikuwa na mpango wa kufanya hivyo.
ref: Sam alikuwa anamkosa Karen, lakini alikuwa na mpango wa kuitatua.

src: He wanted to start a fire to roast marshmallows.
mt: Alitaka kuanza moto ili kuzikia mababu.
ref: Alitaka kuanzisha moyo wa kuchoma mashimelo.

src: She washes toilets and scrubs floors.
mt: Anatunza maji na kuchimba majengo.
ref: Yeye huosha vyoo na kusugua sakafu.

src: Jason decides that he wants to learn Hindi before the wedding.
mt: Jason anataka kujifunza Hindi kabla ya siku ya ndoa.
ref: Jason akaamua kwamba anataka kujifunza Kihindi kabla ya harusi.

src: Todd got irritated with Ashley.
mt: Todd alikuwa na hasira na Ashley.
ref: Todd alikasirishwa na Ashley.

src: We got all dressed up for the exciting event.
mt: Tulipanga kwa kila kitu kwa ajili ya kufurahia kile kilichopendeleka.
ref: Sote tukavaa kwa ajili ya hafla hiyo inayosisimua.

src: The girls decided to bake some cookies.
mt: Wajawabu wakawaomba kufanya cookies.
ref: Wasichana wakaamua kuoka biskuti kadhaa.

src: Sometimes they say things they do not mean.
mt: Marahisi wengine wanakwenda kusema vitu ambavyo hawakwenda kusema.
ref: Wakati mwingine wanasema mambo ambayo hawayamaanishi.

src: The snow was coming down very hard for many hours.
mt: Barafu ilikuwa ikipanda kwa kasi kubwa kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Theluji ilikuwa ikimwagika sana kwa saa nyingi.

src: Larry was feeling really energetic from his coffee earlier.
mt: Larry alikuwa akichangamka sana kutokana na kahawa yake iliyopita.
ref: Larry alikuwa akihisi ana nguvu sana kwa sababu ya kahawa aliyoikunywa mapema.

src: But the whole day went by and no one gave her any gifts.
mt: Lakini siku nzima ilipita na hakuna mtu aliyemshukuru.
ref: Lakini siku nzima ilipita na hakuna yeyote aliyempa zawadi zozote.

src: I decided to look around for a new one so I would be happy.
mt: Nilichagua kufika kwenye kifaa cha kawaida ili nikuwe na furaha.
ref: Nikaamua kutafuta kazi nyingine ili niwe na furaha.

src: The shoes were very expensive.
mt: Kipande cha kizungu kiliwa na ghala sana.
ref: Viatu hivyo vilikuwa ghali mno.

src: She couldn't imagine going without clean water for a week!
mt: Alitakiwa kujua kama atakapokuwa bila maji ya kuchemsha kwa wiki moja!
ref: Hangeweza kufikiria kukaa bila maji masafi kwa wiki!

src: She had never played before and was nervous.
mt: Aliyekuwa na kushindana kwa mara ya kwanza alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Hakuwa amewahi kuucheza awali na alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: She caught three buses.
mt: Aliambiwa kwa mabasi matatu.
ref: Alipanda mabasi matatu.

src: Her mother took her to the bag department.
mt: Mama yake alimwaga kwenye duka la kifaa.
ref: Mama yake alimpeleka kwenye idara ya mifuko.

src: He kept it by his bed.
mt: Alivyokataa kwa kawaida, alikuwa anavyoangalia.
ref: Aliuweka kando ya kitanda chache.

src: For the last two seasons he has been injured.
mt: Kwa muda wa miaka miwili yalipita alikuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: Kwa misimu miwili iliyopita amekuwa ameumia.

src: She immediately read through the task.
mt: Aliwahi kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika.
ref: Mara moja akasoma kazi hizo.

src: He does not intend on buying anything, but just wants to walk around.
mt: Anawaza kuwa hata hivyo, lakini anataka kufika kwa kujaribu.
ref: Hakuwa na nia ya kununua kitu chochote, lakini kutembea tu.

src: She had wasted the whole day and only had one left to complete it.
mt: Aliwakuta alikuwa ameipoteza siku nzima na kuendelea na moja tu ili kufikia.
ref: Alikuwa amepoteza siku nzima na alikuwa amesalia na siku moja kuikamilisha.

src: We have been too busy the last couple of Tuesdays.
mt: Kwetu tulikuwa tayari kwa wiki kadhaa.
ref: Tumekuwa na shughuli nyingi sana Jumanne kadhaa zilizopita.

src: Bob decided to go for a walk at the park.
mt: Bob aliamua kufika kwa baruti katika mazingira.
ref: Bob akaamua kwenda kutembea kwenye bustani.

src: Tickets went on sale online and the server was very busy.
mt: Kitambulisho kilikuwa kimepatikana kwa kushirikiana na mtandao na mtaji wa kawaida.
ref: Tikiti zilianza kuuzwa mtandaoni na seva ikawa na shughuli nyingi sana.

src: His mom helped him pack all his stuff, and he drove away.
mt: Mama yake alimshirikisha vyombo vyake vyote, na alimwacha akimwaga.
ref: Mama yake alimsaidia kufunganya vitu vyake vyote, na akaenda.

src: Despite her very full iPod, she became bored with music.
mt: Alipokuwa na iPod yake kama kawaida, alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu muziki.
ref: Licha ya iPod yake iliyokuwa imejaa sana, aliboeka na muziki.

src: Ari tentatively agreed.
mt: Ari alikubali kwa kujitahidi.
ref: Ari akakubali pendekezo hilo.

src: One of his headlights was out and he thought it was safer.
mt: Moja ya mabakuli yake yalikuwa yamekata na alielewa kuwa ni salama zaidi.
ref: Moja ya taa zake za gari ilikuwa imechomeka na alidhania itakuwa salama zaidi.

src: It was all in fun, and they played for an hour.
mt: Kila kitu kimefanyika kwa ajili ya mazuri, na wao walicheza kwa masaa mawili.
ref: Walifurahia sana, na walicheza kwa saa moja.

src: She saw a commercial advertising a car that would be great for a trip.
mt: Aliona mbelezi uliowakilisha gari ambalo itakuwa nzuri kwa safari.
ref: Akaona tangazo la biashara la gari ambalo linaweza kuwa nzuri kwa safari.

src: He was enthralled with the cities and countryside.
mt: Alimwona miji na mazingira ya nchi.
ref: Alivutiwa na miji na mashambani.

src: While he wanted a girlfriend he did not know how to approach anyone.
mt: Alitaka mpenzi lakini hakujua jinsi ya kuwafikia yeyote.
ref: Ijapokuwa alitaka mpenzi hakujua jinsi ya kumtongoza mtu yeyote.

src: She hurried through airport security.
mt: Alihakikisha kwa haraka kupita usafirishaji wa uwanja wa ndege.
ref: Akaharakisha kupitia kwa maafisa wa usalama kwenye uwanja wa ndege.

src: She dozed off in the warm sun.
mt: Aliwachana kwa muda kwenye jua la moto.
ref: Akalala kidogo kwenye jua lenye joto.

src: The Army said he was too weak to join.
mt: Jeshi lilitoa kauli kwamba alikuwa mdogo sana kwa uwezo wa kujiunga.
ref: Jeshi likasema alikuwa mdhaifu sana kujiunga.

src: Running in fear, the rodent moved as fast as it could.
mt: Kwa kujitolea, kinyonga kimeendelea kama kawaida.
ref: Akikimbia kwa hofu, panya huyo alikimbia kwa haraka kadri awezavyo.

src: There, he visited tourist sites and saw friendly locals.
mt: Alipokuwa huko, alitembelea mahali pa ziada na kuona wakazi wadogo.
ref: Hapo, alitembelea vituo vya wataliii na kuona wenyeji wazuri.

src: She enjoys this as a hobby.
mt: Anapenda hivyo kama shughuli ya kujifunza.
ref: Hufurahia hii kama jambo la kujifurahisha.

src: They decided to watch music videos.
mt: Wakapata kujadiliana kuhusu video za muziki.
ref: Wakaamua kutazama video za muziki.

src: I made sure to pack everything up in my car.
mt: Nilimchukua kila kitu katika gari yangu.
ref: Nilihakikisha kufunganya kila kitu ndani ya gari langu.

src: He thinks all of them are creepy.
mt: Anasema yote yao ni mabwera.
ref: Anafikiria wote wanatisha.

src: Leah searches craigslist and finds an entry level position.
mt: Leah anasoma craigslist na kufika nafasi ya kwanza.
ref: Leah akatafuta kwenye craiglist na akapata nafasi ya kazi ya kuanza.

src: I had to get gifts for my cousins.
mt: Nilizidi kupata zawadi kwa jamaa zangu.
ref: Lazima ningenunua zawadi kwa ajili ya binamu yangu.

src: He refused to stop at hotels for a break.
mt: Alitofautisha kufika katika hoteli kwa ajili ya kupumzika.
ref: akakataa kusimama mahotelini ili kupumzika.

src: I drove to Chicago.
mt: Nilikuja Chicago.
ref: Niliendesha gari hadi Chicago.

src: She panicked and didn't know what to do.
mt: Aliwaza na hakuwajua nini kufanya.
ref: Akashtuka na hakujua cha kufanya.

src: And Jeff's room was very hot.
mt: Na jifunzi yake ilikuwa kama moto.
ref: Na chumba cha Jeff kilikuwa na joto sana.

src: He teased Joey and said it was his glass eye.
mt: Alimkataa Joey na kusema kwamba ni macho yake ya kubwa.
ref: Akamtania Joey na kusema ilikuwa ni jicho lake la glasi.

src: Rushing towards the door, the students stopped when gunshots rang out.
mt: Wakivuka kwa haraka, waliwakamata wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati mawingu wakati maw
ref: Wakikimbia kuelekea kwa mlango, wanafunzi walisimama waliposikia milio ya risasi.

src: It stopped working completely.
mt: Ilivamiwa kabisa.
ref: Iliacha kufanya kazi kabisa.

src: Right now I can only bike about twenty miles at once.
mt: Leo sasa nina uwezo wa kubike kama 20 mila kwa mara moja.
ref: Sasa hivi ninaweza kuendesha baisikeli karibu maili ishirini kwa wakati mmoja tu.

src: The summer I was 19 was the last time I camped.
mt: Kwenda kwa muda wa majira ya baridi nilikuwa na umri wa miaka 19, ilikuwa wakati mwisho niliokuwa nimepanda.
ref: Mara yangu ya mwisho kupiga kambi ilikuwa wakati wa majira ya joto nikiwa na umri wa miaka 19.

src: By the time I left the classroom, I had forgotten about it.
mt: Kabla ya kujifungua kwa vyuo, nilikuwa nimepoteza kuhusu hicho.
ref: Kufikia wakati wa kutoka darasani, nilikuwa nimesahau.

src: She stays late to make sure her work is correct.
mt: Anakuwa akifika mapema ili kuweka kazi yake sahihi.
ref: Huchelewa kuhakikisha kuwa kazi yake ni sahihi.

src: We checked out a book on the subject and read up.
mt: Kwa kujitahidi tulipata kitabu juu ya masuala na kujifunza.
ref: Tuliangalia kitabu kuhusu mada hiyo na tukasoma.

src: His father was very upset with him.
mt: Baba yake alikuwa na hasira naye.
ref: Baba yake alikuwa amekasirikia sana na yeye.

src: She hid under the table and cried.
mt: Aliyemkamata chini ya meza na kulaani.
ref: Alijificha chini ya meza na akalia.

src: We wanted to play a new game.
mt: Tulitaka kucheza mchezo mpya.
ref: Tulitaka kucheza mchezo mpya.

src: I went to the store to buy a new one.
mt: Nilikuja kwa duka kupata kidude mpya.
ref: Nilienda dukani kunua mpya.

src: She noticed that she forgot her textbook at home.
mt: Alijua kwamba alikuwa ameacha kitabu chake cha masomo nyumbani.
ref: Aligundua kuwa alisahau kitabu chake cha kiada nyumbani.

src: I skied directly in the path of another skier.
mt: Nilisafiri kwa kipindi cha muda kwa skier mwingine.
ref: Niliteleza moja kwa moja katika njia ya mtelezaji mwingine.

src: But he didn't have a lot of money.
mt: Lakini hakuna pesa nyingi.
ref: Lakini hakuwa na pesa nyingi.

src: They bugged him until he went camping anyway.
mt: Wakakaa nae mpaka akapata kufika kwenye kampeni.
ref: Walimsumbua hadi akaenda kupiga kambi tu.

src: He searched the classified ads for job postings.
mt: Alisoma gazeti la kufanyia kazi kwa ajili ya kufanya maombi ya kazi.
ref: Alitafuta matangazo yaliyobandikwa kwenye nafasi kwa matangazo ya kazi.

src: He took lessons and worked hard learning how to cook.
mt: Alifundishwa na kufanya kazi kwa kujifunza kuhariri.
ref: Alisoma masomo na alijitahidi kujifunza kupika.

src: But she had forgotten to bring forks!
mt: Lakini alikuwa ameacha kufikiria kufikia kisima!
ref: Lakini alikuwa amesahau kubeba uma!

src: Before she got dressed, she checked to see if school was canceled.
mt: Kabla ya kufikia kufanya kazi, alivyoangalia kama shule ilikuwa imefungwa.
ref: Kabla ya kuvaa, aliangalia ikiwa shule ilibatilishwa.

src: The nail technician cleaned and trimmed her nails.
mt: Teknijia ya kipigano alivuta na kubadilisha kipigano chake.
ref: Mtunzaji wa mikono na kucha alisafisha na kukata kucha zake.

src: Faking a brave face, the went forth into the darkened house.
mt: Kwa mwelekeo wa kuwakuta, wakapita ndani ya nyumba yao iliyopinduliwa.
ref: Akijifanya kuwaa na uso wa jasiri, alienda kwa nyumba yenye giza.

src: He took wrestling in high school.
mt: Alifanya mchezo wa mabaji katika shule ya juu.
ref: Alisoma kupigana mwereka katika shule ya upili.

src: But the food was bad and the waiter was even worse!
mt: Lakini chakula kipo vibaya na mwenyezi mwenyezi ni zaidi vibaya!
ref: Lakini chakula kilikuwa kibaya na mhudumu alikuwa mbaya zaidi!

src: Her parents were very against the idea of tattoos.
mt: Wazazi wake walikuwa wakivyoridhisha kwa ufupisho wa kifupisho.
ref: Wazazi wake walikuwa hawakubaliani na wazo la tatoo.

src: She decided she must perform an experiment.
mt: Aliamua atafanya kipimo.
ref: Aliamua ni lazima afanye jaribio.

src: Jaclyn and Rob do not get along.
mt: Jaclyn na Rob hawakubali kwa pamoja.
ref: Jaclyn na Rob hawakupatana.

src: They were going to have dinner guests and were baking a cake.
mt: Walikuwa watawakilisha wenyewe na wakati huo wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha jioni na wakikaa kwa ajili
ref: Walikuwa wanakaribisha wageni wa chakula cha jioni na walikuwa wakioka keki.

src: He found god and changed his wicked ways.
mt: Alipotambua Mungu na kubadilisha njama zake za uovu.
ref: Alipata mungu na akabadilisha njia zake mbaya.

src: She had fun at first.
mt: Aliwahi kutafuta.
ref: Alifurahi mwanzoni.

src: But her new job meant she had less time to make food.
mt: Lakini kazi yake mpya ilisababisha kuwa na wakati kidogo zaidi kwa kutengeneza chakula.
ref: Lakini kazi yake mpya ilimfanya awe na wakati mdogo wa kupika chakula.

src: He would always get recognition for his talent.
mt: Anajulikana kwa uwezo wake.
ref: Kila wakati alitambuliwa kwa ajili ya talanta yake.

src: Susan used her cell phone in the theater to check her e-mail.
mt: Susan alitumia simu yake ya kawaida katika kinamama ili kuchunguza barua yake.
ref: Susan alitumia simu yake ya mkononi kwenye jumba la sinema kuangalia barua pepe yake.

src: It never bloomed.
mt: Hakikubadilika.
ref: Haikuwahi kupevuka.

src: Now the sun was setting.
mt: Sasa jua lilipokwenda.
ref: Sasa jua lilikuwa linatua.

src: Tonight was his very first basketball game.
mt: Leo ni kwanza kama mchezo wa mpira wa kike.
ref: Usiku wa leo ulikuwa mchezo wake wa kwanza wa mpira wa kikapu.

src: Spring was quickly approaching and he wanted to start planting.
mt: Kutokana na kwamba mwezi wa machakato alikuja kwa kasi, alitaka kuanza kuchimba.
ref: Majira ya kuchipua yalikuwa yanakaribia haraka na alitaka kuanza kupanda.

src: Her boyfriend had been acting weird all through dinner.
mt: Rafiki yake alikuwa akifanya mambo mengi mengi kwa muda wote wa chakula.
ref: Mpenzi wake alikuwa akitenda mambo ya ajabu wakati wote wa chakula cha jioni.

src: His friends tried to cheer him up by taking him out.
mt: Wamkumbukumbu wakamkumbuka kwa kuwaingiza naye.
ref: Marafiki wake walijaribu kumfurahisha kwa kumtoa nje.

src: She had woke up the other morning extremely fussy.
mt: Aliwakuta jana mchana kama alivyokuwa na shida.
ref: Alikuwa ameamka asubuhi nyingine akiwa msumbufu sana.

src: She booked her flight and hotel.
mt: Aliwakilisha ndege na hoteli.
ref: Aliweka nafasi ya ndege na hoteli.

src: Each year we left cookies and milk for him on Christmas Eve.
mt: Kila mwaka tulitupa kwa kipande na maziwa kwa yeye katika usiku wa Krismasi.
ref: Kila mwaka tulimwachia biskuti na maziwa usiku wa kuamkia Krismasi.

src: Unfortunately, she also woke up very late.
mt: Kwa hakika, alipona pia kwa wingi.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, aliamka akiwa amechelewa sana.

src: Their IT department did a lot of research to find the best equipment.
mt: Jopo la IT yao ilifanya mengi ya utafiti ili kupata kifaa bora.
ref: Idara yao ya IT ilifanya utafiti mwingi wa kupata vifaa bora.

src: We were playing our division rivals.
mt: Tulikuwa tukicheza na wapinzani wetu katika kundi.
ref: Tulikuwa tukicheza wapinzani wetu wa divisheni.

src: He has to cut this one kid because he is not good enough.
mt: Anafanya hivyo kwa mtoto huyo kwa sababu anajitahidi kwa kiasi cha chini.
ref: Lazima aondoe mtoto huyu mmoja kwa sababu hafai.

src: He told several people to leave but they didn't.
mt: Alimwambia watu kadhaa kuondoka lakini wao hawakufika.
ref: Aliwaambia watu kadhaa waondoke lakini hawakuondoka.

src: I decided to try and get it cut that afternoon.

ref: Niliamua kujaribu kuzikata alasiri hiyo.

src: I took a path that led to a riding track.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechukua njia ambayo ilisababisha kufika kwenye barabara ya kuharibu.
ref: Nilichukua njia ambayo ilinipeleka kwa njia ya kuendesha.

src: He missed his train to work and instead went to the park.
mt: Alisahau ndege yake ya kazi na kufika katika parki.
ref: Alikosa treni yake ya kwenda kazini na badala yake akaenda kwenye bustani.

src: He saw a sign for a rest stop two miles away.
mt: Aliona nafasi ya kupumzika miaka mitatu mbali.
ref: Aliona ishara ya kusimama kupumzika maili mbili mbali.

src: To help him, his mother put out an exciting toy that jingled.
mt: Kwa ajili yake, mama yake alitupa duka la kujenga ambalo lilijinga.
ref: Ili kumsaidia, mama yake aliweka vifaa vya kucheza vinavyofurahisha vinavyotoa mlio.

mt: Nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nilikuwa na dogo, nil
ref: Sikuwa na uhakika wa kununua nini, tayari nilikuwa na mbwa.

src: So he joined a singing class at his college.
mt: Kwa hiyo alijiunga na kikundi cha wimbi wa chuo chake.
ref: Kwa hivyo alijiunga na darasa la kuimba katika chuo chake.

src: He always had a big crush on his neighbor Lexy, but was scared.
mt: Aliwa na kipaji mkubwa kwa jirani yake Lexy, lakini alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Daima alikuwa akitamani sana jirani yake Lexy, lakini alikuwa na woga.

src: She wanted to pass it.
mt: Alitaka kufika.
ref: Alitaka kupita.

src: Then he remembered he had won a free pizza last week!
mt: Baadaye alikumbuka kwamba alikwisha kushinda pizza ya bure wiki iliyopita!
ref: Ndipo akakumbuka alishinda pizza ya bila malipo wiki iliyopita!

src: He got ready and drove to the meeting place.
mt: Alifanya kazi na kuingia kwenye gari na kufika katika mahali pa kujadili.
ref: Akajiandaa na akaendesha gari kuelekea mahali pa mkutano.

src: We drank coffee.
mt: Tulipika kahawa.
ref: Tulikunywa kahawa.

src: She wanted a new cell phone but she didn't have enough money.
mt: Alitaka simu mpya lakini alikuwa hakina fedha kwa wingi.
ref: Alitaka simu mpya lakini hakuwa na fedha za kutosha.

src: I decided to take my bicycle to the store instead of walking.
mt: Nilichagua kuchukua basi yangu kwa kuzingatia duka kuliko kufika.
ref: Niliamua kuendesha baiskeli yangu kwenda dukani badala ya kutembea.

src: After 9 hours of driving the were on their grandmother's block.
mt: Baada ya masaa 9 ya kusafiria wakati wao wakae kwenye kijiji cha bibi yao.
ref: Baada ya saa 9 ya kuendesha gari, walifika kwenye bloku ya bibi yao.

src: Finally she could avoid it no longer.
mt: Kwa sasa alikuwa hatarudi tena.
ref: Mwishowe hakuweza kuiepuka tena.

src: He saw a pair of headphones that he wanted but couldn't afford.
mt: Aliona mifuko ya kupiga kwa kundi ambayo alitaka lakini hakulazimika.
ref: Aliona jozi ya vipokea sauti vya masikioni ambavyo alitaka lakini hakuwa na uwezo.

src: I haven't opened it yet.
mt: Sijawasilisha hata sasa.
ref: Bado sijafungua.

src: Since he rarely has visitors, he doesn't see the point to cleaning.
mt: Kwa sababu anapendelea kushikilia kwa kawaida, hana sababu ya kuendesha.
ref: Kwa sababu hukaribisha wageni mara chache, haoni sababu ya kusafisha.

src: Since the exam is tough, I decided to study all night.
mt: Kwa sababu kesi ni ngumu, nilisikia kusoma kwa usiku.
ref: Kwa kuwa mtihani ni mgumu, niliamua kusoma usiku kucha.

src: We wanted a group photograph.
mt: Tulitaka picha ya kundi.
ref: Tulitaka kupiga picha ya kikundi.

src: Everything was dirty and on the floor.
mt: Kila kitu kilikuwa chafu na kwenye kichwa.
ref: Kila kitu kilikuwa chafu na juu ya sakafu.

src: When evening came, he was tired.
mt: Japo jioni ilipita, alikuwa na uwezo mdogo.
ref: Ilipofika jioni, alikuwa amechoka.

src: They did not know if they had reached the right spot.
mt: Wakakataa kujua kama walikuwa wamefikia mahali pa kawaida.
ref: Hawakujua ikiwa walikuwa wamefika eneo linalofaa.

src: He has not studied at all.
mt: Yeye hajafundishwi kwa kiasi chochote.
ref: Hajasoma chochote.

src: She was tired of spending time alone.
mt: Aliwaingiza kwa kujitupa kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Alikuwa amechoka kukaa peke yake.

src: We decided to ride to work together.
mt: Kwa sababu tulijadili, tukapata kuwa tutakaa pamoja katika gari.
ref: Tuliamua kwenda kazini pamoja.

src: However, people harassed her when they fought out her gender.
mt: Lakini watu wakamwambia kwa kujitetea kama kawaida.
ref: Hata hivyo watu walimnyanyasa wakati walipambana na jinsia yake.

src: His friend Sam invited him to go with his family.
mt: Kaka yake Sam alimwita kuenda na familia yake.
ref: Rafiki yake Sam alimwalika kwenda na familia yake.

src: A new song came on that I liked.
mt: Wimbo mpya ulikuja ambao nilipenda.
ref: Wimbo mpya ulichezwa ambao nilipenda.

src: They dressed alike, talked alike and were together 24/7.
mt: Wao waliwakiliana, waliwakiliana na kuwa pamoja 24/7.
ref: Walivaa zinazofanana, walizungumza sawa na walikuwa pamoja 24/7.

src: All three of them when I was a teenager.
mt: Wote wawili wakati nilikuwa na umri wa kijana.
ref: Zote tatu ni wakati nilikuwa kijana.

src: Although he doesn't have much money, he starts saving a little.
mt: Alipokuwa hakuna pesa nyingi, alianza kupata nyingi.
ref: Ingawa hana pesa za kutosha, anaanza kuweka akiba kidogo.

src: She was told she needed braces again.
mt: Alitupwa kuwa anahitaji kifua tena.
ref: Aliambiwa anahitaji vifaa vya kubana meno tena.

src: Her uncle owned a farm there.
mt: Jumbe alikuwa na shamba huko.
ref: Mjomba wake alimiliki na shamba huko.

src: One day his supervisor calls a meeting for the entire department.
mt: Juma moja mkuu wake anatoa mkutano kwa wote wakati wa kazi.
ref: Siku moja msimamizi wake akaitisha mkutano wa idara nzima.

src: She called her dad.
mt: Aliwataja baba yake.
ref: Alimpigia simu baba yake.

src: One night he fell asleep while watching television.
mt: Jumamosi alipata nishati wakati wa kusikiliza televisheni.
ref: Usiku mmoja alilala akitazama runinga.

src: He went to the polling place near his home.
mt: Alifika katika kituo cha kuchagiza karibu na nyumbani.
ref: Alienda mahali pa kupigia kura karibu na nyumbani kwake.

src: He pulled over and saw that his tire was flat!
mt: Alipiga barabara na kuona kwamba kizani chake kimepuluka!
ref: Alisimama na akaona kuwa tairi lake lilikuwa limepasuka!

src: She decided to look for a new apartment.
mt: Aliamua kufika katika nyumba mpya.
ref: Aliamua kutafuta nyumba mpya.

src: There was only one slice left.
mt: Kuna kile kimoja cha kifungua kipande.
ref: Kulikuwa na kipande kimoja tu kilichobaki.

src: Cathy and her family visited the pet store on adoption day.
mt: Cathy na familia yake walivisitisha duka la wanyama kwa siku ya ufunguzi.
ref: Cathy na familia yake walitembelea duka la wanyama siku ya ulezi.

src: One day Monica was invited to a birthday.
mt: Jumamosi Monica alipewa kipindi cha kila mwaka.
ref: Siku moja Monica alialikwa kwa siku ya kuzaliwa.

src: He pushed on it and it opened.
mt: Alimwagika na kufunguka.
ref: Aliusukuma na ukafunguka.

src: She finds out that their parents don't get along.
mt: Anajua kwamba wazazi wao hawakubali.
ref: Akagundua kwamba wazazi wao hawakuwa wakisikilizana.

src: I waited in line for hours to get to see him.
mt: Nilimwaga kwa saa nyingi ili nipee nafasi ya kuona yeye.
ref: Nilisubiri kwenye foleni kwa saa kadhaa ili kuweza kumuona.

src: They got there early and had really good seats.
mt: Walikuwa wamefika mapema na walikuwa na makao mazuri sana.
ref: Walifika hapo mapema na wakapata viti vizuri sana.

src: I looked for something cheap to do.
mt: Nilimchagua kufanya kitu kipya cha kujenga.
ref: Nikatafuta kitu cha bei nafuu cha kufanya.

src: Instead of turning it in, she skipped class.
mt: Kwa muda huu, alikuwa anapiga kura.
ref: Badala ya kuiwasilisha, akakosa darasa hilo.

src: He had a plan to surprise his wife with a new piece.
mt: Ala plan ya kuwahudumia mke wake na kipande cha kawaida.
ref: Alikuwa na mpango wa kumshutukiza mke wake na bidhaa mpya.

src: But my girlfriend's dad broke a mirror yesterday.
mt: Lakini baba wa mkewe alitupa mabatilifu jana.
ref: Lakini baba ya mpenzi wangu alivunja kioo jana.

src: He worked so late, he often missed his kids when he came home.
mt: Ali kazi kwa muda mrefu, kwa hivyo mara nyingi alikuwa anapoteza wakulima wao wakati wa kuja nyumbani.
ref: Alifanya kazi kwa kuchelewa sana, hata alikosa watoto wake alipofika nyumbani.

src: He picked it up and pulled on it.
mt: Alipata na kipata.
ref: Akaichukua na kuivuta.

src: He grew up watching them on television.
mt: Alizaliwa wakati wa kufurahia kwa kushuhudia kwenye televisheni.
ref: Alikua akiwatazama kwenye runinga.

src: She immediately called her husband to share the good news.
mt: Aliwakaribisha mke wake kwa habari nzuri.
ref: Mara moja akampigia mumewe simu ili kushiriki habari hizo nzuri.

src: She is on a diet so she can never go there.
mt: Anasafiri kwa kipindi cha miezi sita kwa ajili ya kufanya kazi katika nchi ya Asia.
ref: Alibdilisha mazoea yake ya kula kwa hivyo hawezi kuenda hapo.

src: At first he feels apprehensive and worried he won't meet anyone.
mt: Kwanza anasikitika na kutaka kujua anaweza kujifungua na mtu.
ref: Kwanza alijihisi ana hofu na wasiwasi kuwa hatakuna na mtu.

src: His mom said it was too dangerous for a little boy.
mt: Mama yake alisema kwamba kwa mtoto mdogo ni vigumu.
ref: Mama yake alisema ni hatari sana kwa mvulana mdogo.

src: Today as I watched them they seemed agitated.
mt: Leo niliota kwa wakati wao waliwaza.
ref: Nilipokuwa nikiwatazama leo walionekana kufadhaika.

src: Her costume required a hoop skirt.
mt: Nguo yake ilikuwa na kifua cha kifua.
ref: Vazi lake lilihitaji sketi ya kuzungusha.

src: My manager was wearing a Beatles T Shirt.
mt: Mkuu wangu alikuwa na kitambaa cha Beatles.
ref: Meneja wangu alikuwa amevaa T shati ya Beatles.

src: He saw his favorite team!
mt: Aliona timu yake ya kufurahia!
ref: Aliona timu yake anayoipenda!

src: She hated the dentist, so she tried to ignore it.
mt: Alihatarika na daktari, kwa hiyo alivyokataza kujua.
ref: Alimchukua daktari wa meno, kwa hivyo akajaribu kupuuza.

src: He read all of the books in his house.
mt: Alielewa kila kitabu katika nyumba yake.
ref: Alisoma vitabu vyote nyumbani mwake.

src: I was broke, but thought I could keep them company.
mt: Nilikuwa na mapato yangu, lakini nilifikiri nitaendana nao.
ref: Sikuwa na pesa, lakini nikafikiria ninaweza kuandamana nao.

src: There was a cute girl doing her laundry there too.
mt: Kuna jamaa mwenye miguu mizito aliyokuwa akifanya kazi yake ya kujaribu kwenye kituo hicho pia.
ref: Kulikuwa na msichana mrembo akifua nguo zake pia.

src: So he called in that morning using a fake sick voice.
mt: Kwa hiyo alipiga simu kwa kipindi hicho kwa sauti ya mgonjwa.
ref: Kwa hivyo alipiga simu asubuhi hiyo akitumia sauti ghushi ya kuwa mgonjwa.

src: An arm emerged from an alleyway as Greg passed.
mt: Kifua chini cha Greg kilipatikana kutoka kwa barabara moja wakati Greg alipita.
ref: Mkono ukatoka kichorochoroni Greg akipita.

src: His girlfriend teases him that he could never go on a camping trip.
mt: Anamwiliwa na mke wake kwamba hawezi kufika katika safari ya kambi.
ref: Mpenziwe humtania kwamba hawezi kwenda safari ya kupiga kambi.

src: He would have no more money for food for his family until next month.
mt: Anaweza kutumia fedha yoyote kwa chakula kwa familia yake hadi mwezi ujao.
ref: Hatakuwa na pesa zozote za chakula kwa familia yake hadi mwezi ufuatao.

src: One day she told her sister Mary she felt insecure.
mt: Moja siku alisema kwa dada yake Mary alikuwa na hasara.
ref: Siku moja alimwambia dadake Mary kwamba hajihisi salama.

src: He was playing football with some friends and got hit in the head.
mt: Alifanya mpira na wenzake na kupata kipigo kwenye mdomo.
ref: Alikuwa akicheza mpira wa miguu na baadhi ya marafiki na akagongwa kichwani.

src: Her mother has tried everything to sooth her.
mt: Mama yake amekusanya vitu vyote vya kujaribu kujaribu kujaribu.
ref: Mama yake alikuwa amejaribu kila kitu ili kumtuliza.

src: I walked near the lake and saw some ducks.
mt: Nilipokuwa karibu na ziwa niliona mbwa mwitu.
ref: Nilitembea karibu na ziwa na kuona bata kadhaa.

src: He didn't have many friends but loved taking pictures.
mt: Alikuwa na marafiki chache lakini alivuta kupiga picha.
ref: Hakuwa na marafiki wengi lakini alipenda kupiga picha.

src: Five first-time cavers walked behind him.
mt: Wanakwenda kwanza kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka
ref: Watu watano waliokuwa wakiingia pangoni kwa mara ya kwanza walitembea nyuma yake.

src: Sean picked Sara up and they drove to the store.
mt: Sean alipiga Sara na wakati huo wakafika duka.
ref: Sean akamchukua Sara na wakaenda dukani.

src: There was a difficult test coming that he was not ready for.
mt: Kuna kesi kubwa iliyokuwepo ambayo alikuwa hakijawajibika.
ref: Kulikuwa na mtihani mgumu uliotarajiwa ambao hakuwa tayari.

src: He introduced her to cooking shows and watched them with her.
mt: Alimwajia kwa mifuko ya kujifungua na kushuhudia na yeye.
ref: Akamtambulisha kwa maonyesho ya upishi na wakayatazama pamoja.

src: He came by to see her everyday.
mt: Alifika kwa kushika naye kila siku.
ref: Alikuja kumwona kila siku.

src: The office staff complained it was always dirty.
mt: Wafanyakazi wa ofisi walikataa kwamba kila wakati ilikuwa chafu.
ref: Wafanyakazi wa ofisi walilalamika ilikuwa chafu kila wakati.

src: But she wanted hot cocoa.
mt: Lakini alitaka kukuza.
ref: Lakini alitaka kokoa moto.

src: She drove her car all the way to Buffalo.
mt: Alienda kwa gari yake hadi Buffalo.
ref: Aliendesha gari lake hadi Buffalo.

src: Finally we decided to divide its use.
mt: Kwa sasa tumekubaliana kuhusu kipindi cha kutumia.
ref: Mwishowe tukaamua kugawanya matumizi yake.

src: Suddenly the pilot made an announcement.
mt: Baada ya hapo rubani alifanya maelezo.
ref: Ghafla rubani akatoa tangazo.

src: He had worn down most of his crayons so he only had brown and black.
mt: Alivyopata kama kawaida kila aina ya rangi, alikuwa na kawaida tu ya kahawia na ya kijivu.
ref: Alikuwa ametumia krayoni zake nyingi kwa hivyo alikuwa amesalia na ya kahawia na nyeusi pekee.

src: It's not that he was nervous presenting.
mt: Si kwamba alikuwa na wasiwasi wakati wa kutoa.
ref: Si kwa sababu alikuwa na wasiwasi akiwasilisha.

src: He loved playing but never won.
mt: Alimwita kucheza lakini hakupata kushinda.
ref: Alipenda kucheza lakini hajawahi kushinda.

src: She went to wash her hands, but there was no soap.
mt: Alienda kwa kuchukua maji, lakini hakuna sabuni.
ref: Alienda kunawa mikono yake, lakini hakukuwa na sabuni.

src: Dad and Bill knew that sound when they heard it.
mt: Baba na Bill wajua sauti hiyo wakipata.
ref: Baba na Bill walijua sauti hiyo walipoisikia.

src: There were two together in a cage.
mt: Kuna wawili wakipanda kwa kifungo.
ref: Walikuwa wawili pamoja ndani ya kizimba.

src: Jill studied really hard.
mt: Jill alifanya kazi kwa kasi sana.
ref: Jill alisoma kwa bidii sana.

src: He was worried that he was too old to learn something new.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba alikuwa kubwa sana kufundisha kitu kipya.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba alikuwa mzee sana kujifunza kitu kipya.

src: He had an extensive collection of action figures.
mt: Alikuwa na kikundi cha figuri za kicheza kikubwa.
ref: Alikuwa na mkusanyiko mkubwa wa wahusika mashujaa.

src: Although she loved how heels looked, she hated how they felt.
mt: Alivyoona kama kipande cha kichwa, alikuwa na hasira kama kipande cha kichwa.
ref: Ingawa alipenda jinsi viatu virefu vilivyoonekana, alichukia jinsi walivyohisi.

src: I would play it even when others didn't know.
mt: Niligonga pia wakati wengine hawakujua.
ref: Ningecheza hata ingawa wengine hawakujua.

src: She found a letter written in a foreign language.
mt: Alijua barua iliyotungwa kwa lugha ya nje.
ref: Alipata barua iliyoandikwa kwa lugha ya kigeni.

src: She was very upset and went home to sulk.
mt: Aliwaambia kwa nguvu na kuelekea nyumbani kusukuma.
ref: Alikasirika sana na alikwenda nyumbani akiwa amenuna.

src: She tried shaving it off.
mt: Alitafuta kuchimba.
ref: Alijaribu kunyoa.

src: Gina sat in the back seat squished by her siblings.
mt: Gina alikuwa katika kiti cha nyuma kikabiliwa na wana wa kiume.
ref: Gina aliketi kiti cha nyuma akiwa amebanwa na ndugu wake.

src: It was the first month at a new house and we didn't know anyone.
mt: Ilikuwa mwezi wa kwanza katika nyumba mpya na hatukujua mtu yoyote.
ref: Ilikuwa mwezi wa kwanza katika nyumba mpya na hatukujua mtu yeyote.

src: He was concerned he would always get lost.
mt: Alimwambia kwamba alikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba kila mara anapata kujikuta.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi atapotea kila wakati.

src: And she saw pictures of ligers.
mt: Na aliona picha za ligers.
ref: Na akaona picha za liger.

src: She read the book beforehand.
mt: Aliwahi kurejea kitabu hicho.
ref: Alisoma kitabu hicho mapema.

src: Then she realized she had locked herself out!
mt: Baadaye alijua kuwa alikuwa ameipiga kwa kifungua!
ref: Kisha akagundua alikuwa amejifungia nje!

src: I decided to get rid of all the clutter and papers on the table.
mt: Nilikataa kufanya na vitu vyote vya kawaida na vitabu vya meza.
ref: Niliamua kuondoa mkusanyiko wa vitu na makaratasi yote mezani.

src: They were married for many Year's.
mt: Walikuwa wameoa kwa miaka mingi.
ref: Walikuwa wameoana kwa miaka mingi.

src: A duck was found and stared at.
mt: Kijani kilipatikana na kujadiliwa.
ref: Bata alipatikana na akakodolewa macho.

src: There she saw a sign advertising dolphin swims.
mt: Aliangalia ishara inayotangaza kuwa inawezekana kufika kwa kujifungua kwa wanyama.
ref: Huko aliona ishara ikitangaza kuwa pomboo huogelea.

src: She took a bus tour.
mt: Alienda kwa bus.
ref: Alienda ziara ya basi.

src: My cup spilled on the counter.
mt: Chupa yangu ilipinduliwa juu ya kioo.
ref: Kikombe changu kilimwagika juu ya kaunta.

src: They were drinking beers and talking.
mt: Walikuwa wakipika bia na kuongea.
ref: Walikuwa wakinywa bia na kuzungumza.

src: One day she is invited to attend an art gallery opening.
mt: Mwaka mmoja baadaye anapewa kibali cha kuwakilisha katika kibali cha kuanzia.
ref: Siku moja alialikwa kuhudhuria kufungua nyumba ya sanaa.

src: Jill drove her old car down to the car dealership.
mt: Jill alitumia gari lake la zamani kuelekea kwa duka la gari.
ref: Jill akaendesha gari lake la zamani hadi kwenye uuzaji wa magari.

src: He had not noticed that it was already Valentine's Day.
mt: Alisikia kuwa sasa ni siku ya Valentine.
ref: Hakuwa amegundua kuwa tayari ilikuwa Siku ya Wapendanao.

src: He didn't know how to ride.
mt: Alisema hakuwajua kama anaweza kupiga.
ref: Hakujua jinsi ya kuendesha.

src: One summer a friend invited Quentin to his lake house.
mt: Kwenda kwa mshahara, rafiki aliwahimiza Quentin kufika katika nyumba yake ya ziwa.
ref: Pindi moja katika majira ya joto, rafiki alimwalika Quentin kwenye nyumba yake ya ziwani.

src: She brought him a plate of pancakes minutes later.
mt: Aliwachia kwa panga ya kipande cha kipande dakika chache baadaye.
ref: Alimletea sahani ya chapati ya maji dakika chache baadaye.

src: As a family we decided that this was a great idea.
mt: Kama familia tulikubali kwamba hii ni idea nzuri.
ref: Kama familia tuliamua kwamba hii ilikuwa wazo nzuri.

src: They are wilting and dry from the sun.
mt: Wanaangamia na kupata maji kutokana na jua.
ref: Yananyauka na kukauka kutoka jua.

src: Jill was angry that she was losing every game.
mt: Jill alikuwa na hasira kwamba alikuwa akilazimika kila mchezo.
ref: Jill alikasirika kwamba alikuwa akipoteza kila mchezo.

src: After a few hours, I felt like running.
mt: Baada ya muda mrefu, nilikuwa na hofu ya kufanya kazi.
ref: Baada ya saa chache, nilihisi kukimbia.

src: He made up his mind to kick in doors and rob houses.
mt: Alifanya kile alivyotaka kwa kuchinjwa na kufanya kosa.
ref: Aliamua kuvinja milango na kupora nyumba.

src: I looked all over the internet for a solution to my problem.
mt: Nilimkuta kila mahali kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kwa ajili ya ufumbuzi wa masuala yangu.
ref: Nilitafuta mtandaoni suluhisho la tatizo langu.

src: He bent down and picked it up.
mt: Alifika chini na kupata.
ref: Akainama na kuchukua.

src: He wants to get a new pair so he can listen to music.
mt: Anataka kupata jibu jipya ili anaweza kusikiliza muziki.
ref: Anataka kununua jozi mpya ili aweze kusikiliza muziki.

src: However, the tickets were too expensive.
mt: Lakini tiketi zilikuwa zimepotea.
ref: Walakini, tikiti zilikuwa ghali mno.

src: He would eat at least one a day.
mt: Anakula zaidi moja kila siku.
ref: Angekula angalau moja kwa siku.

src: One day one of her favorite requesters rejected her work.
mt: Moja siku mmoja mmoja wa watekelezaji wake wazuri alitupilia chini kazi yake.
ref: Siku moja mmoja wa waombaji aliowapenda sana alikataa kazi yake.

src: Trina liked Donovan so she said yes but she was really worried.
mt: Trina alikuwa na uhusika na Donovan kwa hiyo alisema naye bali alikuwa na wasiwasi sana.
ref: Trina alimpenda Donovan kwa hivyo akasema ndiyo lakini alikuwa na wasiwasi sana.

src: When he turned six Year's old he asked for a bike for his birthday.
mt: Alipokuwa na miaka sita alipenda kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa kwa gari la kujisikia.
ref: Alipofikisha umri wa miaka sita alitaka baiskeli kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa.

src: She ordered a vanilla milkshake.
mt: Aliamua mafuta ya vanila.
ref: Akaagiza maziwa ya vanilla.

src: He used the last of his money to buy a fluffy cotton candy.
mt: Alitumia mwisho wa fedha yake kupata kifungu cha ngozi cha ngozi.
ref: Alitumia pesa aliyosalia nayo kununua pipi nyepesi ya pamba.

src: He had chores to do.
mt: Alikuwa na kazi za kila siku.
ref: Alikuwa na kazi za kufanya.

src: One day Rashid's brother was late for work.
mt: Juma moja Rashid alikuwa na dada yake alikuwa amekata tarehe ya kazi.
ref: Siku moja kaka ya Rashid alichelewa kufika kazini.

src: The cashier took a very long time bringing her card back.
mt: Kashiria alikuwa akifanya kazi kwa muda mrefu akilipa kadi yake.
ref: Keshia alichukua muda mrefu sana kurudisha kadi yake.

src: Hence yesterday I went out looking.
mt: Kwa hiyo nilipita nje kujaribu.
ref: Kwa sababu hiyo nilienda kutafuta.

src: I decided to try to get promoted.
mt: Nilichagua kujitafutia kuhudhuria.
ref: Nikaamua kujaribu kuanya nipandishwe cheo.

src: Maggie was nervous because she didn't know anyone.
mt: Maggie alikuwa na wasiwasi kwa sababu alikuwa bila yeyote.
ref: Maggie alikuwa na wasiwasi kwa sababu hakujua mtu yeyote.

src: There was a train set in the window of the store.
mt: Kuna mafua ya reli katika kioo cha duka.
ref: Kulikuwa na seti ya gari moshi iliyowekwa kwenye dirisha la duka.

src: She waited until her mother was taking a nap.
mt: Aliwaita mpaka mama yake alikuwa akisogea.
ref: Akasubiri hadi mama yake alipolala kidogo.

src: He loved a girl who lived in Louisiana.
mt: Alimwita mwanamke mmoja aliyemwita Louisiana.
ref: Alimpenda msichana aliyeishi Louisiana.

src: He knew if he didn't pass he would have to go to summer school.
mt: Alijua kama hakuwa na matokeo yake atakapata kufanya masomo ya kesho.
ref: Alijua ikiwa hatafaulu itambidi aende shule ya majira ya joto.

src: She went to her local humane society to start the process.
mt: Alienda kwa kushirikiana na jamii ya kudumisha wanyama kwa kuanzia kwa kushughulikia.
ref: Alikwenda kwa jamii ya kibinadamu ya mtaa wake ili kuanza mchakato.

src: I was learning the balance beam and doing moves on it.
mt: Nilikuwa nimeanza kujifunza mabara ya kifua na kufanya harakati zake.
ref: Nilikuwa najifunza kudumisha usawaziko na nikafanya mazoezi yake.

src: It was going to be hard to choose the one we wanted to buy.
mt: Kutokana na hivyo, itakuwa vigumu kuweka kile kitakachotupata.
ref: Ingekuwa ngumu kuchagua tunayetaka kununua.

src: He decided he would be happier in America's Heartland.
mt: Alisema atakuwa na furaha zaidi katika Bara la Amerika.
ref: Aliamua atakuwa na furaha zaidi akiwa Heartland ya Amerika.

src: She knew that her mother would hound her about her love life.
mt: Alijua kwamba mama yake atakupanga kuhusu maisha yake ya mapenzi.
ref: Alijua kuwa mama yake atamsumbua na maisha yake ya mapenzi.

src: As a result I have begun to feel quite lonely.
mt: Kwa sababu ya hiyo nimeanza kuwa na uwezo wa kujitetea.
ref: Kwa sababu hiyo nimeanza kuhisi mpweke kabisa.

src: One day she went on an overnight field trip.
mt: Juma moja alipofika kwenye safari ya kujenga barabara.
ref: Siku moja alienda safari ya kimasomo usiku kucha.

src: I couldn't wait to attend.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepanga kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Nilikuwa na hamu na ghamu ya kuhudhuria.

src: To my surprise I dropped it.
mt: Kwa habari yangu nilipata nilipindua.
ref: Kwa mshangao wangu, niliiangusha.

src: It never rained or stormed there.
mt: Hakuna mvua au mchana kule.
ref: Haikuwahi kunyesha au kuwa na dhoruba.

src: She went down to the library to check out a book on it.
mt: Alienda kwa kushika kitabu juu ya hicho katika chumba cha vitabu.
ref: Alienda kwenye maktaba kukagua kitabu kulihusu.

src: He talked to his friend and found out he needed to go to practice.
mt: Alieleza na rafiki yake na kupata kuwa alitakiwa kufika kwenye michezo.
ref: Alizungumza rafiki wake na akagundua anahitaji kwenda kufanya mazoezi.

src: She walked him around but still he did not sleep.
mt: Aliwahudhuria lakini bado hakuwachana.
ref: Alimtembeza akizunguka lakini bado hakulala.

src: He thought he could do it as an adult.
mt: Alimwamini kuweza kufanya hivyo kama mwanadamu.
ref: Alidhani angeweza kufanya hivyo akiwa mtu mzima.

src: Because of asthma she couldn't play sports.
mt: Kwa sababu ya asma alikuwa hana nafasi ya kucheza michezo.
ref: Kwa sababu ya ugonjwa wa pumu hakuweza kucheza michezo.

src: Joe was nervous.
mt: Joe alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Joe alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: He prepared himself for the questions they may ask.
mt: Alifanya kazi yake kwa kujitayarisha kwa maswali ambayo wengine watauliza.
ref: Alijitayarisha kwa maswali ambayo wanaweza kuuliza.

src: Therefore, Elaine decided that she would go out to eat.
mt: Kwa hiyo, Elaine aliamua kwamba atakwenda kula nje.
ref: Kwa hivyo, Elaine aliamua kwamba ataenda nje kula.

src: He spent a long time filling out the application.
mt: Aliwakalia muda mrefu kwa kufanya maombi.
ref: Alitumia muda mrefu kujaza maombi.

src: They drank 3 shots in one bar.
mt: Waliwinda 3 shot kwenye bar.
ref: Walikunywa gilasi 3 katika baa moja.

src: They met at her house to discuss what food and band to use.
mt: Waliangalia kwa nyumba yake ili kujadili vyakula na bendi.
ref: Walikutana nyumbani kwake kujadili chakula watakachopika na bendi watatumia.

src: His little brother is using the shower.
mt: Kaka yake mdogo anatumia shamba.
ref: Ndugu yake mdogo anaoga bafuni.

src: He went to his doctor to get a checkup.
mt: Alifika daktari yake ili kupima.
ref: Akaenda kwa daktari wake kuangaliwa.

src: She was unsure as to whether she should open the door or not.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu kama alitakiwa kufungua pua au hata hivyo.
ref: Hakuwa na uhakika iwapo anapaswa kufungua mlango au la.

src: She decided to drive to the farm market to pick some delicious apples.
mt: Aliamua kufika kwenye mabasi ya kilimo ili kupata mafuta ya mabaha.
ref: Aliamua kuendesha gari kuelekea soko la bidhaa za kilimo kununua tofaa tamu.

src: His friends commented on it when they went over.
mt: Wamkamati wakamwambia wakati wao wakapita.
ref: Rafiki wake waliizungumzia walipomtembelea.

src: However, his parents always did his best to provide for him.
mt: Lakini wazazi wake wakati wote walifanya kila yao kwa kumwaga.
ref: Hata hivyo, kila wakati wazazi wake walijitahidi kumsaidia.

src: As her roommates got ready, Jill fussed about her hair.
mt: Kama wenzake wakijitayarisha, Jill alifanya kazi kuhusu mawindo yake.
ref: Wakazi wenza wake walipojiandaa, Jill alinyoosha nywele zake.

src: The wind was strong and blew the banner away.
mt: Upeo ulikuwa mkali na ulivuta bendera.
ref: Upepo ulikuwa mkali na ukapeperusha bango hiyo.

src: She once made them for me because I was having a bad day.
mt: Aliwafanya kwa mimi kwa sababu nilikuwa na siku mbaya.
ref: Alinizitengenezea siku moja kwa sababu nilikuwa na siku mbaya.

src: His grandpa loved birdwatching, so Tim watched with him.
mt: Tim alivyopenda kufanya kazi na baba yake, alivyopenda kufanya kazi na baba yake.
ref: Babu yake alipenda kutazama ndege, kwa hivyo Tim alitazama naye.

src: He was very excited to have started his first job.
mt: Alikuwa na umoja sana kufanya kazi yake ya kwanza.
ref: Alisisimka sana kuanza kazi yake ya kwanza.

src: Gina was never more happy for a day to end.
mt: Gina alikuwa hatarajiwa zaidi kwa siku kuishia.
ref: Gina alikuwa na furaha sana kwa ajili ya siku kuisha.

src: First they packed up their furniture.
mt: Kwanza wakapakia meza yao.
ref: Walipakia fanicha zao kwanza.

src: She could buy one, but it would be more special if she found it.
mt: Anaweza kupata moja, lakini itakuwa zaidi ya kushangaza kama anaweza kujifunza.
ref: Angeweza kununua moja, lakini itakuwa muhimu zaidi akipata.

src: He wanted his wedding to go perfectly.
mt: Alitaka ndoa yake iwe nzuri.
ref: Alitaka harusi yake iendelee vizuri.

src: All of a sudden he heard loud buzzing.
mt: Kabla ya kuona, alikuta kwa kawaida.
ref: Ghafla alisikia mvumo mkubwa.

src: Todd's yard was full of leaves.
mt: Kwa Todd, mali yake ilikuwa na majani mengi.
ref: Ua la Todd lilikuwa limejaa majani.

src: He worked out every night to try to reach his goal.
mt: Ali kazi kila usiku ili kufikia malengo yake.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi kila usiku kujaribu kufikia lengo lake.

src: At the same time, he was trying to clean his phone screen with a cloth.
mt: Kwa wakati huo, alikuwa akifanya kazi ya kuchimba mabara ya simu yake na kitanda.
ref: Wakati huo huo, alikuwa anajaribu kusafisha skrini ya simu yake akitumia kitambaa.

src: She was only in the 8th grade, but she knew she was good.
mt: Aliekana kama alikuwa katika daraja la 8, lakini alijua kwamba alikuwa bora.
ref: Alikuwa tu katika darasa la 8, lakini alijua alikuwa hodari.

src: They knocked over the vase and it broke into many pieces.
mt: Walivuta chupa na kufaika kwa nywele zake.
ref: Waligonga chombo na kikavunjika katika vipande vingi.

src: Steve's girlfriend broke up with him.
mt: Steve alikuwa na mpenzi, lakini alikataa.
ref: Mpenzi wa Steve aliachana naye.

src: Gloria was shocked at the price of even just half a dozen lilies.
mt: Gloria alishangaa kwa bei ya lily moja kwa nusu.
ref: Gloria alishtushwa na bei ya mayungiyungi hata nusu tu.

src: His goal was to be able to make any basket on the court.
mt: Kazi yake ilikuwa kujitambua kama mwanachama wa timu yoyote anaweza kufanya kila kikwazo cha kati.
ref: Lengo lake lilikuwa kuweza kutengeneza kikapu chochote kwenye kiwanja.

src: However, she needs to lose weight so the skinny jeans will look good.
mt: Lakini anahitaji kupunguka ili jeansi za mabega mabichi yake yataonekana vizuri.
ref: Walakini, anahitaji kupoteza uzito ili suruali nyembamba ya jinzi ionekane nzuri.

src: Our entire band class was going.
mt: Kwetu wote kundi la muziki lilienda.
ref: Darasa letu lote la bendi lilikuwa linaenda.

src: He was so sick of the heat.
mt: Alikuwa na ugonjwa wa baridi.
ref: Alikuwa amechoka sana na joto.

src: He was just too afraid to sing.
mt: Alikuwa na shida kubwa kusema.
ref: Alikuwa akiogopa sana kuimba.

src: That was more than enough.
mt: Hivyo ilikuwa zaidi ya kutosha.
ref: Hao walikuwa wametosha.

src: While walking I stumbled across something that scared me.
mt: Nilipokuwa nikitembea nimejikuta na kitu kilichokimbia nimekamata.
ref: Nilipokuwa nikitembea nilikutana na kitu ambacho kilinitisha.

src: Today she was in a hurry.
mt: Leo alikuwa na shughuli.
ref: Leo alikuwa na haraka.

src: He felt lonely because he did not know anybody in the town.
mt: Alikuwa na uwezo wa kujifungua kwa sababu hakujua mtu yeyote katika mji.
ref: Alijihisi mpweke kwa sababu hakujua mtu yeyote katika mji huo.

src: He went to college to become a doctor.
mt: Alifika chuo kwa ajili ya kuwa daktari.
ref: Alienda chuo cha elimu ili kuwa daktari.

src: He was broke with no income.
mt: Alifaulu bila kujikimu.
ref: Alikuwa fukara bila kipato.

src: He turned on the shower and waited for it to get hot.
mt: Alifuta maji ya kuchimba na kuwachana kwa maji yake kujikimu.
ref: Akawasha bafu la manyunyu na kusubiri ipate joto.

src: She loved all the horns and other brass instruments involved.
mt: Alimwita wote kwa ngoma na vyombo vingine vya mabati.
ref: Alipenda tarumbeta zote na vyombo vingine husika vya brasi.

src: We went many places around town.
mt: Tulipata nchi nyingi kwa jumla.
ref: Tulienda maeneo mengi mjini.

src: The set had drumsticks, a cymbal, and a seat.
mt: Kifaa chenye mabanda, kipande cha kisasa na kiti.
ref: Seti hiyo ilikuwa na fimbo za kupigia ngoma, toazi, na kiti.

src: She was very nervous.
mt: Alikuwa na uwezo mdogo.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi sana.

src: They would get treats and drinks and huddle around the tv.
mt: Wao wakati huo wakapata vitu vya kusherehekea na pia kula na kuangalia televisheni.
ref: Wangepata vitafunio na vinywaji na kuwa karibu na tv.

src: I called the teller and asked when i could do this.
mt: Nilipiga simu kwa kambi ya kifungua na nilisema wakati ninao nia kufanya hivi.
ref: Nikampigia simu mhudumu na kumuuliza ni lini ninaweza kufanya hivi.

src: He groaned, knowing he couldn't make steak or hamburgers.
mt: Alimkataa, anajua hawezi kufanya nyama choma au nyama choma.
ref: Akalalamika, akijua hangeweza kutengeneza nyama au hambaga.

src: He often worked the night shift.
mt: Ali kazi kwa kipindi cha usiku.
ref: Mara kwa mara alikuwa akifanya zamu ya usiku.

src: The teacher let each student pick a colored syrup topping.
mt: Mwalimu alitupa kila mtu kupanga mchuzi wa mafuta ya rangi.
ref: Mwalimu akaruhusu kila mwanafunzi kuchagua shira yenye rangi.

src: He liked all three of them but he needed to make a decision.
mt: Alivyoingiza wote wawili, alihitajika kufanya majibu.
ref: Aliwapenda wote watatu lakini alipaswa kufanya uamuzi.

src: He didn't think it sounded like fun but decided to humor her.
mt: Alisikitika lakini alisikia na kuwakaribisha.
ref: Hakufikiria ni jambo la kufurahisha lakini akaamua kumfurahisha.

src: Ella's father bought her an expensive grand piano by a renowned maker.
mt: Baba wa Ella alimwamini piano kubwa kwa ghala kwa mchakachuaji maarufu.
ref: Baba ya Ella alimnunulia piano ghali mno iliyotengenezwa na mtengenezaji maarufu.

src: He went to the gun store and asked many questions.
mt: Alifika duka la silaha na kuuliza mengi.
ref: Alienda kwenye duka la bunduki na kuuliza maswali mengi.

src: There, she went to the very tip of the island.
mt: Kwahiyo, alipofika kwenye kisiwa, alipita kwenye kile kimoja cha kisiwa.
ref: Hapo, alienda hadi kilele cha kisiwa.

src: He tried to be careful since he couldn't erase his words.
mt: Alivyokuwa na ujasiri kwa sababu hakukuwa na nafasi ya kuchukua maneno yake.
ref: Alijaribu kuwa makini kwa kuwa hawezi kufuta maneno yake.

src: Noticing her passion, Sarah's father bought her a new telescope.
mt: Kutokana na upendo wake, baba yake alimwachia Sarah teleskopi mpya.
ref: Alipogundua shauku yake, baba ya Sara alimnunulia darubini mpya.

src: She need to move it around for a change.
mt: Anahitaji kubadilisha kwa muda.
ref: Alitaka kukibadilisha.

src: She'd been living with a wife beater in a rundown trailer park.
mt: Aliyekuwa na mpenzi mwenye kushambulia na kuwadhalilisha katika mabweni ya kipindu cha kifua.
ref: Alikuwa akiisha na mme wake aliyekuwa akimpiga katika kambi iliyochakaa.

src: I'm not sure when it happened but it seems to have been mutual.
mt: Sijui wakati gani ilipotokea, lakini inaonekana kuwa ilikuwa kwa wawili.
ref: Sina uhakika ni nini kilichofanyika lakini inaonekana kuwa wote walitaka hivyo.

src: Her mom went into the hospital and Anna was hopeful.
mt: Mama yake alipokwenda hospitali, Anna alikuwa na mapendeleo.
ref: Mama yake alienda hospitalini na Anna alikuwa na matumaini.

src: They were all afraid to confess anything and only picked Dare.
mt: Wote walikuwa wakikataa kujitambua na kuchagua tu Dare.
ref: Wote walihofia kukiri kitu chochote na wakachagua Thubutu pekee.

src: He realized that he'd forgotten his toothbrush.
mt: Alijua kwamba alikuwa ameacha kisukuma.
ref: Akagundua kwamba alikuwa amesahau mswaki wake.

src: She started with her math homework.
mt: Alianza na kazi yake ya kisomo.
ref: Alianza na kazi yake ya nyumbani ya hisabati.

src: He consistently collected issues of his favorite stories.
mt: Ali kila mara kupata vitabu vya habari zake za kawaida.
ref: Aliendelea kukusanya matoleo ya hadithi zake azipendazo.

src: He thought that if they bite him he would turn into a vampire.
mt: Alimwamini kwamba kama wanaezeza atakapokatika.
ref: Alifikiria kwamba wakimuuma atakuwa mnyonya damu.

src: She sings in her school choir.
mt: Anasimama katika kundi la wimbo wa shule yake.
ref: Yeye huimba katika kwaya ya shule yake.

src: One night, he was bit by a black mamba.
mt: Jumamosi, alipigwa na mamba mweusi.
ref: Usiku mmoja, aliumwa na songwe-mweusi.

src: He begged for money on the streets.
mt: Alimshangilia fedha kwenye barabara.
ref: Aliomba pesa mitaani.

src: Each set out to find ingredients.
mt: Kila mmoja alifika kujenga vitu.
ref: Kila mmoja akaenda kutafuta viungo.

src: Judy makes a roast with potatoes and rolls with gravy.
mt: Judy anafanya chakula cha nyama na patatini na kifungua na chumvi.
ref: Judy alichoma viazi na mikate yenye mchuzi.

src: She felt so bad that she waited on him hand and foot.
mt: Aliwakumbuka kwa kila kitu.
ref: Alihisi vibaya sana kwamba alimfanyia kila kitu.

src: They became best friends and grew up together.
mt: Wakawa wapenzi wakuu na wakapanda pamoja.
ref: Wakawa marafiki wakubwa na wakakua pamoja.

src: There were two movies they wanted to see.
mt: Kuna filamu mbili waliitaka kuona.
ref: Kulikuwa na filamu mbili walizotaka kutazama.

src: Amy hurriedly suited up in her wetsuit.
mt: Amy alifanya kazi kwa kujifungua katika wimbo wake.
ref: Kwa haraka Amy alivaa nguo zake za kuogelea.

src: He used planks of scrap wood, and nails.
mt: Alitumia mabati ya mafuta ya mafuta, na kisawasawa.
ref: Alitumia mbao za kuni chakavu, na misumari.

src: But he would become lost in his own vivid imagination.
mt: Lakini alikuwa anapoteza wakati wake katika fahamu yake ya kujifunza.
ref: Lakini angepotea katika fikra zake mwenyewe.

src: Gina watched as friends made remarks, and told stories about him.
mt: Gina alimwona wenzake wakifanya mambo, na kuwafundisha habari kuhusu yeye.
ref: Gina aliwatazama marafiki wakitoa maoni yao, na wakisimulia hadithi kumuhusu.

src: She feels like she is going to throw up.
mt: Anasikitika anaweza kufanya kujifungua.
ref: Anahisi ni kama atatapika.

src: She decides that she needs to get a new bed.
mt: Anamchagua kwamba anahitaji kuuza kinga.
ref: Akaamua kwamba anahitaji kupata kitanda kipya.

src: But he's been feeling pretty frustrated by the news media.
mt: Lakini amekuwa akisikitika sana na habari za vyombo vya habari.
ref: Lakini amekuwa akihisi kufadhaishwa na vyombo vya habari.

src: Everyday they go to the banana plantation and get some.
mt: Kila siku wanapokwenda kwenye shamba la matembezo na kupata.
ref: Kila siku wanaenda kwenye shamba la ndizi na kuchukua kadhaa.

src: A local group rented a 1957 transit bus, painted in old colors.
mt: Jumuiya ya kijiji ilipata kodi ya 1957 transit bus, iliyopulizwa katika rangi za zamani.
ref: Kundi la ndani lilikodisha basi ya 1957, lililopakwa rangi nzee.

src: He scratched his arms until they left scars because it was so bad.
mt: Alisababisha kipimo kwa vipele vyake hadi kufikia kipimo kwa sababu ilikuwa kama hivyo.
ref: Alikuna mikono yake hadi akaacha mabaka kwa sababu ilikuwa mbaya sana.

src: Everyday after school they would meet at the local blacktop to play.
mt: Kila siku baada ya shule wao wangekuwa wamepata katika kifua cha kijijini kwa ajili ya kucheza.
ref: Kila siku baada ya shule wangekutana katika uwanja ulio karibu ili kucheza.

src: The got all the ingredients together and got to it.
mt: Wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakapata vitu vyote vya kutosha na kuanza kufanya kazi.

src: She worked out for 2 hours.
mt: Aliwafanya mazoezi kwa masaa 2.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi kwa saa 2.

src: She was very proud of her accomplishment.
mt: Aliwakubali kwa furaha.

src: They picked a huge bunch of apples and brought them home.
mt: Waliangalia mchana kubwa wa mabaka na kupeleka nyumbani.

src: It was for a sucker from the store.
mt: Ilivyopatikana kwa mwenyeji kutoka duka.
ref: Zilikuwa kwa ajili ya peremende dukani.

src: He had just arrived and was excited to see Transylvania.
mt: Alifika kwa karibu na alikuwa na hamu ya kuona Transylvania.
ref: Alikuwa amefika tu na alikuwa na msisimko wa kuona Transylvania.

src: His favorite video game series was releasing a new game.
mt: Alivyoitwa na michezo ya video yake ya kawaida, michezo yake ya kawaida ilikuwa inatoa michezo mpya.
ref: Mfululizo wa mchezo wake anaoupenda wa video ulikuwa ukitoa mchezo mpya.

src: It involved a big car crash.
mt: Ilivyohusu, kuna ajali kubwa ya gari kubwa.

src: Ralph never listened to what she said.
mt: Ralph hakuangalia nini alisema.
ref: Ralph hakuwa akisikiliza alichokisema.

src: She decided to become an astronaut.
mt: Aliamua kuwa mwanasayansi wa anga.

src: I had a lot of stuff to move.
mt: Nilikuwa na mengi kwa kuchukua.
ref: Nilikuwa na vitu vingi vya kuhamisha.

src: She had a playdate every week.
mt: Aliwa na mpenzi kila wiki.

src: Her house did as well, or at least that's what he remembers.
mt: Jumba lake pia, au hata hivyo ni yale ambayo anavyoingia.
ref: Nyumba yake ilinukia hivyo pia, au angalau hiyo ndio ninakumbuka.

src: Jake wasn't very good at skiing but went anyways.
mt: Jake hakukua mwenye uwezo mkubwa wa kufurika lakini alifika tena.
ref: Jake hakuwa mzuri sana kutekeleza kwenye theluji lakini hata hivyo alienda.

src: She signed up for a class to teach her.
mt: Alijiunga na kikao cha kusomesha.
ref: Akajiandikisha kwa somo la kujifunza.

src: She meet her friend Sally.
mt: Aliangalia dada yake Sally.
ref: Akakutana na rafiki yake Sally.

src: He had dropped it a few time hours within getting it.
mt: Aliachia kwa mara kadhaa wakati wa kufikia.
ref: Alikuwa ameiangusha mara kadhaa saa chache baada ya kuipata.

mt: Gina alipata nafasi na kushika kichwa.
ref: Gina akatoka na kunyoosha miguu yake.

src: Thinking it was one of my friends I answered.
mt: Kwa kuamini kuwa ni mmoja wa wenzangu nilijibu.

src: She kept making small mistakes and people were getting mad.
mt: Aliendelea kufanya changamoto za kichache na watu wakakataa.
