src: She was a young cat, and we didn't know why she died.
mt: Alitoka kama kiti, na sisi hatukuwa na sababu ya kifo chake.
ref: Alikuwa paka mdogo, na hatukujua ni kwa nini alikufa.

src: The petting zoo was her favorite part.
mt: Kifungu cha kujadili na kujadili kiliwakilisha sehemu yake ya kipekee.
ref: Sehemu ya kuwagusa wanyama ndio alikuwa anapenda sana.

src: Sally is estranged from the family.
mt: Sally anajitetea na familia.
ref: Sally ametengwa na familia.

src: She flew specifically to get her hair done.
mt: Alienda kwa ajili ya kupata kufanyia kazi kwa kipande chake.
ref: Alisafiri ili kutengenezwa nywele hasa.

src: His train took him to the center of Sofia.
mt: Reli yake ilimwita kwa kwanza mji wa Sofia.
ref: Treni yake ilimpeleka katikati mwa Sofia.

src: He came to a gate in the path.
mt: Alifika kwenye kifaru cha njia.
ref: Akafikia mlango katika njia hiyo.

src: I was so excited to see this movie.
mt: Nilikuwa na hamu sana kufika filamu hii.
ref: Nilisisimka sana kuona filamu hiyo.

src: For my birthday this year I decided to treat myself.
mt: Kwa siku yangu ya kuzaliwa hii mwaka nilisikia kwa kujitunza.
ref: Kwa siku yangu ya kuzaliwa mwaka huu nikaamua kujifanyia kitu kizuri.

src: Now Grayson needs some money to help pay his rent.
mt: Leo Grayson anahitaji pesa kwa ajili ya kushirikiana katika kujenga mali.
ref: Sasa Grayson anahitaji pesa za kumsaidia kulipa kodi yake.

src: When Lance joined the Army, Adam signed up, too.
mt: Jalali alijiunga na Jeshi, Adam pia alijiunga.
ref: Wakati Lance alijunga na Jeshi, Adam alijiunga pia.

src: After signing the attendance board, the dentist greeted me.
mt: Baada ya kufatilia kadi ya uzoefu, daktari alimwona.
ref: Baada ya kutia saini bodi ya kuhudhuria, daktari wa meno alinisalimia.

src: His parents bought him a set for Christmas.
mt: Wazazi wake walimwamuru kwa kipindi cha Krismasi.
ref: Wazazi wake walimnunulia seti ya ngoma kwa ajili ya Krisimasi.

src: There used to be this amazing buffet by my house.
mt: Kuna buffet kama huo kimekuwepo karibu na nyumba yangu.
ref: Kulikuwa na bafe nzuri karibu na nyumba yangu.

src: He was in the jungle gym trying to do tricks.
mt: Alikuwa katika mabati ya kijani akifanya mazuri.
ref: Alikuwa kwenye eneo la kufanyia mazoezi akifanya ujanja wake.

src: She took a bubble bath.
mt: Alienda kwa maji ya kubeba.
ref: Akaoga kwa kakao yenye povu.

src: It was her first time meeting her boyfriend's parents.
mt: Ilikuwa mara yake ya kwanza kujifungua na wazazi wa binti yake.
ref: Ilikuwa mara yake ya kwanza kukutana na wazazi wa mpenzi wake.

src: We decided to have a fun winter break together.
mt: Kwa sababu tulikuwa na kipindi cha baridi, tulitaka tukae pamoja.
ref: Tukaamua kufurahia mapumziko ya msimu wa baridi pamoja.

src: He thought it was a cute way for the squirrel to say warm.
mt: Alimwambia ni njia nzuri ya kusema mwitu kwa kusema.
ref: Akafikiria ilikuwa njia nzuri ya kindi kuwa na joto.

src: So his friend Tom got him a large case of a rare variety.
mt: Kwa hiyo rafiki yake Tom alimpa kesi kubwa ya aina ya kawaida.
ref: Kwa hivyo rafiki yake Tom akampa kasha kubwa lenye aina nadra.

src: She always felt that she held the rest of her team back.
mt: Aliweza kujua kwamba alikuwa anashindwa kushinda kwa wenzake.
ref: Amekuwa akihisi amekuwa akivuta timu yake nyuma.

src: At first he was having fun.
mt: Kwanza alikuwa anavyoona nafasi.
ref: Mwanzoni alikuwa akifurahia.

src: Unfortunately he couldn't decide what to get.
mt: Kwa bahati mbaya alikosa kuchagua.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya hangeweza kuamua atanunua nini.

src: He never went to court.
mt: Aliyekuwa na kesi yake hakupata mahakamani.
ref: Hakuwai kwenda mahakamani.

src: So, he went out in the woods.
mt: Kwa hivyo, alipofika katika mashamba.
ref: Kwa hivyo, alienda msituni.

src: Ted thought that games were a burgeoning art form, worthy of praise.
mt: Ted alitambua kwamba michezo ni aina ya sanaa inayotoka, inayoweza kutambulika.
ref: Ted alifikiria kwamba michezo ilikuwa aina ya sanaa inayokua, inayopaswa kusifika.

src: She drank some juice to refuel before running a few errands.
mt: Ali pila maji kwa ajili ya kupima kabla ya kufanya kazi chache.
ref: Alikunywa sharubati kiasi ili kupata nguvu kabla ya kufanya shughuli chache.

src: She takes a walk in the morning and at night.
mt: Anapata baraka ya kuwinda asubuhi na jioni.
ref: Yeye hutembea asubuhi na usiku.

src: Last week he was alone in an elevator.
mt: Jana alikuwa pekee katika lift.
ref: Wiki iliyopita alikuwa peke yake ndani ya lifti.

src: He ran outside to see what had happened, only to find his car damaged.
mt: Aliruka nje kujua nini kilikuwa kichochewa, lakini akafika kwa gari lake kimeharibiwa.
ref: akakambia nje ili kuona ni nini kilichofanyika, akapata gari lake limeharibika.

src: The people who lived there did not know.
mt: Wakazi walikuwa hawajui.
ref: Watu walioshi hapo hawakujua.

src: Carmen had to find a recipe for the pizza.
mt: Carmen alishafikia mpango wa pizza.
ref: Carmen alilazimika kutafuta mapishi ya piza hiyo.

src: They are making a loud tapping sound when he types on his computer.
mt: Wanaongea kwa sauti kubwa wakati anatupa kwa kompyuta yake.
ref: Zilikuwa zikipiga sauti ya kudonoa alipokuwa akicharaza kwenye kompyuta yake.

src: So he searched all over his house for spare change.
mt: Kwa hiyo alishafurahia kote nyumba yake kwa madhara ya kipato.
ref: Kwa hivyo akatafuta nyumbani mwake salio la pesa.

src: Unfortunately security was taking forever.
mt: Kwa bahati mbaya usalama ulikuwa unakwenda kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya ukaguzi wa usalama ulikuwa ukichukua muda mrefu.

src: She makes from the peaches grown in the orchard.
mt: Anatoa kutoka kwa mabaka yaliyotengenezwa katika mabonde.
ref: Anatengeneza kutoka kwa pichi zinazokua katika shamba la matunda.

src: Although her love is strong, her tacos are not very good.
mt: Wakati wakati, upendo wake ni mkubwa, lakini taka zake ni bure.
ref: Ijapokuwa upendo wake ni wa thati, tacos zake si nzuri sana.

src: He decided to go to college and take art classes.
mt: Alisema atakapokwenda chuo kikuu na kufundisha sanaa.
ref: Akaamua kwenda chuo cha elimu na kusomea sanaa.

src: Jenny and her mom moved to a tiny apartment filled with roaches.
mt: Jenny na mama yake wakapata nyumba ndogo yenye wadudu.
ref: Jenny na mama yake wakahamia nyumba ndogo iliyojaa mende.

src: He had been trying for Years, but lacked initiative.
mt: Alikuwa anavyotafuta miaka mingi, lakini hakikuwa na ujuzi.
ref: Amekuwa akijaribu kwa Miaka, lakini alikosa ari.

src: One of the girls accidentally pushed the youngest girl into the pool.
mt: Moja kati ya watoto wa kike kwa hukumu akasababisha mwanamke mmoja kwa kutoa mwanamke mwingine katika baini.
ref: Mmoja wa wasichana hao akamsukuma yule mdogo ndani ya dimbwi kwa bahati mbaya.

src: She was cute so I called her over.
mt: Aliwaonyesha kujivua kwa hiyo nimepiga simu kwake.

src: But she has never driven in the rainy.
mt: Lakini hana kufanya kazi katika mvua.
ref: Lakini hajawahi kuendesha kukinyesha.

src: I included them in a small booklet.
mt: Nilinipa nyingine katika kitabu kidogo.
ref: Nilizijumuisha katika kijitabu.

src: He spotted a camera on sale for $5.
mt: Aliona kamera inayotoka kwa $5.
ref: Akaona kamera ikiuzwa kwa $5.

src: I loved it, loved it and breathed it.

mt: Alikaa kwa kasi na kushirikiana kwa timu.

src: It was not a happy occasion.
mt: Si siku ya furaha.
ref: Haikuwa hafla yenye furaha.

mt: Nilikuwa nimechukua kiti changu chini ya mti katika kasi na nikamwona nyota.

mt: Jim alikuwa na hasira lakini pamoja na hivyo alikuwa na umoja wa kuonyesha wote wakosefu.

src: She wanted to pay it off.
mt: Alitaka kubofya.
ref: Alitaka kulilipa.

mt: Baadaye alipata vitabu vichafu vya kawaida kwenye nyumba.

src: They sold a glass of lemonade for a quarter each.
mt: Walikwenda kwa kila kipande cha limau kwa kila mmoja.
ref: Waliuza glasi moja ya maji ya limau kwa senti ishirini na tano.

src: She put on her costume and ran out the door.
mt: Aliwakamata nguo yake na kufika nje ya kichwa.
ref: Akavaa mavazi yake na kukimbia mlangoni.

src: She decided to pack all her stuff and load her car and leave.
mt: Aliamua kubagatisha vyote vimevamo na kubagatisha gari lake na kuondoka.
ref: Kwa hivyo akaamua kufunganya vitu vyake vyote na kuvipakia kwenye gari lake na kuondoka.

src: It was very cold outside that morning and he felt terrible.
mt: Aliwa kama kawaida kwa joto kali kwenye mazingira ya asubuhi na alikuwa na ulemavu.
ref: Kulikuwa na baridi sana nje asubuhi hiyo na alikuwa akihisi vibaya.

src: The family got two pizzas one with no cheese.
mt: Kabila liliweza kupata mboga mbili moja bila kinywaji.
ref: Familia ikanunua piza mbili moja ikiwa haina jibini.

src: It was raining and everyone got soaked in the rain.
mt: Ilivyokuwa na mvua, wote wakapata mvua.
ref: Kulikuwa kukinyesha na kila mtu aliloa maji kwenye mvua.

src: He decided to travel to Oregon one day.
mt: Alisema atakapokwenda Oregon siku moja.
ref: Akaamua siku moja kusafiri kwenda Oregon.

src: The two guys played a friendly match.
mt: Wawili waliwakabiliwa na mchezo wa kujitolea.
ref: Wawili hao walicheza mchezo wa kirafiki.

src: Lary would work long hours every day in the mines.
mt: Lary alifanya kazi kwa muda mrefu kila siku katika mabati.
ref: Lary alifanya kazi kwa saa nyingi kila siku katika migodi.

src: He decided to trade it in and buy a new one.
mt: Alisema atakapata nje na kupata moja mpya.
ref: Akaamua kulilibadilisha na kununua nyingine jipya.

src: During the walk, his dog saw several other dogs.
mt: Wakati wa baraza, mbwa wake aliona mbwa mingine.
ref: Wakati wa matembezi, mbwa wake aliona mbwa wengine kadhaa.

src: His daughter just had her first baby and she had a girl.
mt: Mwanawe yake aliyekuwa na mwana wa kwanza alikuwa na mwanamke.
ref: Binti yake alikuwa amepata mtoto wake wa kwanza na alikuwa na msichana.

src: Five people were inside it.
mt: Wananchi wanne walikuwa ndani yake.
ref: Watu watano walikuwa ndani.

src: Not the kind for mail but the kind to stamp things with.
mt: Si aina ya barua bali aina ya kufanya stamp.
ref: Sio ile ya barua lakini ili ya kupiga muhuri nayo.

src: He found nothing, except some jelly.
mt: Alipata kile hakika, bali mafuta ya kawaida.
ref: Hakupata chochote, isipokuwa jeli kiasi.

src: She decided to make them herself.
mt: Aliamua kufanya wenyewe.
ref: Akaamua kujitengenezea mwenyewe.

src: Near the time of the race, he slipped on a run and damaged his knee.
mt: Kati ya wakati wa mashindano, alipata kipinduzi kwenye run na kudhuru miguu yake.
ref: Karibu na muda wa mbio hizo, alianguka akikimbia na kuharibu goti lake.

src: Susie called her grandma and asked her to send some.
mt: Susie alipiga baba yake na kumuomba aweze kuwasilisha kama vile.
ref: Susie alimpigia simu nyanya yake na kumwomba amtumie kadhaa.

src: After years of trying, they finally conceived a baby girl.
mt: Baada ya miaka mingi ya kushauriana, wakati mwao wote wakawa na mtoto mwanamke.
ref: Baada ya miaka nyingi ya kujaribu, mwishowe walipata mtoto msichana.

src: One day Mike moved his chair while he was standing.
mt: Juma moja Mike alimvuta kiti yake wakati alikuwa akifika.
ref: Siku moja Mke alisogeza kiti chake alipokuwa amesimama.

src: She decided to plan a garage sale.
mt: Aliamua kufanya mkutano wa kuuza vitu vya nyumba.
ref: Akaamua kupanga mauzo ya vitu.

src: It was an old, rickety, uninhabited house that was made for scares.
mt: Ilikuwa nyumba ya zamani, ya kawaida, isiyotumika, ambayo ilikuwa imejengwa kwa ajili ya kujitupa.
ref: Ilikuwa nyumba nzee, iliyolegea na isioishi mtu ambayo ilikuwa imeundwa kutisha.

src: She decides to take a month away from work and only make biscuits.
mt: Anamchukua miezi miwili kutoka kazi na kufanya tu kwa sasa kwa kufanya kifuniko.
ref: Akaamua kupumzika mwezi mzima kutoka kazini na kutengeneza biskuti pekee.

src: One day Lucy's mom was very upset.
mt: Leo mmoja Lucy's mama alikuwa na shida.
ref: Siku moja mama ya Lucy alikuwa amekasirika sana.

src: He prepared a big meal for them.
mt: Alifanya chakula kikubwa kwa wao.
ref: Akandaa chakula kikubwa kwa ajili yao.

src: He started vlogging.
mt: Alianza kutumia vlog.
ref: Akaanza blogu ya video.

src: There was a truck with a horse in the cage.
mt: Kuna gari la kipande na ng’ombe katika kambi.
ref: Kulikuwa na lori lenye farasi ndani ya kizimba.

src: They were the first ones inside the restaurant.
mt: Walikuwa wakifika kwanza ndani ya restorani.
ref: Walikuwa wa kwanza ndani ya mkahawa huo.

src: He had went to the store with her and helped her pick out scents.
mt: Alifika duka pamoja naye na kutusaidia kupanga rangi.
ref: Alikuwa ameenda dukani na yeye na kumsaidia kuchagua uturi.

src: After finally picking one out I took it home.
mt: Baada ya kuchagua nyingi nimepata moja niliitupa nyumbani.
ref: baadaye nilichukua moja na kuipeleka nyumbani.

src: He did poorly at first, and he fell off a lot.
mt: Alifanya vibaya kwanza, na alipotea kwa kiasi kikubwa.
ref: Mwanzo alifanya vibaya, na alianguka sana.

src: Wilson showed Ben how to make compost with grass and leaves.
mt: Wilson alifundisha Ben kwa njia ya kutengeneza mchakacho kwa mchanga na majani.
ref: Wilson alimwonyesha Ben jinsi ya kutengeneza mbolea na nyasi na matawi.

src: There was nothing in his fridge to eat.
mt: Hakuna kitu katika chombo chake cha kula kula.
ref: Hakukuwa na chochote ndani ya friji yake kula.

src: Everyone brought something along to eat.
mt: Wote walikuwa na vitu vyao kwa kula.
ref: Kila mtu alileta kitu cha kula.

src: She decided to have a party at her apartment.
mt: Aliamua kufanya kipindi cha kusherehekea katika nyumba yake.
ref: Akaamua kuwa na sherehe kwenye nyumba yake.

src: He set it up and waited for the geese to fly by.
mt: Alifanya kazi na kuwachukia kwa wakati wakati wabega wakifika.
ref: Akaiweka na kusubiri bata bukini kupaa.

src: However, now she has been promoted to manager.
mt: Lakini sasa amepewa kiti cha meneja.
ref: Hata hivyo, amepandishwa cheo sasa hadi meneja.

src: She loved peacefully rowing the canoe before anyone else was awake.
mt: Alihangaika ambae alikuwa akifurahia kufurudia kwa kanzu kabla ya mtu yeyote kuwepo.
ref: Alipenda kupiga makasi kwa amani kabla mtu yeyote kuamka.

src: She always did her best and often worked overtime.
mt: Aliyezidi kila mara na mara kwa kazi.
ref: Alifanya kadri awezavyo na mara kwa mara alifanya kazi kwa muda wa ziada.

src: He was small, even for a chihuahua, but he loved food.
mt: Alikuwa mdogo, hasa kwa chihuahua, lakini alivuta chakula.
ref: Alikuwa mdogo, hata kwa chihuahua, lakini alipenda chakula.

mt: Mwanaume huyu alitupwa na mkuu wake Cara kwa kutoa wengi kwenye kipindi cha kazi.
ref: Bosi wake Cara alikuwa amemshutumu kwa kuwaweka watu wengi sana kwenye zamu.

src: She decided to visit the mountain cabin.
mt: Aliamua kufika katika nyumba ya mlima.
ref: Akaamua kutembelea kibanda cha mlimani.

src: She told her friend the hardest thing is communicating with strangers.
mt: Alisema kwa mpenzi wake kile kimoja kina kujitokeza ni kueleza mambo kwa wageni.
ref: Alimwambia rafiki yake kwamba jambo ngumu kabisa ni kuwasiliana na wageni.

src: Fancy turned 14 Year's old yesterday.
mt: Fancy alipata miaka 14 iliyopita.
ref: Fancy alifikisha umri wa miaka 14 jana.

src: But he thought keeping an first aid kit was unnecessary.
mt: Lakini alitaka kuwa bila kituo cha dharura cha kwanza.

src: He packed himself a lunch in a basket.
mt: Alipanga chakula chake kwa kibati.
ref: Akajipakia chakula cha mchana ndani ya kikapu.

src: They named her Joy.
mt: Wanaita Joy.
ref: Walimpa jina la Joy.

src: He decided to steal the gum from the store.
mt: Alisema kuchukua gumu kutoka kwa duka.

ref: alikuwa akijiandaa kucheza mchezo alipogundua alisahau pochi lake.

ref: Alitembea kuona mandhari.

src: She went to the store and purchased a flat iron straightener.
mt: Alienda kwenye duka na kupata kipande cha chuma cha kuchimba.
ref: Alienda dukani na kununua kilainisha nywele.

src: We go there together all the time and it's always amazing.
mt: Kila mara tunapokwenda huko pamoja ni mara tu na ni jambo la kushangaza.
ref: Sisi huenda hapo pamoja kila wakati na huwa ni pazuri sana.

src: He had never gotten shot before, it made him think about life.
mt: Ali hata siku moja alipata kila, ilimfanya akielewa maisha.
ref: Hakuwa amewahi kupigwa risasi tena, na ilimfanya afikirie kuhusu maisha.

src: Doug taught Tracy how to feel love again.
mt: Doug alimwonyesha Tracy jinsi ya kuona upendo tena.
ref: Doug alimfunza Tracy jinsi inavyohisi kupenda tena.

src: He wanted a new book but had no idea what to get.
mt: Alitaka kitabu kipya lakini hakujua nini kuchukua.
ref: Alitaka kitabu kipya lakini hakujua achukue kipi.

src: He thought the Irish capital was lively and friendly.
mt: Alimwamini mji wa Dublin ni kifurushi na rafiki.
ref: Alifikiria mji huo mkuu wa Kiarishi ulikuwa na shughuli na mzuri.

src: He and his girlfriend spent hours laying in the sand, getting sun.
mt: Alifanya na mpenzi wake saa nyingi kwenye barafu, kupata mawingu.
ref: Yeye na mpenzi wake walichukua saa kadhaa wakilala mchangani, wakiota jua.

src: My friend had a flat tired and was stuck in the middle of the road.
mt: Rafiki yangu alikuwa na kipande cha kichwa na alikuwa akifika katika kati ya barabara.

src: He hit the ball over the net and scored a point.
mt: Alipiga mpira juu ya neti na kushinda point.

src: He goes to the local store and buys a diary.

src: The gathered in the kitchen and prepared pizza.
mt: Waliangusha katika chumba cha kuchoma na kuchapisha pizza.

src: It's fun to play but honestly it's so boring to watch.
mt: Inafaa kucheza lakini kweli ni kujisikia sana kuchukua.

src: Even late at night.
mt: Kama ilivyokuwa baada ya usiku.

mt: Alimwagia saa moja tu kwa ajili ya kupata kofia mpya aliyotaka.

mt: Alivyopenda kufika wakati, alikuwa anavyotembea kwa kubeba kwa wingi.

src: The first day of band she told the teacher so.
mt: Jumanne alisema mwalimu kwamba alikuwa na kundi la muziki.
ref: Siku ya kwanza ya bendi, alimwambia mwalimu hivyo.

src: He looked through the whole aisle but could not decide on a fruit.
mt: Alipiga kwa macho kote kwa kifua, lakini hakutambua chochote.

mt: Aliona wanyama wengi, kama vile simba.

src: She practiced all day at home.
mt: Aliwaza kila siku nyumbani.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi siku nzima nyumbani.

src: Her team wasn't doing very well.
mt: Kikundi chake hakikuridhika sana.

src: She was suffering from crippling anxiety.
mt: Alitokana na ukatili wa wasiwasi.
ref: Alikuwa akisumbuliwa na wasiwasi wa kudhoofisha sana.

src: He was terrified!
mt: Alimwambia kwa nguvu!

mt: Kwa muda mfupi, Blue Belle ilikuwa na kipindi cha kutumia tena na kufutwa kwa kutengeneza.

src: But he entered the talent show hoping to win the grand prize.
mt: Lakini alikuwa anatarajia kushinda tuzo kubwa.

src: His mom makes him go.

src: They tell him he needs to clean his laundry pretty soon.

src: The first time she took it, she did not get a good enough score.

src: She immediately went and put her feet in.
mt: Aliwachukia kwanza na kufuata kwa kipimo.

src: However, he found putting the worms on the hook to be disgusting.

src: Amelia's friend had set her up on a blind date a week prior.

src: The boy was scared and refused.

src: He got so engrossed in it, he forgot to keep the fire going.

src: She had a short list of items to buy.
mt: Alikuwa na orodha ya vitu vichache kwa kupata.

src: He took his new skateboard to the park to show it off to his friends.

src: It was mid August and classes were beginning soon.

src: But he was told the spicier food was in Szechuan province.

src: My teacher told me to wake up since no sleeping was aloud.

mt: Jana jioni nilikuwa na nafasi kubwa kwa kufurahia mchezo mpya wa televisheni.

mt: Alisema atakae kila siku kutafakari maisha yake.

ref: Akavaa kofia yake ngumu, akachukua vifaa vyake na kutembea hadi kituo hicho.

ref: Hata hivyo Trent alichukia kupiga kambi.

ref: Akapata TV nzuri sana ambayo alitaka na akaenda kuichukua.

src: He thought it was punk and cool.
mt: Alimwamini kuwa ni punk na kama vile.
ref: Alifikiria ilikuwa ni uhuni na nzuri.

src: She posted on Facebook, hoping somebody would see.
mt: Aliposti kwenye Facebook, akilalamikia mtu atakayeona.
ref: Alichapisha kwenye Facebook, akitarajia mtu ataona.

src: When he woke up, he went to put his shoes on.
mt: Alipokwama, alikuwa anataka kufanya kipaji.
ref: Alipoamka, alienda kuvaa viatu vyake.

src: She made it through the nine months of pregnancy.
mt: Aliweza kufika katika miezi sita ya ujauzito.
ref: Alitoboa miezi tisa za ujauzito.

src: He takes it to the beach every weekend.
mt: Anatupa katika pwani kila wiki.
ref: Alikibeba kwenda ufuoni kila wikendi.

src: My sister encouraged me to bike her kid to school.
mt: Jamaa yangu alimwajibika kwa kubika mtoto wake kwa kipindi cha shule.
ref: Dada yangu alinihimiza kumbemba mtoto wake kwa baisikeli kwenda shuleni.

src: She drove out to meet them at a restaurant.
mt: Alienda kwa gari kwa ajili ya kuwasaidia wakati wao wakifika katika restoranti.
ref: Aliendesha gari kwenda kukutana nao mkahawani.

src: We looked at puppies and kittens in their cages.
mt: Tulipata kwa macho wadudu na wadudu wadogo wao katika kambi.
ref: Tuliwaangalia watoto wa mbwa na paka katika vizimba vyao.

src: Today was his wedding day and he already felt the butterflies.
mt: Leo ndipo alikuwa na siku ya ndoa na alikuwa na mabatili.
ref: Leo ilikuwa ni siku ya harusi yake na alikuwa tayari anahisi tumbojoto.

src: He decided to move to Cozumel.
mt: Alifanya kujitenga na Cozumel.
ref: Akaamua kuhamia Cozumel.

src: She asked a recruiter about it.
mt: Aliwataka mwakilishi kuhusu hicho.
ref: Akauliza mwajiri kuihusu.

src: She only knew 2 people in the whole school.
mt: Aliyekuwa na jina lake ni mmoja tu kati ya watu wote wa shule.
ref: Aliwajua watu 2 pekee katika shule nzima.

src: The plane was very big, I was scared.
mt: Jengo hilo lilikuwa kubwa sana, nilikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Ndege hiyo ilikuwa kubwa sana, niliogopa.

src: He looked online at different hats.
mt: Alisoma kwenye mtandao kuhusu vyeti vya kichwa.
ref: Aliangalia kofia tofauti mtandaoni.

src: They noticed that they may not have enough to pay for it.
mt: Wakajua kwamba wao hawawezi kujitayarisha kwa kiasi hicho.
ref: Waligundua kwamba hawana pesa za kutosha za kuilipia.

src: But she couldn't find her slippers.
mt: Lakini alikosa kipande cha kipande.
ref: Lakini hakuweza kupata sapatu zake.

src: He could not wait to see all the culture there!
mt: Alitaka kufika pale kwa sababu alikuwa na hamu ya kuona sana sana.
ref: Hangesubiri kuona utamaduni wote hapo!

src: She worked very hard in school and thought she deserved a reward.
mt: Ali kazi kwa kasi katika shule na alitaka kupata ufadhili.
ref: Alifanya kazi kwa bidii sana shuleni na akafikiria anastahili zawadi.

src: He could not find a good outfit to wear for his trip to the park!
mt: Alitokana kwa kile kitu kile cha kufanya kwa safari yake kwenye mazingira.
ref: Hangeweza kupata nguo nzuri za kuvaa kwa safari yake ya kwenda bustani!

src: She needed to clean her room before the delivery men arrived.
mt: Alihitajika kuchimba chakula kabla ya walinzi wakapanda.
ref: Alitaka kusafisha chumba chake kabla ya watu wa kuwasilisha kufika.

src: They did not know how to teach the students.
mt: Wakajua haki ya kusoma.
ref: Hawakujua jinsi ya kuwafunza wanafunzi.

src: He followed her home one day.
mt: Alifuatana nyumbani mmoja siku.
ref: Alimfuata nyumbani siku moja.

src: He took a tour to see the Great Pyramids.
mt: Alifika kwa safari kuona Mabatilifu Makubwa.
ref: Akaenda safari ya kuona Piramidi Kuu.

src: She only meant to leave it in for about 5 minutes, not nearly an hour.
mt: Alitaka kubaki kwa dakika 5 tu, si dakika 60.
ref: Alitaka kuiwacha kwa dakika 5 hivi, sio karibu saa nzima.

src: All Doug wanted was a white Christmas.
mt: Doug alitaka tu siku ya Krismasi ya weupe.
ref: Alichotaka Doug tu ni Krisimasi ya Theluji.

src: Her family told her she worked a boring job.
mt: Wazazi wake walimwambia kwamba kazi yake ilikuwa ya kujifungua.
ref: Familia yake ilimwambia alikuwa anafanya kazi inayochosha.

src: His clock showed it was 10 am.
mt: Kilele chake cha saa ilikuwa ni 10 am.
ref: Saa yake ilionyesha ilikuwa ni saa 10 am.

src: His wife told all her friends she hadn't known he was ill.
mt: Mke wake alisema kwa wenzake wote kwamba haikujua kwamba alikuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: Mke wake aliwaambia marafiki wake wote hakujua alikuwa mgonjwa.

src: Her baby is about to become born.
mt: Jike yake ni kama kujifungua.
ref: Mtoto wake alikuwa karibu kuzaliwa.

src: We went to the pet store on Saturday.
mt: Kwenda duka la wanyama wadogo jumamosi.
ref: Tulienda kwenye duka la wanyama vipenzi Jumamosi.

src: She got As all the time.
mt: Aliweza kufika As kila wakati.
ref: Alipata A kila wakati.

src: They searched for apartments online for weeks.
mt: Walifanya uchunguzi kwa wiki kadhaa kwa ajili ya nyumba za kubeba.
ref: Walitafuta nyumba za ghorofa mtandaoni kwa wiki kadhaa.

src: She wanted to throw a birthday party.
mt: Alitaka kutoa shamba la kila mwaka.
ref: Alitaka kuweka sherehe ya siku ya kuzaliwa.

src: Her wedding was tomorrow, and it was an outdoor ceremony.
mt: Ukumbukumbu wake ni kufuata kesho, na ni kifungo cha kawaida.
ref: Harusi yake ilikuwa kesho, na ilikuwa sherehe ya nje.

src: She had been very good all year.
mt: Aliwahi kuwa mwenye kipaji kwa mwaka mzima.
ref: Alikuwa mzuri sana mwaka mzima.

src: She went outside to harvest.
mt: Alienda nje kwa ajili ya kupata.
ref: Alienda nje kuvuna.

src: She was disgusted by the thought of putting her hand in to pull it out.
mt: Aliwaza kwa hofu ya kuchukua mkono wake ili kuchukua.
ref: Alichukizwa na wazo la kuweka mkono wake ndani ili kuitoa.

src: After her first piano lesson, Hannah felt discouraged.
mt: Baada ya leseni ya piano yake ya kwanza, Hannah alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Baada ya somo lake la kwanza la piano, Hannah alihisi kufa moyo.

src: He had a great job, impressive house, and paid for all their dates.
mt: Alitaka kazi nzuri, nyumba nzuri, na alitupa kila tukio.
ref: Alikuwa na kazi nzuri, nyumba ya kupendeza, na alilipia mikutano yao yote.

src: He sent his dog into the pasture to round up the sheep.
mt: Alimwajibisha mbwa wake kufika katika mazingira ya kuchoma nyumbani ili kuchoma nyama.
ref: Akatuma mbwa wake malishoni kuwazunguka kondoo.

src: He met a nice lady at bingo and became friendly with her.
mt: Alifika na dada mwenye uwezo wa kujifunza na kuwa rafiki naye.
ref: Akakutana na mwanamke mzuri katika bingo na akawa mzuri kwake.

src: She put her face down to avoid the harsh wind coming towards her face.
mt: Aliwaza kwa macho yake kwa sababu angeweza kupata anga mchafu.
ref: Akaangalia chini ili kuepuka upepo mkali uliokuwa ukipiga uso wake.

src: I picked my numbers from our family's bible.
mt: Nilichagua namba zangu kutoka kitabu cha familia yetu.
ref: Nilichagua nambari zangu kutoka kwa biblia yetu ya familia.

src: She has a test next week about Photosynthesis.
mt: Anayeenda kwa ujumbe wake wa kufanya ujuzi juu ya kuzalisha.
ref: Ana mtihani wiki ijayo kuhusu Usanisinuru.

src: I could barely sleep the week before my start date.
mt: Nilikuwa na shida sana kuuliza wiki iliyopita kabla ya tarehe yangu ya kuanza.
ref: Nilishindwa kulala kwa wiki kabla ya tarehe yangu ya kuanza.

src: Mike greeted Ben, and they went to play in Mike's room.
mt: Mike aligusa Ben, na wakati mmoja wakapiga kama wanaume.
ref: Mike alimsalimia Ben, na walienda kucheza katika chumba cha Mike.

src: The waiter printed out the bill and slipped it on the table.
mt: Kabla ya kufanya hivyo, kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kutoka kwa kibanda cha kawaida cha kuchapisha fomu ya kifungo kilichopatikana kut
ref: Mhudumu akachapisha bili na kuiweka mezani.

src: She sadly packed her things and drove to her mom's house.
mt: Aliwahuzunika na kufunga vitu vyake na kufika nyumbani kwa mama yake.
ref: Kwa huzuni alifunganya vitu vyake na kuendesha hadi kwa nyumba ya mama yake.

src: They brought their families too.
mt: Wao wakawaua familia zao pia.
ref: Walienda na familia zao pia.

src: His friends told him it was very tough to meet a movie star.
mt: Wapenzi wake walimwambia kwamba ni vigumu sana kujifungua na binti wa filamu.
ref: Marafiki wake walimwambia ilikuwa ni vigumu sana kukutana na mwigizaji mashuhuri wa sinema.

src: I did not know how to swim in deep water.
mt: Nilikuwa si nimejua kutembea katika maji ya juu.
ref: Sikujua jinsi ya kuogelea katika maji yenye kina kirefu.

src: They were afraid she had gotten outside and gotten lost.
mt: Walikuwa wakiongoza kwamba alikuwa amekwenda nje na kushindwa.
ref: Waliohofia alikuwa ametoka nje na akapotea.

src: She visited many European countries and met a lot of people.
mt: Alienda nchi nyingi za Ulaya na kujadili na watu wengi.
ref: Alitembelea nchi nyingi za Ulaya na kukutana na watu wengi.

src: It was part of her new year's resolution to be healthier.
mt: Iliongeza kama moja ya mapendekezo yake ya mwaka mpya kwa kuwa na afya bora zaidi.
ref: Ilikuwa sehemu ya azimio lake la mwaka mpya la kuwa mwenye afya.

src: Ted's friends kept asking him to get in the water with them.
mt: Wapenzi wa Ted walikuwa wakikusudia kwa kawaida kwamba Ted awe katika maji pamoja naye.
ref: Marafiki wa Ted walishinda wakimwomba aingie ndani ya maji pamoja nao.

src: She said yes.
mt: Alisema neno hilo.
ref: Akasema ndiyo.

src: I heard the zoo had sloths, and I had always wanted to see them.
mt: Nilijua ziwani kuna kipenzi, na nilikuwa na hamu ya kuona.
ref: Nilisikia bustani hiyo ya wanyama ilikuwa na slothi, na nimekuwa nikitaka sana kuwaona.

src: He works on a cure for the disease in his lab.
mt: Anafanya kazi katika lab kwa ajili ya dawa ya magonjwa.
ref: Akatafuta tiba ya ugonjwa huo katika maabara yake.

src: The boys played with blocks and trucks and teddy bears.
mt: Wanaume walicheza na madhara na gari na wanyama wadogo.
ref: Wavulana hao walicheza na bloku na magari na dubu waliofumwa.

src: For New Year's she made a resolution to start exercising.
mt: Kwa siku ya mwaka mpya aliamua kuanza kufanya mazoezi.
ref: Kwa Mwaka Mpya aliweka azimio la kuanza kufanya mazoezi.

src: India decided to make her own Iced Coffee at home.
mt: India aliamua kufanya kwa nyumbani kwa ajili yake.
ref: India akaamua kutengeneza Kahawa yake mwenyewe ya Barafu nyumbani.

src: Betsy was so sad and disappointed because she really wanted a pet.
mt: Betty alikuwa na hasira na kukosa nia kwa sababu alikuwa na hamu ya kujua pet.
ref: Betsy alihuzunika sana na kutamaushwa kwa sababu alitaka sana mnyama-kipenzi.

src: She studies very hard to become an expert in Biology.
mt: Anafundisha kwa kasi sana ili kuwa mtuhumiwa mwenye uwezo katika Biolojia.
ref: Alisoma kwa bidii sana ili kuwa mtaalamu katika Biolojia.

src: She decided she wanted to try building a table by herself.
mt: Aliamua kujitambua kujenga meza bila msaada.
ref: Akaamua anataka kujaribu kujitengenezea meza mwenyewe.

src: The came upon a grave with chains.
mt: Wakapata kaburi na kifungo.
ref: Wakaona kaburi lenye minyororo.

src: They took their cars to the salt flats in Utah.
mt: Walifika salini za Utah.
ref: Wakapeleka magari yao kwenye nchi tambare kule Utah.

src: She loved walking through the woods.
mt: Aliwahitaji kuwinda kwa mawimbi.
ref: Alipenda kutembea msituni.

src: He didn't realize she had been playing golf since she was a child.
mt: Alisahau kuwa alikuwa anacheza golf tangu alikuwa mtoto.
ref: Hakugundua amekuwa akicheza gofu tangu alikuwa mtoto.

src: While cooking for us at our house he decided to show off a bit.
mt: Kwa sasa anatunyanyua kwa kujifungua kwa kujifungua.
ref: Alipokuwa akitupikia nyumbani mwetu akaamua kujigamba kidogo.

src: She was excited until she found out she would no longer be the baby.
mt: Aliwa na furaha mpaka alijua kuwa sasa hivi hawezi kuwa mtoto.
ref: Alisisimka hadi alipogundua hatakuwa mtoto wa pekee tena.

src: I went to go hike away from the campsite by myself.
mt: Nilikuja kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitahidi kufika kwa kujitah
ref: Nilitaka kwenda kutembea kivyangu mbali na eneo la kupiga kambi.

src: However she forgot to bring her running shoes.
mt: Aliwahi kupoteza viatu vya kandarasi.
ref: Hata hivyo alisahau kubeba viatu vyake vya kukimbia.

src: Jim looked closely at the metal and saw that it looked like jewelry.
mt: Jim alimkamata kwa karibu kwa metali na kuona kwamba ilikuwa kama zana za kifahari.
ref: Jim akaangalia chuma hicho kwa karibu na kuona kilifanana na kito.

src: They sat down together in front of their pies.
mt: Wakati wao wakae pamoja kando ya pia zao.
ref: Walikaa pamoja mbele ya pai zao.

src: He suddenly felt very dizzy and fell down.
mt: Alipokwenda kwa kasi sana na kushindwa.
ref: Kwa ghafla akaanza kuhisi kizunguzungu na kuanguka chini.

src: So she gathered her young children up and went to the store.
mt: Kwa hivyo alikusanya watoto wake wadogo na kujikuta katika duka.
ref: Kwa hivyo akawakusanya watoto wake wadogo na kwenda dukani.

src: He has great ideas to debate with but he is scared of public speaking.
mt: Anayeona mawazo mengi kwa kushughulikia lakini anashtakiwa kwa kuongea kwa umma.
ref: Ana dhana nzuri za kujadiliana lakini anaogopa kuongea mbele ya watu.

src: It was very hot.
mt: Ilivyokuwa kama kawaida.
ref: Kulikuwa na joto sana.

src: She would paint everyday after class.
mt: Aliyepanda kila siku baada ya kazi.
ref: Angechora kila siku baada ya darasa.

src: He started training to become a boxer in his spare time.
mt: Alianza kujitunza kufanya michezo ya kati.
ref: Akaanza kufanya mazoezi ili kuwa mwanadondia wakati wake wa mapumziko.

src: So we decided to take a fun trip to Great Wolf Lodge.
mt: Kwa hiyo tulikubali kufanya safari ya kujifunua kwa kuzunguka Great Wolf Lodge.
ref: Kwa hivyo tukaamua kwenda safari kule Great Wolf Lodge.

src: Next to him was a tall gentleman.
mt: Japo kwa wakati huo, kando yake alikuwa mwanamume mwenye kipindi.
ref: Kando yake kulikuwa na bwana mrefu.

src: The doctor told her she needed to lose 10 more.
mt: Wakati wa kuzungumza na daktari, alimwambia anahitaji kushika 10 zaidi.
ref: Daktari alimwambia anapaswa kupoteza 10 zaidi.

src: Jenny texted even while she was driving.
mt: Jenny alitumia simu ya kawaida wakati anavyoendesha.
ref: Jenny alituma ujumbe hata wakati anaendesha gari.

src: She went to the dealership and selected the perfect one.
mt: Alienda kwa wakala na kupata mmoja wa kutosha.
ref: Alienda dukani na kuchagua iliyomfaa.

src: He puttered into the garage.
mt: Alifika katika gari la kuchimba.
ref: Akaipeleka gereji.

src: The lump started to move, then emitted little cries.
mt: Kile kilianza kuchipuka, halafu kutoa saa za chini.
ref: Donge hilo lilianza kusonga, kisha milio midogo.

src: Don was angry and embarrassed at being exposed in this way.
mt: Don alikuwa na hasira na hofu kwa kuwa alipatikana kwa njia hii.
ref: Don alikasirika na kuabika kwa kufichuliwa kwa njia hii.

src: I panicked.
mt: Nilikuwa na shida.
ref: Nilishtuka.

src: He drew horns on my membership picture and flirted wildly.
mt: Alimtia mabwawa kwenye picha yangu ya ushirika na kufurahia kwa kasi.
ref: Alichora pembe kwenye picha yangu ya uanachama na akaonyesha mapenzi sana.

src: And she ordered hot soup.
mt: Na alimfurahisha chakula cha kawaida.
ref: Naye akaagiza mchuzi moto.

src: She usually avoids backstroke because doesn't want water in her ears.
mt: Anapendelea kushika mawimbi kwa kawaida kwa sababu hataki maji yake kwenye vidole.
ref: Kawaida huepuka kuogelea kinyumenyume kwa sababu hataki maji masikioni mwake.

src: It wasn't far from my house, only a few miles!
mt: Si kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo, kama kifungo,
ref: Haikuwa mbali na nyumba yangu, maili chache tu!

src: When her friend's mother served it, she knew she had to eat it.
mt: Alipokuwa akijifungua kwa mke wa rafiki yake, alijua alitakiwa kula.
ref: Mama wa rafiki yake alipoipakua, alijua lazima ale.

src: It was very elegant.
mt: Ilivyokuwa kama kile.
ref: Ilikuwa ya kifahari sana.

src: He decided to go off the grid.
mt: Alisema atakapokuwa kwenye kifungo.
ref: Akaamua kuishi bila kutegemea umeme.

src: His car battery was struggling to start the car.
mt: Bara yake ya gari ilikuwa inakosa nguvu ya kuanza gari.
ref: Betri yake ya gari ilikuwa inashindwa kuwasha gari.

src: She feared it'd be expensive.
mt: Alimwamini kuwa itakuwa ghali.
ref: Akaogopa itakuwa ghali.

src: She found out her company wanted her to retire.
mt: Alijua kwamba kampuni yake inataka ajiuzulu.
ref: Aligundua kampuni yake ilimtaka astaafu.

src: She had lost ten games in a row!
mt: Aliwahi kushindwa kwa kipindi cha kumi!
ref: Alikuwa amepoteza michezo kumi mfululizo!

src: She was incredibly nervous.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kubwa.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kabisa.

src: He admired the beautiful design of it.
mt: Alimwamini ujenzi mzuri wa kitu hicho.
ref: Alitazama na kupendezwa na muundo wake mzuri.

src: Mark's mother brought out a sponge ball to them.
mt: Mama ya Mark alitoka na bila ya mabanda kwa wanao.
ref: Mama ya Mark akawaletea mpira wa sifongo.

src: The first day, he met Sam playing soccer.
mt: Jumanne, alijua Sam anayecheza mpira.
ref: Siku ya kwanza, alikutana na Sam akicheza soka.

src: Vince did not want his usual dessert of ice cream.
mt: Vince hakuwa na nia ya kula kwa kawaida kwa kifungua.
ref: Vince hakutaka kitandamlo chake cha kawaida cha aiskrimu.

src: He hung out in the school gym watching the team practice.
mt: Alifika katika baraza la shule kwa ajili ya kufurahia timu ya shule kushiriki mashindano.
ref: Alizurura kwenye ukumbi wa mazoezi ya shule akiangalia timu ikifanya mazoezi.

src: Ashamed, he sat on the road to panhandle.
mt: Kwa heshima, alikuwa amekaa barabara kwa ajili ya kupata fedha.
ref: Kwa aibu, alikaa barabarani kuomba.

src: He thought they were good for the planet.
mt: Alimwamini kwamba ni bora kwa dunia.
ref: Alifikiriai walikuwa wazuri kwa sayari.

src: It's not something we normally do.
mt: Si kitu ambacho tunavyofanya kwa kawaida.
ref: Siyo kitu ambacho tunafanya kwa kawaida.

src: He got to know the attractive barista.
mt: Alijua barista mwenye upeo.
ref: Alipata kujuana na mhudumu aliyevutia.

src: She wandered around thinking about what she wanted to eat.
mt: Aliwahiangalia kwa kujifunza kama anataka kula nini.
ref: Alitembea huku na huku akiwaza kuhusu kile anataka kula.

src: Jenny answered and walked outside to the car.
mt: Jenny alijibu na akapita nje kwa gari.
ref: Jenny alijibu na akatoka nje kuelekea kwenye gari.

src: To celebrate, i went mudding.
mt: Kutukana, nilipiga kwa mchanga.
ref: Ili kusherehekea, nilienda matopeni.

src: As Peter entered the arena it was full of thousands of people.
mt: Kama Peter alingia katika mji uliopakana na wakazi wengi.
ref: Peter alipoingia uwanjani, ulikuwa umejaa maelfu ya watu.

src: The researcher was impressed by Josh's stories.
mt: Watafiti alijaribu kwa kauli za Josh.
ref: Mtafiti huyo alifurahishwa na hadithi za Josh.

src: However, he was too embarrassed to upload any videos.
mt: Lakini alikuwa na hofu kubwa kwa kuchapisha video hizo.
ref: Walakini, alikuwa na haya sana kupakia video yoyote.

src: A stranger approached me to ask for change.
mt: Rafiki alimwambia nimekuwa na muda wa kujitolea.
ref: Mtu nisiyemjua alinijia kuomba chenji.

src: They wanted to go inside.
mt: Walisema wanaenda ndani.
ref: Walitaka kuingia ndani.

src: She swam across the whole lake and to the raft on the other side.
mt: Aliwinda kwa kujipamba kote mto na kuelekea kwenye kifaru chini ya barabara.
ref: Aliogelea ziwa lote na kwa chelezo upande mwingine.

src: It was the same brand of bike he'd owned himself as a boy.
mt: Alitumia jina hilo kama vile alivyotumia kama mtoto.
ref: Ilikuwa ni chapa sawa ya baiskeli aliyokuwa akimiliki akiwa kijana.

src: After school she waited for jack outside of the front door.
mt: Baada ya shule alimwamini jack kwa muda kwenye pumbwa ya kwanza.
ref: Baada ya shule alimsubiri jack nje ya mlango wa mbele.

src: They dared him to go into the haunted house.
mt: Wakawazwa kufika katika nyumba ya wanyama.
ref: Walimthubutu aingie kwenye nyumba yenye majini.

src: She wanted her girl to have pierced ears.
mt: Alitaka mtoto wake awe na mabavu ya kichwa.
ref: Alitaka msichana wake awe na masikio yaliyotobolewa.

src: She went and bought her a dozen red roses.
mt: Alienda na kupata duka duka za mafungo ya nyekundu.
ref: Alienda akamnunulia maua nyingi ya waridi ya rangi nyekundu.

src: I had the money to buy them, I just didn't.
mt: Nilikuwa na pesa kwa kuwapa, nilikuwa na nia tu.
ref: Nilikuwa na pesa za kuzinunua, sikununua tu.

src: Now seventeen Year's old he still had not hit a homerun.
mt: Sasa amekuwa na miaka kumi na saba, bado hajakwenda kwa kufunga.
ref: Sasa akiwa na umri wa miaka kumi na saba bado hakuwa amepata alama zozote.

src: She had a massive party with her friends.
mt: Aliwaingiza na wenzake.
ref: Alikuwa na sherehe kubwa na marafiki wake.

src: Darlene was looking for shelves in thrift stores for her new home.
mt: Darlene alikuwa anavyoangalia mabwawa ya kuzalisha kwa ajili ya nyumba yake mpya.
ref: Darlene alikuwa akitafuta rafu za nyumba yake mpya katika maduka ya kuuza bidhaa.

src: He took a gap year last year to work as a chef in Australia.
mt: Alifanya miaka ya kati mwaka uliopita kufanya kazi kama mchekeshaji nchini Australia.
ref: Aliacha shule mwaka jana kufanya kazi kama mpishi huko Australia.

src: I have been in search of the perfect dog for my family.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechafya kuuza mbwa wa kawaida kwa familia yangu.
ref: Nimekuwa nikitafuta mbwa mzuri wa familia yangu.

src: He called his mom and got her bread recipe.
mt: Alipiga simu kwa mama yake na kupata recipe ya kuharisha mboga.
ref: Akampigia mama yake simu na akampa mapishi yake ya mkate.

src: One of them was too obsessed.
mt: Moja yao alikuwa na uongozi mkubwa.
ref: Mmoja wao alikuwa na shauku sana.

src: He particularly loved frozen waffles.
mt: Alimwita wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu wafu w
ref: Alipenda sana keki ndogo zilizigandishwa.

src: As he climbed, his foot slipped and he fell to the ground.
mt: Kama alivyokuwa akifika, kipigo chake kilipinduliwa na kufika kwa ardhi.
ref: Alipokuwa akipanda, mguu wake uliteleza na akaanguka chini.

src: But there was a fly flying around his room.
mt: Lakini kuna nyoka anayemwangamia ndani yake.
ref: Lakini kulikuwa na nzi aliyekuwa akizunguka chumba chake.

src: We got together with drinks and started to play.
mt: Tulipasuka na pikipiki na kuanza kucheza.
ref: Tulikusanyika pamoja na vinywaji na tukaanza kucheza.

src: Her neighbors yelled for her to shut up.
mt: Wanavijiji wake wakamwambia awe na muda.
ref: Majirani wake walimpigia kelele anyamaze.

src: They wrote the script and hired the actors.
mt: Waliandika pendekezo na kuajiri wachunguzi.
ref: Waliandika muswada wa filamu na kuajiri waigizaji.

src: He was on his way to a new job interview.
mt: Alikuwa anapita kwa kujitambua kwa kazi mpya.
ref: Alikuwa akienda kwenye mahojiano ya kazi mpya.

src: Her parents told her no.
mt: Wazazi wake walimwambia harambee.
ref: Wazazi wake walimwambia hapana.

src: When it finally did she went to her shed and pulled out tons of boxes.
mt: Alipokwenda kwa mwaka alikuwa anapataa kufika kwa chumba chake na kutoka kwa kila kifaa.
ref: Hatimaye ilipofika alienda kwenye banda lake na akatoa tani za masanduku.

src: She also kept a healthy diet.
mt: Alifanya pia chakula kizuri.
ref: Pia alikula lishe bora.

src: Robert put in extra time and effort in his studies.
mt: Robert alifanya kazi za kutosha na kujitahidi zaidi katika masomo yake.
ref: Robert alitumia muda wa ziada na akaweka bidii katika masomo yake.

src: Suddenly he felt a strange bumping.
mt: Kisha kufika hapo, alipata kipinduzi cha ajabu.
ref: Ghafla alihisi mgongano usio wa kawaida.

src: She dedicates a Saturday to drive to an orchard.
mt: Anamwajibika kwa siku ya Jumamosi kufika katika kilimo cha mifugo.
ref: Hujitolea Jumamosi kuendesha gari kuelekea shamba ya matunda.

src: The weather forecast was calling for snow.
mt: Bara lilikuwa linaanza kwa mvua.
ref: Utabiri wa hali ya hewa ulikuwa unaonyesha theluji.

src: They thought that they were safe, so they let their guard down.
mt: Wakati wao walisema kuwa wamekosa, hivyo wakakataa kujitahidi.
ref: Walifikiri wako salama, kwa hivyo wakaacha kujilinda.

src: She sprayed a can of lysol all around the bed frame.
mt: Aliipuliza kanzu ya lysol kote kwenye mafuta ya kitanda.
ref: Alinyunyiza mkebe wa lysol kwenye fremu yote ya kitanda.

src: He noticed a small leather wallet in the grass.
mt: Aliona kituo cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida cha kisilaha cha kawaida
ref: Akaona mkoba mdogo wa ngozi kwenye nyasi.

src: He was learning to scuba dive.
mt: Alikuwa anafundishwa kufanya kazi za kuzunguka kwenye maji.
ref: Alikuwa anajifunza kuruka matumbwi.

src: I saw sad news that there were hostages in a venue.
mt: Niliona habari ya kuharibika kwamba kuna walezi katika mahali pa kuhudhuria.
ref: Niliona habari za kusikitisha kwamba kulikuwa watekwa nyara mahali hapo.

src: They were so far out, she could never reach them.
mt: Walikuwa kama wakati wote, alikuwa hata hata hakiwa kufika kwao.
ref: Yalikuwa mbali sana, hangeweza kuwafikia.

src: He chose the recipe calling for barbecuing the pork chops.
mt: Alibadilisha mchakato uliopendekezwa kwa kuzimba chupa za chomvu.
ref: Alichagua maagizo ya mapishi ya nyama ya nguruwe.

src: His clothes were soaked from running up and down the court.
mt: Kanzu yake ilikuwa imekauka kutokana na kufika na kufika kwenye kikao.
ref: Nguo zake zilikuwa zimelowa kutokana na kukimbia juu na chini ya uwanja.

src: She was expecting worse.
mt: Alimwamini zaidi.
ref: Alitarajia hali mbaya zaidi.

src: Cole was young and took it very seriously.
mt: Kole alikuwa mwenye umri mdogo na alifanya kazi kwa uangalifu.
ref: Cole alikuwa mchanga na aliichukulia kwa uzito sana.

src: Unfortunately, Mike had no idea where he should go.
mt: Kwa hakika Mike hakujui wapi alitakiwa kufika.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, Mike hakujua ni wapi anapaswa kwenda.

src: She didn't read the directions.
mt: Alisahau kusoma masharti.
ref: Hakusoma maelekezo.

src: In the lift line, we started talking to another couple.
mt: Katika barabara ya kubeba, tulianza kuongea na mpole mmoja.
ref: Katika mstari wa kuinua, tulianza kuzungumza na wanandoa wengine.

src: She considered getting rid of them, but knew she'd miss them too much.
mt: Aliwakiliana kwa kuacha, lakini alijua atakataa sana.
ref: Alifikiria kuwaondoa, lakini alijua atawakosa sana.

src: My brother bit into a slice that had a piece of gum on it.
mt: Jamaa yangu alifanya kula kipande kilicho na kipande cha gumu.
ref: Ndugu yangu aliuma kipande ambacho kilikuwa na ubani juu yake.

src: The young lady gave him a small muffin.
mt: Msichana mmoja alimwambia mwanamume mwingine kifungua chenye kiasi.
ref: Binti huyo alimpa mafin ndogo.

src: The only thing he didn't like about it was the color.
mt: Jambo lake tu alikuwa hakupenda kuhusu nia yake ilikuwa rangi.
ref: Kitu cha pekee ambacho hakupenda kulihusu kilikuwa rangi.

src: She often talks about long hours at work.
mt: Anasema mara nyingi kuhusu saa nyingi za kazi.
ref: Mara nyingi huzungumza kuhusu kufanya kazi kwa saa nyingi.

src: Out of nowhere, a man approached and stabbed him.
mt: Kutoka kwa mbele, mwanamume alipita na kudorora.
ref: Ghafla, mtu mmoja alimkaribia na akamdunga kisu.

src: He built it and set it all up outside himself.
mt: Alibuni na kubadilisha kote nje yake.
ref: Aliijenga na akaweka yote nje mwenyewe.

src: He looked up at the sky to see countless snowflakes.
mt: Alipiga kichwa chake, akafika kwenye anga, akakuta mila ya barafu.
ref: Alitazama juu angani kuona chembe nyingi za theluji.

src: He was having a tough time learning all of the material.
mt: Alikuwa na maswali mengi kuhusu kujifunza kila kitu.
ref: Alikuwa na wakati mgumu kujifunza nyenzo zote.

src: He had one package with a mysterious address.
mt: Alikuwa na pakiti moja na kiwango kisichojulikana.
ref: Alikuwa na kifurushi kimoja chenye anwani ya ajabu.

src: She went to the nail salon near her job.
mt: Alienda kwa salon ya kifua kando ya kazi yake.
ref: Akaenda kwenye saluni ya kucha karibu na kazi yake.

src: John's family owns a boat, so they took a ride.
mt: Kabila la John lina chuma, hivyo wakati wa kufika wakarudi kwa chuma.
ref: Familia ya John inamiliki mashua, kwa hivyo walienda safari.

src: She asked for a footlong chicken sub.
mt: Aliomba sub ya kuku kwa kipande cha futi.
ref: Aliuliza sandwichi kubwa ya kuku.

src: I caught up on some assignments.
mt: Nilipata kufika kwa kazi chache.
ref: Nikafanya kazi kadhaa.

src: Amy decided to go outside to enjoy the weather.
mt: Amy aliamua kufika nje kwa ajili ya kusherekea hali ya hewa.
ref: Amy aliamua kwenda nje kufurahia hali ya hewa.

src: I applied sunscreen before we left.
mt: Nilimwagiza kwa kisunia kabla ya kutokea.
ref: Nilipaka mafuta ya kujikinga na miale ya jua kabla hatujaondoka.

src: Jane consulted with a professional juggler to teach her.
mt: Jane alikusudia na mwalimu wa kujibizana ili ajelewe.
ref: Jane alishauriana na mtaalam wa kughushi kumfundisha.

src: He would make it every night for dinner.
mt: Angefika kila usiku kwa chakula cha jioni.
ref: Angeitengeneza kila usiku kwa chakula cha jioni.

src: Betty said she wanted milk.
mt: Betty alisema alitaka maziwa.
ref: Betty akasema anataka maziwa.

src: They all had s'mores dangling over the fire, warming up.
mt: Wote walikuwa na s'mores wakiangana juu ya moto, wakianguka.
ref: Wote wakala vitafunio vitamu wakinyemelea kwenye moto, wakapasha joto.

src: He feels very embarrassed about this.
mt: Anasikitika sana kuhusu hiki.
ref: Anahisi aibu sana kuhusu hii.

src: Only Bob was a match.
mt: Bob pekee alikuwa na matokeo.
ref: Bob tu ndiye alikuwa ya kulingana.

src: She went to the baggage carousel to claim her luggage, all souvenirs!
mt: Alifika kwenye barabara ya vitambulisho ili kutambulisha vitambulisho vyake, vyote vya kumbukumbu!
ref: Alienda kwenye bembea ya kubeba mizigo kudai mzigo wake, zawadi zote!

src: It was hard because she had been smoking for ten Year's.
mt: Ilivyokuwa vigumu kwa sababu alikuwa anapiga dawa kwa miaka kumi.
ref: Ilikuwa ngumu kwa sababu alikuwa akivuta sigara kwa miaka kumi.

src: She was on a road trip and only had sweet snacks.
mt: Alipokuwa anafanya safari ya barabara na kufikia tu nyama za kizungu.
ref: Alikuwa safarini na alikuwa na vitafunio vitamu pekee.

src: So Ray worked out to build up his muscles.
mt: Kwa hiyo Ray alifanya mazoezi ili kujenga miili yake.
ref: Kwa hivyo Ray alifanya mazoezi ya kujenga misuli yake.

src: One of Kristin's favorite bands should be performing at the festival.
mt: Moja ya bendi zake za kizushi lazima itakuwa ikishirikiana katika tamasha hilo.
ref: Moja ya bendi ambayo Kristin anapenda inapaswa kufanya maonyesho kwenye tamasha hilo.

src: Customers noticed he had a really nice voice.
mt: Wakukaribishwa waliona amekuwa na sauti nzuri sana.
ref: Wateja waligundua alikuwa na sauti nzuri sana.

src: He decided to take the long trip to Idaho to see her.
mt: Alisema atakapokuwa na wakati atakapofika Idaho kwa kumwona.
ref: Aliamua kuchukua safari ndefu kwenda Idaho kumwona.

src: But there was no coffee machine in the school for kids.
mt: Lakini hakuna mashine ya kahawa katika shule kwa watoto.
ref: Lakini hakukuwa na mashine ya kahawa shuleni kwa watoto.

src: He went to prison for murder.
mt: Alipata uhalifu kwa kuuua.
ref: Alifungwa gerezani kwa sababu ya mauaji.

src: She grew tired of doing all the cooking and cleaning by herself.

src: He would take a book and sit under the tree.
mt: Anakwenda na kitabu na kushika chini ya mti.
ref: Angechukua kitabu na kuketi chini ya mti.

src: I'd seen online videos of a nice pen called a Pelikan M800.
mt: Nilikuona video za kawaida za peni yenye jina la Pelikan M800.

src: She went with a close guy friend.
mt: Alifika na mpenzi mwingi.

src: He bought a ticket to sample dozens of wings.
mt: Alipata tiketi ili kujifungua kwa wingi.
ref: Alinunua tikiti ya kujaribu dazani ya mabawa.

src: It's not so bad during the day.
mt: Si kama hivyo wakati wa mchana.
ref: Sio mbaya mchana.

src: He went out in the hills to look for gold.
mt: Alifika kwenye milima kujifungua kwa dhahabu.
ref: Alienda kwenye milima kutafuta dhahabu.

src: His wife wants to distract Robert with something.
mt: Mke wake anataka kisababisha Robert na kitu.
ref: Mke wake anataka kumzubaisha Robert na kitu.

src: She immediately woke up early and ran over to it.
mt: Aliwakuta wakati wa mchana na kufika kwenye kitu hicho.
ref: Aliamka mara moja asubuhi na akakimbia kwenda dukani.

src: Teresa was excited to have a new baby sister.
mt: Teresa alikuwa na hamu ya kuwa na ndugu mpya mwanamke.
ref: Teresa alisisimka kuwa na dada mdogo.

src: And as he sat in class, he felt intimidated by his peers.
mt: Na wakati anapokuwa katika kazi, alikuwa na wasiwasi kwa wenzake.
ref: Na alipokuwa akiketi darasani, alihisi anatishwa na marafiki wake.

src: He never washes the dishes but always uses them.
mt: Anajitahidi kila wakati lakini hana uwezo wa kuchimba.
ref: Yeye huwa haoshi vyombo lakini hivitumia kila wakati.

src: He has trouble becoming familiar with the PC operating system at work.
mt: Anaweza kujifunza kwa kipindi kifupi na mfumo wa kazi ya kompyuta.
ref: Ana shida ya kujua jinsi mfumo wa uendeshaji wa PC unavyofanya kazi.

src: She slept in, and did not get up until 10 AM.
mt: Aliwahi kula, na hakupona hadi saa 10 AM.
ref: Alilala, na hakuamka hadi saa 10 AM.

src: I looked through my house but didn't find anything.
mt: Nilisoma nyumba yangu lakini sikuona kitu chochote.
ref: Nikaangalia kila mahali nyumbani mwangu lakini sikupata kitu chochote.

src: She needed to put her to sleep early.
mt: Alihitajika kuchimba kwa muda mfupi.
ref: Alitaka kumfanya alale mapema.

src: She gets there and promptly spends 250$ on a pair of shoes.
mt: Anapofika, anapendelea kushika 250$ kwa kipande cha viatu.
ref: Alifika hapo na kutumia $250 kwa haraka kwenye viatu.

src: School was important to her, but her friend was in an emergency.
mt: Shule ilikuwa muhimu kwake, lakini mpenzi wake alikuwa katika kesi ya kipindi.
ref: Shule ilikuwa muhimu kwake, lakini rafiki yake alikuwa katika hali ya dharura.

ref: Mavazi yake yalikuwa yenye madoido sana.

src: Tom had said that he would pick him up at 8:00 PM and it was after 9.
mt: Tom alisema kwamba atakapata kwa 8:00 PM na sasa ni baada ya 9.
ref: Tom alikuwa amesema kwamba atamchukua saa 8:00 PM na ilikuwa ni baada ya sasa 9.

src: However, he needed to find a place where he could bowl regularly.
mt: Lakini alitaka kupata mahali ambapo alitakiwa kubeba kila mara.
ref: Hata hivyo, alipaswa kutafuta mahali ambapo anaweza kuvingirisha matufe mara kwa mara.

src: They walked to the nearest park.
mt: Wakawaingiza kwa parki iliyokuwepo karibu.
ref: Wakatembea hadi bustani iliyo karibu.

src: Brad found out there was a concert happening nearby.
mt: Brad alijua kwamba kuna kipindi cha muziki kinachofanyika karibu.
ref: Brad aligundua kulikuwa na tamasha lililokuwa likiendelea karibu.

src: Even since she was little, she practiced on camera.
mt: Kama alivyokuwa mdogo, alifanya mazoezi kwenye kamera.
ref: Hata wakati alikuwa mdogo, alijifunza kwenye kamera.

src: She picked up her kids, and took them straight to an ice cream parlor.
mt: Aliangalia watoto wake, na kumuza kwa kwanza kwenye duka la kukuza.
ref: Aliwachukua watoto wake, na kuwapeleka moja kwa moja kwenye duka la aiskrimu.

src: The boys put on their coats, hats, gloves and boots and went outside.
mt: Wanaume wakati wao wakapanga vyeti vyao, kofia, viatu na vifaa vya kifua na kufika nje.
ref: Wavulana wakavaa koti, kofi, glovu na buti zao na kwenda nje.

src: Someone was calling me and I decided to pull out my phone.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepewa neno na nilisema nimepiga simu.
ref: Kulikuwa na mtu aliyekuwa akinipigia simu na nikaamua kuchomoa simu yangu.

src: When snow begins to fall from the sky he watches it.
mt: Kama baridi linaanza kutoka angani anamwacha.
ref: Wakati theluji inaanza majira ya kupukutika kwa majani kutoka mawingu anatazama.

src: Recently, Garry failed a Math test, and a English test.
mt: Kutokana na kufaika kwa Garry katika testi ya Kiswahili na Kisomeo, ameipata kipindi cha kufanya kazi kwa muda.
ref: Hivi majuzi, Garry alianguka mtihani wa Hesabu, na mtihani wa Kiingereza.

src: His girlfriend started making him dinner, but he said it smelled bad.
mt: Kaka yake alianza kufanya chakula, lakini alisema kila kitu kilikuwa na upeo.
ref: Mpenzi wake alianza kumtengenezea chakula cha jioni, lakini akasema kinanuka vibaya.

src: He thought he was in great shape because he played basketball.
mt: Alimwamini kuwa alikuwa katika hali nzuri kwa sababu alilala kwenye michezo ya kandanda.
ref: Alifikiria alikuwa na mwili mzuri kwa sababu ya kucheza mpira wa kikapu.

src: But she couldn't find his shoes even after looking everywhere!
mt: Lakini alikosa kuta kipande cha kizungu chake baada ya kufika kila mahali!
ref: Lakini hakuweza kupata viatu vyake hata baada ya kutafuta kila mahali!

src: He decided to go swimming with his friends.
mt: Alisema atakapenda kufanya kazi na wenzake.
ref: Akaamua kwenda kuogelea na marafiki wake.

src: His  friend  decided  to  teach him.
mt: Kaka yake alisema atakupa elimu.
ref: Rafiki yake akaamua kumfunza.

src: She loved her job and was very good at it.
mt: Alimwita kazi yake na alikuwa mwenye uwezo mkubwa katika kazi yake.
ref: Alipenda kazi yake na alikuwa mzuri sana.

src: She was afraid of being caught.
mt: Alitaka kuepukika.
ref: Alihofia kupatikana.

src: He struggled to solve the puzzle.
mt: Alifaulu kufuta mafuta.
ref: Alitatizika kutatua fumbo hilo.

src: Tim planned a romantic getaway in the Bahamas.
mt: Tim alikuwa ameangalia nafasi ya kujifungua kwa ndege katika Bahama.
ref: Tim alipanga likizo ya kimahaba ya kwenda Bahamas.

src: She made the sauce.
mt: Aliyachapisha sasa.
ref: Alitengeneza sosi hiyo.

src: I needed a new pair from work so had to look for a place to go.
mt: Nilizidi kipindi cha kazi na kwa hiyo nilizidi kufanya uchunguzi wa mahali pa kupata.
ref: Nilitaka viatu vipya vya kazini kwa hivyo nililazimika kutafuta mahali pa kwenda.

src: She was working a minimum wage job.
mt: Alijifungua kazi ya kipato cha kawaida.
ref: Alikuwa akifanya kazi anayolipwa kima cha chini.

src: He was in the hospital for a very long time.
mt: Alikuwa katika hospitali kwa muda mrefu sana.
ref: Alikuwa hospitalini kwa muda mrefu sana.

src: I had to go to a new school.
mt: Nilikuwa na kuchukua shule mpya.
ref: Nililazimika kwenda shule mpya.

src: He always planned his travels to avoid any tall bridges.
mt: Aliwakiliana kila safari yake ili kuepukana na barabara zinazokatika.
ref: Siku zote amekuwa akipanga safari zake akiepuka madaraja yoyote marefu.

src: He can get out of  just about any situation he doesn't want to be in.
mt: Anaweza kutoka nje ya  kila jambo anayopenda kutoka nayo.
ref: Anaweza kujiondoa kwenye hali yoyote ile ambayo hataki kuwa ndani.

src: She picked up her cat from the deck.
mt: Aliangalia kiti cha kawaida.
ref: Akamchukua paka wake kutoka kwenye sitaha.

src: As soon as I placed it on the table, my family attacked it.
mt: Baada ya kuchipa kwenye meza, familia yangu ilivamia.
ref: Punde tu tulipokiweka mezani, familia yangu ilikishambulia.

src: He has never fallen off and hurt himself.
mt: Anayecheza kama huo, hajakwenda kwenye mabomu yoyote na kujeruhi.
ref: Hajawahi kuanguka na kujiumiza.

src: Matt and Tammy exchanged numbers after the night.
mt: Matt na Tammy wakabatiza namba baada ya usiku.
ref: Matt na Tammy walibadilishana nambari baada ya usiku.

src: He swung his hand around.
mt: Alimwagika mkono wake.
ref: Alikuwa akirusha mikono yake.

src: No matter where she had to go she would always travel by land.
mt: Kwani wakati wowote alitaka kufika alitumia barabara.
ref: Haijalishi ni wapi alipaswa kwenda siku zote angesafiri nchi kavu.

src: He was notoriously lazy.
mt: Alitajwa kwa uhalisia kama mtu mwenye kujitupa.
ref: Alikuwa mvivu sana.

src: She thought no one would want to date her.
mt: Alimwamini hakuna mtu atakayewaza kufuata naye.
ref: Alifikiria hakuna mtu yeyote angependa kumchumbia.

src: While she was happy for her sister, she was scared to be an aunt.
mt: Alisikia habari hii na kujifurahisha kwa ndugu yake, lakini alikuwa na wasiwasi kuwa mama.
ref: Ijapokuwa alimfurahia dada yake, alikuwa na wasiwasi kuwa shangazi.

src: He didn't have running water in his house.
mt: Alisahau maji ya kuchoma katika nyumba yake.
ref: Hakuwa na maji yanayotiririka nyumbani mwake.

src: She had the store deliver the television to her house.
mt: Aliwaleta televisheni kutoka duka kwake.
ref: Duka lilikuwa liwasilishe televisheni hiyo nyumbani mwake.

src: She grew them in her garden.
mt: Aliwapa wakati wake wao katika kijiji chake.
ref: Aliyakuza katika bustani yake.

src: He went to visit her at the hospital.
mt: Alifika kuzitupa katika hospitali.
ref: Alienda kumtembelea hospitalini.

src: But she forced herself to go to school.
mt: Lakini alimkataza kufika shule.
ref: Lakini alijilazimisha kwenda shuleni.

src: She got a taxi to the airport.
mt: Aliingia kwa taxi uwanja wa ndege.
ref: Akapata taksi ya kumpeleka uwanja wa ndege.

src: Sandy heard of a dangerous snow storm coming her way.
mt: Sandy alijua kuna mvua ya barafu ya kisirika inakaribia.
ref: Sandy alisikia kuhusu dhoruba hatari ya theluji inayoelekea upande wake.

src: Although he doesn't mind coworkers, he likes to be left alone.
mt: Alitakiwa kufanya kazi pamoja na wafanyabiashara, lakini anataka kuachwa peke yake.
ref: Ijapokuwa hana shida na wafanyakazi wenza, anapenda kuwa peke yake.

src: I am on a low sodium diet.
mt: Nina dieti ya chini ya niasini.
ref: Ninakula chakula kilichopunguzwa sodiamu.

src: He was scared to ask his father for the costume.
mt: Alimwambia baba yake kwa uongozi.
ref: Aliogopa kuomba baba yake vazi hilo.

src: He books a trip to visit his cousin in Philadelphia.
mt: Anabooka safari ya kufika kwa jamaa yake mmoja Philadelphia.
ref: Akahifadhi nafasi ya safari ya kumtembelea binamu yake kule Philadelphia.

src: It was in a department store.
mt: Ilivyopatikana, ilikuwa katika duka la kifaa.
ref: Alikuwa katika duka kubwa.

src: Before she left, we exchanged phone numbers.
mt: Kabla ya kufika, tulifanya neno za simu.
ref: Kabla ya kuondoka, tulibadilishana nambari za simu.

src: She walked up and down the aisles to find what she wanted.
mt: Aliwakuta na kuwafika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa kufika kwa k
ref: Alitembea juu na chini kwenye vijia kutafuta alichokitaka.

src: He was nervous being around heavy machinery.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kutokana na vifaa vikubwa.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kuwa karibu na mashine nzito.

src: He started doing the accounting for a local gang.
mt: Alianza kufanya hesabu kwa kikundi cha ndani.
ref: Alianza kufanya uhasibu kwa genge la ndani.

src: Alice was so excited because her mom had bought her a new outfit.
mt: Alice alikuwa na hamu kubwa kwa sababu mama yake alimwachia kanzu mpya.
ref: Alice alisisimka sana kwa sababu mama yake alikuwa amenunua nguo mpya.

src: Nila knew her mom did not have a long time to live.
mt: Nilijua mama yangu haikuwa na muda mrefu kuishi.
ref: Nile alijua mama yake hakuwa na wakati mrefu wa kuishi.

src: She dreamed of their future together.
mt: Aliamini kuwa wao wataishi pamoja.
ref: Aliota kuhusu mustakabali wao pamoja.

src: They went to sleep early so they could wake up early.
mt: Walipata nyumbani wakati mrefu ili wakaa wakati mrefu.
ref: Walienda kulala mapema ili waweze kuamka mapema.

src: Kim decided to take away all dragon and fantasy books from her kid.
mt: Kim alisikitika kwa kuchukua vitabu vyote vya daima na vitabu vya ufundishaji vya kijani kutoka kwa mtoto wake.
ref: Kim akaamua kuondoa vitabu vyote vya joka na fantasia kutoka kwa mtoto wake.

src: We were all very nervous.
mt: Tulikuwa wote wakipanga.
ref: Sote tulikuwa na wasiwasi sana.

src: And the barking always woke Jeff up early.
mt: Na kila mara Jeff alikuwa na mafuta kwa sababu ya kudhuru.
ref: Na ubwekaji huo ulimwamsha Jeff mapema siku zote.

src: He took his time and applied it very carefully.
mt: Alifanya kazi yake na kufanya kazi yake kwa kujitahidi.
ref: Alichukua muda wake na akaipaka kwa makini sana.

src: She was out of town a few days and I went to sleep without it.
mt: Aliyekwenda nje kwa muda fulani na mimi nilipata nishati bila yeye.
ref: Alikuwa amesafiri nje ya mji siku chache na nikaenda kulala bila taa.

src: She planned the move for months.
mt: Aliamua kufanya harakati kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Alipanga kuhama kwa miezi.

src: She found a pair of great shoes.
mt: Alijua kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha kipande cha k
ref: Akapata viatu vizuri.

src: She will be five Year's old.
mt: Atakuwa na umri wa miaka kumi.
ref: Atakuwa na umri wa miaka mitano.

src: We took along a frisbee and a ball.
mt: Tulitumia pia kipande cha kifungua na bila.
ref: Tulibeba diski na mpira.

src: I headed down to a Redbox to get one.
mt: Nilipata nafasi nilipita kwa Redbox ili kupata moja.
ref: Nikaenda Redbox kununua moja.

src: Her friends were supportive even though it was bad.
mt: Wanawake waliwakilisha wakati wa kuharibu.
ref: Marafiki wake walimuunga mkono hata kama yalikuwa mabaya.

src: Since there was service on it, I decided to cancel it.
mt: Kwa sababu kuna huduma kwenye, nilisahau.
ref: Kwa kuwa kulikuwa na mpango wa huduma kwayo, nikaamua kuikatisha.

src: Her mom had planned her a surprise party.
mt: Mama yake alikuwa ameleta sherehe ya mafuta.
ref: Mama yake alikuwa amepanga sherehe ya kumshutukiza.

src: She was known for it and everyone expected to see her in one.
mt: Alifahamika kwa hivyo na wote walikuwa wakifurahia kusema kwamba yeye alikuwa anafahamika kwa hivyo.

src: It was a warm breezy day.

src: She didn't know how it happened.

src: He wishes it looked as clean as it did when he was young.

src: Since my brother was at work, I had to wait for him to pick me up.
mt: Kwa sababu dada yangu alikuwa kazi, nilipenda kuwembeleza.

src: He only used his special barbell to lift weights.

src: It was stressing her out a great deal due to other personal issues.

src: He signed a short contract that put him on the front lines.

src: He watched one man for a while.

src: I couldn't believe she had gotten this far in life without this skill.
mt: Nilimwamini hata siku hizi anaweza kufika hapa bila uwezo huu.

src: She called and told her friend Kim she was the worst player.
mt: Aliwataja na kuwafundisha Kim alikuwa mchezaji mdogo zaidi.

src: She didn't want to answer and waited for it to go away.
mt: Aliyemshutumu alikuwa hajawasikiliza na alitoka kwa kujua hilo litakapokwenda.

src: He graduated with a degree in painting.
mt: Alipata digrii ya sanaa ya picha.

src: He slipped them in his backpack to wear at school.

src: He ended up getting pretty drunk.
