ref: Wazazi wake walikuwa wanaenda mbali kwa hivyo aliamua kufanya moja.

src: He decides he will go for a run in the park.
mt: Anamchukua hatua ya kufika kwenye parki ili apumzike.
ref: Akaamua ataenda kukimbia kwenye bustani.

src: He decides he should shovel some of the snow.
mt: Anamchukua hatua ya kushuka sehemu ya barafu.
ref: Anaamua anapaswa kuchota na sepetu baadhi ya theluji.

src: He began to sneakily read her emails.
mt: Alianza kuchukua barua pepe zake kwa kujitahidi.
ref: Akaanza kusoma barua pepe zake akijificha.

src: They would reserve a court a couple times a week.
mt: Watakapo kubadili, wataweza kubadili mahakama mara kadhaa kwa wiki.
ref: Wangeweka nafasi ya uwanja mara kadhaa kwa wiki.

src: She sorted her dirty clothes by color.
mt: Aliwakuta mavazi yake yaliyokauka kwa rangi.
ref: Akapanga nguo zake chafu kulingana na rangi.

src: We packed what we needed and headed to the other side of the island.
mt: Kila kitu kilichotakiwa kilichokauka na kufika kwenye nchi nyingine ya kisiwa.
ref: Tufunganya tulichohitaji na tukaelekea upande mwingine wa kisiwa.

src: A small pebble in it made one of his teeth snap in half!
mt: Kwa kipindi kifupi, kile kimoja kimepata kile kimoja kwa kipimo chake!
ref: Kijiwe kidogo ndani yake kilifanya jino lake moja kukatika katikati!

src: At first he cannot remember where it might be.
mt: Awali hakuwa na muda wa kuwasiliana kwa sababu hakuwa na muda wa kuwasiliana.
ref: Mwanzoni hawezi kukumbuka inaweza kuwa wapi.

src: She had wanted a new dog for ages.
mt: Aliitaka mbwa mpya kwa miaka mingi.
ref: Alikuwa ametaka mbwa mpya kwa miaka mingi.

src: He shopped at the mall for hours and was unable to find anything.
mt: Alifika katika mitaa kwa saa nyingi na alikosa kupata kitu chochote.
ref: Alizunguka madukani kwa saa nyingi na hakuweza kupata chochote.

src: Bill had a minimum wage job.
mt: Bill alikuwa na kazi ya kipato cha kawaida.
ref: Bill alikuwa na kazi anayolipwa kima cha chini.

src: She wanted to wear them out.
mt: Alitaka kufanya kazi zao.
ref: Alitaka kuvivaa.

src: He and his family came here from Mexico.
mt: Alifika hapa na familia yake kutoka Meksiko.
ref: Yeye na familia yake walikuja hapa kutoka Mexico.

src: She decided to enroll in Yoga class to improve her flexibility.
mt: Aliamua kufuata kazi ya Yoga ili kuimarisha uwezo wake wa kujikimu.
ref: Akaamua kujiandikisha katika darasa la Yoga ili kuboresha unyumbuzi wake.

src: The students let out a collective groan.
mt: Wanafunzi wakati wao wakaa kwa kushindwa.
ref: Wanafunzi wakakoroma kwa wa pamoja.

src: She'd seen her daughter's free time disappear with her new clubs.
mt: Alijua wakati wa binti yake ulivunjika kwa majumba yake mpya.
ref: Alikuwa ameona wakati wa mapumziko wa binti yake ukipotea na vilabu vyake vipya.

src: It was the first day, and Gina was the last to wake up.
mt: Alipoanza siku, Gina alikuwa mwisho wa kuwaka.
ref: Ilikuwa siku ya kwanza, na Gina ndiye alikuwa wa mwisho kuamka.

src: He wanted a hunting bow.
mt: Alitaka kifaru cha kuharibu.
ref: Alitaka uta wa uwindaji.

src: One day her mother surprised her with a trip to the pet store.
mt: Moja anayemwona mama yake na safari kwa duka la wanyama.
ref: Siku moja mama yake alimshangaza na safari ya duka la wanyama kipenzi.

src: All his friends were dressing up.
mt: Wote wamemwambia wamemwambia.
ref: Rafiki wake wote walikuwa wakivaa.

src: She finally landed a role in a big film.
mt: Alifika kwa nafasi kubwa katika filamu kubwa.
ref: Hatimaye alipata nafasi katika filamu kubwa.

src: He finally relented, and the pool was installed.
mt: Alipokubali, basi bado kubadilishwa.
ref: Mwishowe alikubali, na dimbwi likawekwa.

src: Farmer Jones still had not brought her morning oats.
mt: Kabla hajazua majani ya mchana, mwanadamu Jones.
ref: Mkulima Jones alikuwa bado hajamletea shayiri yake ya asubuhi.

src: He asked around if it was anybody's there.
mt: Alisema kwa wengine kama kuna mtu yoyote hapa.
ref: Aliuliza watu kadhaa ikiwa kulikuwa na mtu yeyote hapo.

src: I ate healthy food the entire day!
mt: Nilikuwa na chakula kizuri kote siku nzima!
ref: Nilikula chakula chenye afya siku nzima!

src: He was really looking forward to this trip.
mt: Alitaka sana safari hii.
ref: Alikuwa akitarajia sana safari hii.

src: But Eric's mom said that Eric could not come out and play.
mt: Lakini mama yake Eric alisema Eric hakutaki kufika nje na kucheza.
ref: Lakini mama ya Eric alisema kwamba Eric hangeweza kutoka kucheza.

src: One day he threw a stone as far as he could.
mt: Yule siku alitupa kijivu kama anavyoweza.
ref: Siku moja alitupa jiwe mbali kadiri alivyoweza.

src: He made a sand castle.
mt: Alifanya kifungu cha maji.
ref: Alitengeneza kasri la mchanga.

src: He rolled in the mud, which got caught in his fur.
mt: Alitumbukia mchanga, ambacho kiliingia kwa nywele zake.
ref: Akajivingirisha kwenye matope, ambayo yalinaswa na manyoya yake.

src: He started down the street near his house when he hit a pothole.
mt: Alianza kufika katika barabara karibu na nyumba yake wakati alichukua kifaru.
ref: Alianza chini ya barabara karibu na nyumba yake wakati alipogonga shimo.

src: I never seen her in person, but I trust her.
mt: Nilisikia kwa mara ya kwanza, lakini nimeamini.
ref: Sikuwahi kumuona ana kwa ana, lakini ninamwamini.

src: I thought they would drive more traffic to my website.
mt: Nilimwamini wataendelea kufanya zaidi kwa ajili ya kutupa trafiki kwa tovuti yangu.
ref: Nilidhani wataongeza trafiki zaidi kwenye tovuti yangu.

src: He decided to host a party.
mt: Alisema atakaa na kusherehekea.
ref: Aliamua kuandaa karamu.

src: I got to wear my new outfit that Mom bought.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepanga kile kitu cha kawaida cha kufanya.
ref: Nilivaa mavazi yangu mapya ambayo Mama alinunua.

src: It would not turn on.
mt: Haikulipuka.
ref: Haingeweza kuwasha.

src: So she picked a name and address out of the phone book.
mt: Kwa hiyo alipanga jina na kikao cha kitabu cha simu.
ref: Kwa hivyo akachukua jina na anwani kutoka kwa kitabu cha simu.

src: Bill noticed a pretty girl.
mt: Bill alikuta mwanamke mwenye upeo.
ref: Bill aligundua msichana mrembo.

src: We had a tornado warning and terrible thunderstorms.
mt: Kuna taarifa ya tornado na mvua ya kikelekele.
ref: Tulikuwa na onyo la kimbunga na dhoruba yenye ngurumo mbaya.

src: Janie wanted to see a comedy, but Lynne wanted to see a thrill.
mt: Janie alitaka kuona kifahari, lakini Lynne alitaka kuona kifurahisi.
ref: Janie alitaka kuona riwaya ya ucheshi, lakini Lynne alitaka kuona riwaya ya kusisimua.

src: She decided to go to the mall.
mt: Aliamua kufika katika mabati.
ref: Akaamua kwenda kwenye maduka makubwa.

src: Our old house is now too small for our family.
mt: Nyumba yetu ya kale sasa ni ndogo kwa familia yetu.
ref: Nyumba yetu ya zamani sasa ni ndogo sana kwa familia yetu.

src: He reached for his cigarettes but the pack was empty.
mt: Alisimama kwa sigara lakini pakiti ilikuwa hai.
ref: Alichukua sigara yake lakini kifurushi kilikuwa tupu.

src: She loved her doll very much.
mt: Aliwahitaji mnyama wake kama alivyohitaji.
ref: Alipenda sana doli lake.

src: Her friends aren't sure what her secret is.
mt: Wanawake wake wanaona kwamba wewe ni mwanamke mwenye mafanikio, lakini wanaona kwamba wewe ni mwanamke mwenye mafanikio.
ref: Marafiki wake hawana uhakika siri yake ni nini.

src: But he also wanted to eat healthier.
mt: Lakini pia alitaka kula bora.
ref: Lakini pia alitaka kula vyakula vinavyofaa.

src: Quickly, his mother drove him downtown.
mt: Kwa haraka, mama yake alimwambea kwa mji.
ref: Kwa haraka, mama yake akwamwendesha mjini.

src: She wanted to have a pink room.
mt: Alitaka kuwa na nyumba ya rangi ya pink.
ref: Alitaka kuwa na chumba cha rangi ya waridi.

src: They met at a nice restaurant and shook hands.
mt: Walikutana katika restoranti yenye uwezo na kuangalia.
ref: Walikutana katika mgahawa mzuri na wakasalimiana kwa mikono.

src: He gets very nervous around her.
mt: Anapokwenda karibu naye, anapata shida kubwa.
ref: Huwa na wasiwasi sana karibu naye.

src: She had never grown anything before.
mt: Aliyekuwa hajakua kitu kikuu kabla.
ref: Alikuwa hajawahi kupanda chochote hapo awali.

src: He got up and went into his kitchen.
mt: Alipokwama na kuingia katika chakula chake.
ref: Akainuka na kuingia jikoni kwake.

src: It was blue with stars.
mt: Ilivyokuwa nyekundu na nyota.
ref: Ilikuwa rangi ya bluu yenye nyota.

src: It was extremely advanced.
mt: Ilivyokuwa kama ilivyokuwa kwa sasa.
ref: Ilikuwa ya hali ya juu sana.

src: He was making pork chops.
mt: Alivyofanya nyama ya pori.
ref: Alikuwa anatengeneza vipande vya nyama ya nguruwe.

src: She asked around and found out who did it.
mt: Aliwataja na kufika kwa kujua kwa nani alifanya.
ref: Aliuliza watu na akagundua ni nani aliyefanya hivyo.

src: For her friend's birthday, she gave her a painting.
mt: Kwa siku ya kuzaliwa kwa mpenzi wake, aliwapa chitabati.
ref: Kwa siku ya kuzaliwa ya rafiki yake, alimpa mchoro.

src: For his birthday, his family got him tickets to a classic car museum.
mt: Kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa, familia yake ilimpa tiketi kwa mabwepaji ya gari la zamani.
ref: Kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa, familia yake ilimpatia tikiti kwa makumbusho ya magari ya jadi.

src: Now Johnny has a bruised knee.
mt: Sasa Johnny ana kifua chenye kipimo.
ref: Sasa Johnny ana goti lililopondeka.

src: He often eats fast food for breakfast.
mt: Anakula chakula cha kipindukia kwa mara nyingi kwa chakula cha asubuhi.
ref: Mara nyingi hula chakula chepesi kwa kiamsha kinywa.

src: Everyone began to start on the experiment.
mt: Wote wakapanga kuanza kufanya kazi.
ref: Kila mtu alianza jaribio hilo.

src: When he criticized one of them, its fans got angry with him.
mt: Aliposema kuhusu mmoja wao, wafuasi wake wakakataa kwa kujisikia.
ref: Alipomkosoa mmoja wao, mashabiki wake walimkasirikia.

src: They are his favorite because he gets to eat as much as he wants.
mt: Anayemwita ni yake kwa sababu anaweza kula kama anavyotaka.
ref: Anazipenda kwa sababu anakula kama kadri atakavyo.

src: He always takes his smoke break at the same time.
mt: Anayeendesha moto anapata kipindi cha kula kila mara.
ref: Huchukua mapumziko yake ya kuvuta sigara kila wakati.

src: He was a photographer and she was a graphic designer.
mt: Alie alikuwa mfanyabizazi na alie alikuwa mfanyabizazi.
ref: Alikuwa mpiga picha na alikuwa mbuni wa picha.

src: I turned off my computer so I wouldn't cheat.
mt: Nilimwacha kompyuta yangu ili sijacheat.
ref: Nilizima kompyuta yangu ili nisiweze kudanganya.

src: After looking through images, I picked one out.
mt: Baada ya kufika kwa picha, nilichagua moja.
ref: Baada ya kupitia picha, nilichagua moja.

src: When it had cooled, she was ready to frost it.
mt: Baada ya kupata nafasi, alikuwa tayari kufanya kuchemsha.
ref: Wakati ilipoa, alikuwa tayari kuikausha.

src: It sleeps all the time.
mt: Inapokaa kila wakati.
ref: Analala kila wakati.

src: Her mother walked in and gasped.
mt: Mama yake alipofika akamwambia.
ref: Mama yake aliingia ndani na kupumua.

src: My teacher took the class towards the front of the school.
mt: Mwalimu alitupa kikundi chetu kuelekea kwenye mazingira ya chuo.
ref: Mwalimu wangu alipeleka wanafunzi mbele ya shule.

src: She was home doing light cleaning on a Sunday afternoon.
mt: Alikuwa nyumbani akiendesha kazi chafu katika mchana wa Jumamosi.
ref: Alikuwa nyumbani akifanya usafi kidogo Jumapili jioni.

src: She didn't think she would like it.
mt: Alisikitika.
ref: Hakufikiria kwamba ataipenda.

src: I began to substitute teach at her school if a teacher was sick.
mt: Nilianza kufanya kazi ya mwalimu wa kushawishi katika shule yake ikiwa mwalimu alikuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: Nikaanza kufunza kama mwalimu mbadala katika shule yake iwapo mwalimu alikuwa mgonjwa.

src: Today Gary couldn't find his lunchbox.
mt: Leo Gary hakutambua kifaa chake cha chakula cha mchana.
ref: Leo Gary hakuweza kupata chakula chake cha mchana.

src: He had an important test tomorrow.
mt: Alitaka kufanya kipimo kikubwa jana.
ref: Alikuwa na mtihani muhimu kesho.

src: I noticed a man sitting by himself.
mt: Nilimwona mwanadamu akifika kwa mwenyewe.
ref: Nikagundua mwanaume ameketi peke yake.

src: He watched several documentaries about Einstein.
mt: Alimwachia vitabu kadhaa kuhusu Einstein.
ref: Alitazama masimulizi kadhaa ya video kuhusu Einstein.

src: She searched the newspaper employment section.
mt: Aliangalia sehemu ya ajira ya gazeti.
ref: Akatafuta sehemu ya ajira ya gazeti.

src: Suddenly she saw a small snake slither across her arm!
mt: Baada ya muda, aliona njiu mdogo kushambulia kichwa chake!
ref: Muda si muda akaona nyoka ndogo ikipita mkononi mwake!

src: He had some of them sponsor him.
mt: Alimiliki chache yao wakati wa kusaidia.
ref: Baadhi yao waliamua kumfadhili.

src: One day he decided to go on a hike.
mt: Juma moja alisema atakapenda kufika kwenye kijiji.
ref: Siku moja aliamua kwenda matembezi.

src: One day, while playing outside with his dog, Logan was stung by a bee.
mt: Moja siku, wakati wa kucheza nje na mbwa wake, Logan alitupwa na mbuzi.
ref: Siku moja, alipokuwa akicheza nje na mbwa wake, Logan aliumwa na nyuki.

src: His parents considered getting him a tutor.
mt: Wazazi wake wakajiuliza kujenga mwalimu.
ref: Wazazi wake walifikiria kumtafutia mwalimu.

src: Rae's brother accidentally spilled his drink.
mt: Rae's brother accidentally spilled his drink.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya ndugu ya Rae akamwaga maziwa yake.

src: Gina hoped her other friends would come over and join them.
mt: Gina alamani kwa wenzake wengine wakati wa kuwatembea na wao.
ref: Gina alitarajia marafiki wake wengine watakuja kujiunga nao.

src: They have been good all year.
mt: Wamekuwa bora kwa mwaka wote.
ref: Wamekuwa wazuri mwaka mzima.

src: I scheduled a doctor's appointment.
mt: Nilimkamata wakati wa kufanya kikao na daktari.
ref: Nikapanga miadi na daktari.

src: Christian decided to try out for the team.
mt: Kristo aliamua kujitafiti kwa timu.
ref: Christian akaamua kujaribu kujinga na timu hiyo.

src: They would each alternate which week to do them.
mt: Wao watakuwa wakifanya kila wiki kwa kushinda.
ref: Wangebadilishana ni wiki gani wataziosha.

src: She told him that she could not afford to buy him one.
mt: Alimwambia kwamba haingeweza kupata kwa bei ya kutosha.
ref: Alimwambia kwamba hana uwezo wa kumnunulia moja.

src: The veterinarian, Doctor Mike, found three fleas on Lee.
mt: Vet, Daktari Mike, alijua kuna tatu kwa Lee.
ref: Daktari huo wa wanyama, Daktari Mike, akapata viroboto watatu kwa Lee.

src: Quickly, she ran to her car, keys in hand.
mt: Kwa haraka, aliruka kwa gari lake, kwa kipande cha kifungua kwa mkono.
ref: Kwa haraka, alikimbia kwenye gari lake, funguo mkononi.

src: She was sure it would be there.
mt: Alitaka kwamba itakuwepo.
ref: Alikuwa na uhakika itakuwa hapo.

src: She put on her best skirt suit and headed to the interview.
mt: Alikaa kwa kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile chenye kile
ref: Akavaa suti yake nyeusi aipendayo na kuelekea kwa mahojiano.

src: She wanted to eat tacos.
mt: Alitaka kula tacos.
ref: Alitaka kula tacos.

src: He brings the skateboard to the park for a day of skateboarding.
mt: Anatupa sketbordi kwenye parki kwa siku ya sketbordi.
ref: Akaleta ubao huo mtelezo kwenye bustani kwa siku ya kuteleza kwa ubao mtelezo.

src: His dad and his mom were both alcoholics.
mt: Baba yake na mama yake wote walikuwa wakipika.
ref: Baba yake na mama yake walikuwa wote walevi.

src: So she let it grow for months and months.
mt: Kwa hiyo aliwaza kuchimba kwa muda na muda.
ref: Kwa hivyo akaicha ikue kwa miezi na miezi.

src: She looked at her clock alarm.
mt: Aliangalia mchakato wa saa yake.
ref: Akaangalia kengele ya saa yake.

src: I asked for a Coke.
mt: Nilipiga kwa Coke.
ref: Nikaagiza Coke.

src: He was watching tv and out of no where an alert popped up.
mt: Alivyokuwa anavyoangalia tv, kwa sababu ya kudumu, maelezo yalipigwa kwa kutoa.
ref: Alikuwa akitazama tv na kwa ghafla arifu ikatokea.

src: We're excited that school is cancelled for the day.
mt: Hatuna shida kwa shule kushindwa kwa siku moja.
ref: Tumesisimka kwamba shule imebatilishwa siku hiyo.

src: It would get a few feet from Joe then scurry away.
mt: Ingepata kifutaji chafu kutoka kwa Joe halafu kuingia kwenye kifutaji.
ref: Angekaribia futi chache kutoka kwa Joe na kisha kukimbia.

src: He paid cash.
mt: Alipata fedha.
ref: Alilipia pesa taslimu.

src: But he already had a drinking problem.
mt: Alijaa kwa kulewa.
ref: Lakini tayari alikuwa na tatizo la kunywa pombe.

src: All of a sudden she realized she felt an unusual breeze.
mt: Kabla hajawasikia, alijua anapata anga unaonekana.
ref: Kwa ghafla akagundua baridi isiyo ya kawaida.

src: It was rainy and cold out.
mt: Ilivyokuwa ni mvua na baridi nje.
ref: Kulikuwa na baridi na kukinyesha nje.

src: I went out and bought some new shoes.
mt: Nilipata nje na kupata vitu vingine vya kipande cha kipande.
ref: Nikatoka nje na kununua viatu vipya.

src: He was learning to fly small commuter planes.
mt: Alivyokua anafundishwa kupiga ndege ndogo za kujaza.
ref: Alikuwa akijifunza kuwa rubani wa ndege ndogo za abiria.

src: He needs to bring a salad to the party.
mt: Anahitaji kufika na saladi kwenye sherehe.
ref: Anataka kuleta saladi kwenye sherehe.

src: Today her mom took her to the pier for her very first boat ride.
mt: Leo mama yake alimwamini kwenye mabaki ya mji kwa safari yake ya kwanza ya meli.
ref: Leo mama yake alimpeleka kwa gati kwa safari yake ya kwanza ya boti.

src: He took a bus tour to an old prison.
mt: Alifika kwa bus kwenye mji wa zamani.
ref: Alienda safari ya basi hadi gereza la zamani.

src: She was running out of space on her phone.
mt: Alikuwa akifurudishia muda katika simu yake.
ref: Alikiwa akiishiwa na nafasi kwenye simu yake.

src: As a way to ask forgiveness he decided to buy her a new car battery.
mt: Kama njia ya kuomba ufadhili aliamua kupata gari lake mpya kwa bateri.
ref: Kama njia ya kuomba msamaha akaamua kumnunulia betri mpya ya gari.

src: Her favorite trick was to hide all of the chalk from the teacher.
mt: Jibu la kila swali ni kujificha kwa mwalimu.
ref: Ujanja alioupenda sana ulikuwa kuficha chaki zote kutoka kwa mwalimu.

src: Jane always wanted the recipe but her mother wouldn't give it to her.
mt: Jane alikuwa anataka ripoti bali mama yake hakutaki.
ref: Siku zote Jane ametaka mapishi lakini mama yake alikataa kumpa.

src: It was the time of the day to take out the trash.
mt: Iliongea wakati wa kufanya kazi ya kuchukua mafuta.
ref: Ilikuwa ni wakati wa siku wa kutoa takataka nje.

src: Half of us wanted pepperoni.
mt: Nusu ya sisi walitaka kungulia.
ref: Nusu yetu tulitaka peperoni.

src: The family moving in had a teenage daughter and Simon was smitten.
mt: Kabila lilichukua nyumba lilikuwa na binti mmoja na Simon alikuwa na wivu.
ref: Familia inayohama ilikuwa na binti kijana na Simon alivutiwa.

src: One Saturday, his team had a very important game.
mt: Jumamosi, timu yake ilikuwa na mchezo mkubwa.
ref: Jumamosi moja, timu yake ilikuwa na mchezo muhimu sana.

src: His teacher yelled at him.
mt: Alimuambia mwalimu.
ref: Mwalimu wake alimfokea.

src: She left jewelry store fliers on the counter.

ref: Aliacha vipeperushi vya duka la vito kwenye kaunta.

src: I immediately purchased it.
mt: Nilipata nalo.
ref: Niliinunua mara moja.

src: They bribed several radio DJs to play their song all at the same time.
mt: Walibadili viongozi wanne wa redio kwa kuwafanya wapate nyadhifa zao kwa kutoa nyimbo yao wakati mmoja.
ref: Waliwahonga DJ kadhaa wa redio wacheze wimbo wao wote kwa wakati mmoja.

src: She received many awards and competed a lot.
mt: Aliipata nyingi kwa tuzo na kushindana kwa kiasi kikubwa.
ref: Alipokea tuzo nyingi na kushindana sana.

src: She couldn't believe there was another world she couldn't see.
mt: Alimwamini hakuna dunia nyingine anayemwona.
ref: Hangeweza kuamini kulikuwa na ulimwengu mwingine ambao hauoni.

src: Over the summer she watched the women's world cup with her family.
mt: Kwenda kwa majuma alivutiwa na mashindano ya dunia ya wanawake na familia yake.
ref: Wakati wa majira ya joto alitazama kombe la dunia la wanawake na familia yake.

src: At the registration desk, they asked her for her credit card.
mt: Katika kambi ya kuzingatia, walipiga kwa kadi yake ya kifedha.
ref: Katika kituo cha usajili, walimwomba kadi yake ya mkopo.

src: She had a great time.
mt: Aliwaona wakati.
ref: Alikuwa na wakati mzuri.

src: He had kept it 2 days.
mt: Alivyokuwa na 2 siku.
ref: Alikuwa ameiweka kwa siku 2.

src: She was beginning to suspect the new maid had stolen them!
mt: Alianza kuona kwamba mabibi mpya alikuwa ameiba zile!
ref: Alikuwa ameanza kushuku mjakazi mgeni kuwa ameiba!

src: She had been in the kitchen and hadn't heard them in awhile.
mt: Alikuwa katika chakula na hakuona wakati mwingine.
ref: Alikuwa jikoni na hakuwa amewasikia kwa muda.

src: She admonished him to remember the brown eggs.
mt: Aliwatakae kumsifu mabega yake.
ref: Akamshauri akumbuke mayai ya kahawia.

src: They went to a local nursing home, wearing Santa hats.
mt: Wakati wa kufika katika nyumba ya kujitolea, walikuwa wamevaa kofia za Santa.
ref: Walienda kwenye makao ya kuwatunzia wazee yaliyo karibu, wakiwa wamevaa kofia za Santa.

src: They saw monkeys, gorillas and panda's first.
mt: Wakakuta kwanza kwa kipenzi, kipenzi na panda.
ref: Waliona nyani, sokwe na panda kwanza.

src: She did not have a job and she needed money.
mt: Alitaka pesa na hakuna kazi.
ref: Hakuwa na kazi na alitaka pesa.

src: It was a long journey for many, but they made it.
mt: Ilikuwa safari kubwa kwa wengi, lakini wamefika.
ref: Ilikuwa safari ndefu kwa wengi, lakini walifanikiwa.

src: She then complained that Jim never cooked dinner.
mt: Aliwataka kisha kuomba kwamba Jim hakuwa anapika chakula.
ref: Kisha akalalamika kwamba Jim hajawahi kupika chakula cha jioni.

src: Lina was cleaning their rooms and realized their drawers were stuffed.
mt: Lina alikuwa akichimba vyumba vyao na kuelewa vyombo vyao vimekufa.
ref: Lina alikuwa akisafisha vyumba vyao na akagundua kwamba droo zao zilikuwa zimejaa.

src: Her local ice cream shop didn't have that flavor.
mt: Kahawa yake ya kawaida ya kisafara haikuwa na rangi hiyo.
ref: Duka lake lililo karibu la aiskrimu halikuwa na ladha hiyo.

src: I turned the engine on and started to drive.
mt: Nilimwita mbinu na kuanza kufanya.
ref: Nikawasha injini na kuanza kuendesha.

src: They were having a debate tonight.
mt: Walikuwa wakifanya mjadala leo.
ref: Walikuwa na Mjadala usiku wa leo.

src: She dreaded having to go to class.
mt: Aliwahisi kuenda kwa kazi.
ref: Alihofia kwenda darasani.

src: He was so nervous that he checked his symptoms online.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kiasi hicho kwamba alivuruga simu yake ili kujifungua.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi sana hadi akaangalia dalili hizo mtandaoni.

src: While on the lot, he saw plenty of cars but none that he liked.
mt: Alipokuwa katika nafasi, aliona nyingi za gari lakini hakuna yoye alivyo.
ref: Akiwa kwenye uwanja, aliona magari mengi lakini hakuna yoyote aliyoipenda.

src: The game involved dozens of people.
mt: Michezo ilikuwa na wanaocheza zaidi ya wanyonge.
ref: Mchezo huo unawahusisha watu wengi.

src: A list of items to retrieve was created first.
mt: Barua ya kawaida ya vitu vyakusanywa ilikuwa inapatikana kwanza.
ref: Orodha ya vitu vya kuchukua iliundwa kwanza.

src: He had low self esteem and felt didn't deserve to have friends.
mt: Alikuwa na hofu kwa uwezo wake na akasikitika hakupenda kuwa na rafiki.
ref: Alikuwa anajiona hafai na alihisi hastahili kuwa na marafiki.

src: He was always proud of his Irish heritage.
mt: Alitiiwa na kujivunia asili yake ya Ireland.
ref: Siku zote amejivunia urithi wake wa Kiairishi.

src: He plugged in an old toaster with a frayed cord.
mt: Alimwagia tofauti ya kawaida na kifua kilichokauka.
ref: Alichomeka kioka mkate chake cha zamani na kamba iliyochakaa.

src: After cooking the potatoes it was time to mash them.
mt: Baada ya kuchoma nyanya, ilikuwa wakati wa kuchoma.
ref: Baada ya kipika viazi hivyo ilikuwa ni wakati wa kuviponda-ponda.

src: They were told not to do it but they did anyway.
mt: Walitupwa haramu lakini wakafanya bado.
ref: Waliambiwa wasifanya hivyo lakini walifanya tu.

src: Biff also wanted to watch a movie in theaters.
mt: Biff pia alitaka kuona filamu katika sinema.
ref: Biff pia alitaka kutazama filamu katika ukumbi wa sinema.

src: I was happy to see some of my friends again.
mt: Nilikuwa na furaha kutembea na wenzangu tena.
ref: Nilifurahi kuona baadhi ya marafiki wangu tena.

src: Ashley was very worried that she would get fleas as well.
mt: Ashley alikuwa na wasiwasi kubwa kwamba atakapata kifungu pia.
ref: Ashley alikuwa na wasiwasi sana kwamba atapata viroboto hivyo pia.

src: It was a run down section of town.
mt: Ilikuwa sehemu ya mji iliyokwama.
ref: Ilikuwa sehemu iliyoharibika sana ya mji.

src: Her birthday was coming up.
mt: Kwenda kufanya mazuri.
ref: Siku yake ya kuzaliwa ilikuwa inakuja.

src: On her birthday her parents took her to a farm.
mt: Jana, wazazi wakawajibika kwa kuchukua kwa siku yake.
ref: Siku yake ya kuzaliwa wazazi wake walimpeleka shambani.

src: He had just arrived in Dover.
mt: Alifika Dover kwa kipindi cha kwanza.
ref: Alikuwa amewasili Dover tu.

src: She worked hard all throughout high school to have good grades.
mt: Alijifunza kwa kasi kwa kila siku katika shule ya sekondari ili kufikia matokeo mazuri.
ref: Alifanya kazi kwa bidii katika shule ya upili ili apate gredi nzuri.

src: It stopped turning on for some reason.
mt: Ilipata kujitenga kwa sababu fulani.
ref: Kiliacha kuwaka kwa sababu zisizojulikana.

src: He told us not to pour water followed by an acid.
mt: Alimwambia sisi haramu maji kisha kifaa cha asidi.
ref: Alituambia tusimwage maji yakifuatiwa na asidi.

src: They often liked to go skiing in the mountains.
mt: Wakati wengi waliwaza kufanya skii katika milima.
ref: Mara kwa mara walipenda kuteleza kwa ski milimani.

src: He wanted to go out and play!
mt: Alitaka kufika nje na kucheza!
ref: Alitaka kutoka nje na kucheza!

src: He needed to find a job.
mt: Alitaka kujifungua kazi.
ref: Alihitaji kupata kazi.

src: During a beach trip his friends made a dare to him.
mt: Wakati wa safari yake ya kikanda wenzake wakamwambia kwamba wamekataa kwake.
ref: Wakati wa safari ya ufuoni marafiki wake walimthubutu.

src: He went to the grocery store and bought the ingredients.
mt: Alifika duka la bidhaa na kupata bidhaa zote.
ref: Alienda kwenye duka la mboga na kununua viungo.

src: Lena was sad because she wouldn't see her friends at school.
mt: Lena alikuwa na hasira kwa sababu hawakutakuwa na rafiki zake shule.
ref: Lena alikuwa na huzuni kwa sababu hatawaona marafiki wake shuleni.

src: His wife became concerned because they smelled unusually terrible.

ref: Mke wake akawa na wasiwasi kwa sababu harufu yake ilikuwa mbaya zaidi ya kawaida.

src: He went home to set it up.
mt: Alifika nyumbani kuchapisha.
ref: Alienda nyumbani kuifunga.

src: She was about to graduate and wanted to tryout for dance team.
mt: Alitaka kufikia kilele cha masomo na kujitafiti kwa timu ya dansi.
ref: Alikuwa karibu kuhitimu na alitaka kujaribu kujiunga na timu ya densi.

src: Down the hall Gina could see he bully who had tripped her.
mt: Kifupi chini Gina aliona kifaru anayewaacha kwa kuchimba.
ref: Ukumbini Gina angeweza kumwona muonevu aliyemtega.

src: She bought a travel mug to bring tea with her to school.
mt: Alikaa kwa kipande cha kufanya safari ili kufika chakula na chai naye kwenye shule.
ref: Alinunua kikombe cha kusafiri ili kubebea chai shuleni.

mt: Aliwapa watoto wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo wadogo
ref: Alinunua madoli mtandaoni na kwenye masoko ya bidhaa zilizotumika na maduka ya vitu vya zamani.

src: He designed his go kart by himself.
mt: Alimkamilisha go kart yake binafsi.
ref: Aliunda go kart yake yeye mwenyewe.

src: He wanted to get her a very special gift for Valentine's Day.
mt: Alitaka kupa kile kile kwa siku ya valentini.
ref: Alitaka kumpa zawadi maalum sana kwa Siku ya Wapendanao ya Valentine.

src: She was sad when it began to rainy on day one.
mt: Aliwaacha kujisikia wakati uwanja ulianza kuchemka siku ya kwanza.
ref: Alihuzunika wakati kulianza kunyesha siku ya kwanza.

src: Jeff knew he was in danger so he went to a nearby house.
mt: Jeff alijua kuwa alikuwa katika hatari, hivyo alipata nyumba ya karibu.
ref: Jeff alijua alikuwa hatarini kwa hivyo alienda kwa nyumba iliyo karibu.

src: Charles asked to write about the executive's artist.
mt: Charles alitaka kuandika kuhusu mwanasayansi.
ref: Charles akaomba kama anweza kuandika kuhusu msanii wao.

src: She tried twice, but both cakes fell flat.
mt: Alijaribu mara mbili, lakini kila kaka alipata kama kifaru.
ref: Alijaribu mara mbili, lakini keki zote ziliharibika.

src: Ron was nervous.
mt: Ron alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Ron alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: During a trip to the store, he got angry at a slow cashier.
mt: Kwenda kwa kipindi cha kufika kwenye duka, alijisahau na kashieri mwenye kasi chafu.
ref: Wakati wa safari ya kwenda dukani, alimkasirikia keshia alikuwa akifanya polepole.

src: I was singer and my friend played guitar.
mt: Nilikuwa mwanamuziki na rafiki yangu alikuwa anayimba gitaa.
ref: Mimi nilikuwa mwimbaji na rafiki yangu alicheza gita.

src: After all the time he asked they finally gave in and said yes.
mt: Baada ya muda mrefu alivyopenda wakati wote wakapata na kusema ndiyo.
ref: Baada ya muda wote alioomba mwishowe walikubali na kusema ndiyo.

src: She was practicing her volleyball skills when her dad came out.
mt: Alivyokuwa anafundisha kipaji chake cha mpira wa vikundi, baba yake alipofika nje.
ref: Alikuwa akifanya mazoezi ya ubingwa wake wa voliboli wakati baba yake alitoka nje.

src: He would spend many of his nights looking at the stars.
mt: Ali pata wakati wengi wa usiku akilazimika kufurahia nyota.
ref: Angetumia usiku mwingi akiangalia nyota.

src: He really needed to buy some eggs.
mt: Alitaka sana kupata mabati.
ref: Alitaka sana kununua mayai.

src: He nimbly scurried to where the stove burner glowed red.
mt: Alisafiria kwa kasi kwenye mahali panapokaa kwa mafuta ya moto.
ref: Akaenda kwa haraka hadi mahali stovu iliwaka nyekundu.

src: He drew a map so he wouldn't forget where he'd put it.
mt: Alifanya picha ili asisahau wapi alitupa.
ref: Alichora ramani ili asisahau ni wapi aliiweka.

src: She let me pick out all the food.
mt: Aliwafikiria nikiangalia vyakula vyote.
ref: Aliniruhusu nichague chakula chote.

src: Now that he had a steady job, he felt ready to have a dog too.
mt: Baada ya kuwa na kazi ya kawaida, alikuwa tayari kwa kuwa na mbwa pia.
ref: Kwa kuwa sasa ana kazi thabiti, alihisi ako tayari kuwa na mbwa pia.

src: He was sad.
mt: Alikuwa na hasira.
ref: Alihuzunika.

src: He looked online for a lesson.
mt: Alisoma kwa kompyuta kwa maswala.
ref: Aliangalia mtandaoni kwa somo.

src: He visits the local seafood market and picks a huge lobster.
mt: Anapokwenda katika mabazarini ya samaki, anapata samaki mkubwa sana.
ref: Alitembea duka lililo karibu la vyakula vya bahari na kuchukua kambamiti kubwa.

src: The first time I got into the car I lost track of the brake pedal.
mt: Kwanza nilipata gari nilikuwa na shida kwa kufikiri pedal ya kibembe.
ref: Mara ya kwanza niliingia ndani ya gari nilisahau pedali ya breki.

src: The street was covered in a foot of snow!
mt: Barabara ilikuwa imepandwa na futi moja ya barafu!
ref: Barabara ilikuwa imefunikwa kwa theluji nyingi!

src: He ate a lot of it.
mt: Alivyelekea nyingi.
ref: Alikula nyingi.

src: Brad was all out of eggs!
mt: Brad alikuwa kabisa bila mayai!
ref: Brad alikuwa ameishiwa na mayai!

src: However, he was worried he wouldn't be elected.
mt: Aliwaogopa kuwa hatakiwi kuchaguliwa.
ref: Hata hivyo, alikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba hatachaguliwa.

src: One day, Patrick was playing near the ducks.
mt: Juma moja, Patrick alikuwa akicheza karibu na ng'ombe.
ref: Siku moja, Patrick alikuwa akicheza karibu na bata hao.

src: I wore my new white dress.
mt: Nilivaa kanzu yangu mpya ya nyeupe.
ref: Nilivaa rinda langu mpya nyeupe.

src: I used to be heavyset but I lost weight.
mt: Nilikuwa mwenye uwezo wa kubeba lakini nilipata uwezo wa kupoteza uzito.
ref: Nilikuwa mnene sana lakini nilipoteza uzani.

src: She loved going to games.
mt: Alimwita kujifungua kwa michezo.
ref: Alipenda kwenda kwenye michezo.

src: She never gets tired of her work.
mt: Anasikitika kazi yake.
ref: Hachoki kamwe na kazi yake.

src: He had never made it to the top of a mountain.
mt: Ali hata siku moja akiwepo juu ya mlima.
ref: Hajawahi kufika kilele cha mlima.

src: He searched all over the house.
mt: Alisoma kote nyumba.
ref: Alitafuta nyumba nzima.

src: One Friday, they were finally able to get away to see a movie.
mt: Jumamosi, wakati wote waliweza kupata nafasi ya kuona filamu.
ref: Ijumaa moja, mwishowe waliweza kuondoka kwenda kutazama filamu.

src: The two drove to Grandma's house a few miles down the street.
mt: Wawili wakafika nyumbani kwa baba yao mmoja miaka miwili kutoka nyumba.
ref: Waliendesha gari hadi nyumbani kwa Bibi maili chache chini ya barabara.

src: Sue searched for her cat for hours until she heard purring outside.
mt: Sue alishafikiria kwa saa kadhaa kama kuuza kiti chake hadi alisikia kuzunguka nje.
ref: Sue alimtafuta paka wake kwa saa kadhaa hadi aliposikia akikoroma nje.

src: She put it into her tank.
mt: Aliipika katika tanki yake.
ref: Akaweka ndani ya tanki lake.

src: I used to go almost every single weekend.
mt: Nilikuwa ninaenda kila wiki kwa kawaida.
ref: Nilikuwa nikienda karibu kila wikendi.

src: It is shiny and red.
mt: Ina rangi nyeupe na nyekundu.
ref: Linang'aa na la rangi ya nyekundu.

src: She made a beautiful sculpture of an angel.
mt: Alijenga mchoro mzuri wa malaika.
ref: Alitengeneza sanamu nzuri ya malaika.

src: We walked to the park for playtime and exercise.
mt: Kwa kujitolea, tulipita kwenye mazingira ya micheko na usafirishaji.
ref: Tulitembea hadi kwenye bustani kwa wakati wa kucheza na mazoezi.

src: It looked lost and scared, so Matt took it home.
mt: Ilionekana kama ilikuwa hatarini na hivyo Matt alimwaga.
ref: Ilionekana amepotea na ana hofu, kwa hivyo Matt alimpeleka nyumbani.

src: He cycled from his house to a friend's house.
mt: Alifanya kazi kwa kipindi hicho kutoka nyumbani kwake hadi nyumba ya mshirika wake.
ref: Aliendesha baiskeli kutoka nyumbani kwake hadi kwa rafiki yake.

src: She set a timer and sat down to watch television.
mt: Alianza kuchagua muda na kushika kwa kuchora.
ref: Aliweka kipima saa na akaketi chini kutazama televisheni.

src: He arrived to class very tired.
mt: Alifika kwa kazi kwa uwezo mdogo.
ref: Alifika darasani akiwa amechoka sana.

src: She explained her issue to the representative.
mt: Alimwuliza shauri lake kwa mwanachama.
ref: Akaelezea suala lake kwa mwakilishi.

src: He typed up his closing paragraphs.
mt: Alitumia kompyuta yake kuchapisha misimu yake ya kwanza.
ref: Akaandika aya zake za mwisho.

src: While they were there they found a stray dog.
mt: Wakati wakipata huko wakafika wakapata mbwa mdomo.
ref: Walipokuwa huko walipata mbwa aliyepotea.

src: He was an expert pianist, and wanted the same for his son.
mt: Alitunza sana michezo ya piano, na alitaka kuwa pia kwa mwanae.
ref: Alikuwa mpiga piano mtaalam, na alitaka mtoto wake awe mtaalam pia.

src: Unfortunately, he slips on a wet leaf in the park.

ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, anateleza kwa jani lenye majimaji kwenye bustani.

src: He put the kids to bed early and started dinner.
mt: Alimwachia wale wadogo kwa majuma na kuanza kujikimu.
ref: Aliwalaza watoto mapema na akaanza kupika chakula cha jioni.

src: The store had fish, small animals, and a few puppies.
mt: Kuuzaji haukutumia samaki, wanyama wadogo, na wadogo wadogo wachanga.
ref: Duka hilo lilikuwa na samaki, wanyama wadogo, na watoto wachache wa mbwa.

src: She decided to fully immerse herself in it.
mt: Aliamua kufanya kazi yake kwa kujikimu kabisa.
ref: Akaamua kujishughulisha sana nayo.

src: It stopped between floors and the lights flickered.
mt: Ilisimama kati ya majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na majengo na maj
ref: Ilisimama kati ya ghorofa na taa ziliyumbayumba.

src: He had never babysat before and he was nervous.
mt: Ali hajawahi kubabu kabla na alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Hakuwa amewahi kuchunga watoto awali na alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: He finally got the chance to run.
mt: Alipata nafasi ya kufanya kazi.
ref: Mwishowe akapata nafasi ya kugombea.

src: One day, it bounced too far and went into the street.
mt: Juma moja, ilibinga kwa kasi na kufika katika barabara.
ref: Siku moja, iliruka sana na ikaingia barabarani.

src: We haven't had one in almost a year.
mt: Hatukuwa na moja kwa takribani mwaka mmoja.
ref: Hatujakuwa na moja kwa karibu mwaka.

src: He bought a plane ticket and packed his bags.
mt: Alipata tiketi ya ndege na kufunga kifua chake.
ref: Alinunua tikiti ya ndege na akafunganya mifuko yake.

src: John is now in his early 40's.
mt: John sasa ana umri wa miaka 40.
ref: John sasa yuko katika miaka yake ya mapema ya 40.

src: She found the thought disgusting.
mt: Alijua kujitupa kwa mawazo hayo.
ref: Aliona mawazo hayo yakiwa ya kuchukiza.

src: He was immediately breath-taken and full of wonder.
mt: Alipokwenda, alikuwa na hofu na kujifungua.
ref: Alisisimuliwa mara moja na akajawa na mshangao.

src: Barry told Julie, who was new, that she should dress up for Halloween.
mt: Barry alisema Julie, ambaye alikuwa mpya, kuwaangalie kufanya kama Halloween.
ref: Barry alimwambia Julie, ambaye alikuwa mpya, kwamba anapaswa kuvaa mavazi ya sherehe ya Halloween.

src: He decided to begin training for a marathon.
mt: Alisema kuanza kufundishwa kwa marathoni.
ref: Aliamua kuanza mazoezi ya nyika.

src: I was a little late, so I was in a hurry.
mt: Nilikuwa muda mrefu, kwa hiyo nilikuwa na shughuli.
ref: Nilichelewa kidogo, kwa hivyo nilikuwa na haraka.

src: The girls giggled together.
mt: Watoto wawili wakigugunia pamoja.
ref: Wasichana walichekacheka pamoja.

src: He noticed the lights in his home wouldn't turn on.
mt: Aliona majengo yake yakiwa yasiyokuwa na majua.
ref: Aligundua taa nyumbani kwake hayangeweza kuwasha.

src: He said I had been speeding.
mt: Alisema nilikuwa nimekuwa na kasi.
ref: Alisema nimekuwa nikiendesha kwa kasi.

src: He was always late going out the door.
mt: Aliwa siku zote akifika chini ya mwelekeo.
ref: Kila wakati alikuwa alichelewa kutoka nje ya mlango.

src: He was getting ready for a big fight.
mt: Alikuwa anavyotayarisha kwa mchezo mkubwa.
ref: Alikuwa anajiandaa kwa ajili ya mapigano makubwa.

src: He saves up his money for the big trip.
mt: Anatunza fedha yake kwa safari kubwa.
ref: Anaweka akiba ya pesa zake kwa ajili ya safari hiyo kubwa.

src: One day he saw one at a yard sale.
mt: Juma moja aliona mmoja katika duka la kuuza.
ref: Siku moja aliona moja kwenye uuzaji wa bidhaa.

src: They had everything they needed for a new tank except for some plants.
mt: Walikuwa na yote yalivyoahidiwa kwa nguvu ya tanki mpya isipokuwa vyakula vya mimea.
ref: Walikuwa na kila kitu wanachohitaji kwa ajili ya tanki mpya isipokuwa mimea mingine.

src: After she arrived, she realized she had forgotten the ice!
mt: Baada ya kufika, alikumbuka kuacha barafu!
ref: Baada ya kufika, aligundua kuwa alikuwa amesahau barafu!

src: She told her parents she would be responsible for it.
mt: Alisema kwa wazazi wake kwamba atakuwa na majukumu juu yake.
ref: Aliwaambia wazazi wake atawajibika.

src: Or at least, they tried to.
mt: Au kama wengine wanasema, wakafanya hivyo.
ref: Au angalau, walijaribu.

src: He knew that he would have to work hard to achieve that dream.
mt: Alijua kwamba atakapohitaji kufanya kazi kubwa ili kufikia ule ndoto.
ref: Alijua kwamba atalazimika kufanya kazi kwa bidii ili kufanikisha ndoto hiyo.

src: She gathered a bunch of pinecones under the trees.
mt: Alijenga kundi la mabega kando ya miti.
ref: Akakusanya kundi la sonobari chini ya miti.

src: We went to a restaurant that had a jungle theme.
mt: Tulipokwenda katika chakula cha kawaida ambacho kilikuwa na mazingira ya mbuga.
ref: Tulienda kwenye mkahawa ambao ulikuwa na mandhari ya kimsitu.

src: She notices that she has spaghetti and sauce in the house.
mt: Anamwona kwamba yupo na spaghetti na sauti ndani ya nyumba.
ref: Anagundua kuwa ana tambi na mchuzi ndani ya nyumba.

src: Leia's brother also fought with them.
mt: Jina pia alikabili na wao.
ref: Ndugu ya Leia pia alipigana nao.

src: So when she dropped the phone she knew it was trouble.
mt: Kwa hiyo wakati akapindua simu alijua kwamba kuna shida.
ref: Kwa hivyo alipoangusha simu alijua imepata tatizo.

src: She went to the doctor and she discovered she had anxiety.
mt: Alifika daktari na alidhani alikuwa na ukakamaji.
ref: Alienda kwa daktari na akagundua alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: In a hurry, she drove to school in housecoat and slippers.
mt: Kwa sababu alikuwa na shida, alikuwa anapanda shule kwa kitambaa na viatu vya kifua.
ref: Kwa haraka, aliendesha gari kwenda shuleni akiwa na kanzu ya nyumbani na sapatu.

src: She was practicing for her recital.
mt: Alivyokuwa anafundisha kwa ajili ya kushirikiana.
ref: Alikuwa akifanya mazoezi ya maonyesho yake.

src: He doesn't like his commute.
mt: Anahatarika safari yake ya kila siku.
ref: Hapendi safari yake.

src: Tonight was the big game.
mt: Leo ni mchezo mkubwa.
ref: Usiku wa leo ulikuwa usiku mkuu.

src: She complained that she had trouble sleeping.
mt: Alimwambia kwamba alikuwa na shida ya kulala.
ref: Alilalamika kwamba ilikuwa vigumu kwake kulala.

src: After work, he drove to the gym.
mt: Baada ya kazi, alikuwa anavyoenda kwenye kituo cha usafirishaji.
ref: Baada ya kazi, aliendesha gari kuelekea kwenye ukumbi wa mazoezi.

src: So she went outside and walked around her block.
mt: Kwa hivyo alienda nje na kufika katika barabara yake.
ref: Kwa hivyo alitoka nje na akatembea kuzunguka bloku yake.

src: She decided to deliver papers to earn money.
mt: Aliamua kufanya kazi ya kutoa vyombo vya habari ili kupata fedha.
ref: Aliamua kuwasilisha gazeti ili apate pesa.

src: They talked for 5 minutes.
mt: Walikusudia kwa dakika 5.
ref: Walizungumza kwa dakika 5.

src: His mother called him over to fix her computer.
mt: Mama yake alimwita kwa ajili ya kufanya kazi yake.
ref: Mama yake alimwita ili atengeneze kompyuta yake.

src: Just today I watched them scam a requester I had grown to love.
mt: Leo hii nilimwona wakikosoa mtumiaji nilimwona kila wakati.
ref: Leo tu niliwatazama wakitapeli mwombaji niliyempenda.

src: She took them to the park to eat a snack.
mt: Aliwafikia mabahari kwa kula chakula cha kati.
ref: Aliwapeleka kwenye bustani kula vitafunio.

src: Dana's husband Glenn thinks her mother is trying to poison him.
mt: Mke wa Dana Glenn anamwamini mama yake anataka kumwua.
ref: Mume wa Dana Glenn anafikiria mama yake anajaribu kumpa sumu.

src: She had about twelve different shows to do this fashion week.
mt: Aliweza kufanya kama asilimia kumi na mbili ya matamasha kwa wiki ya fasihi.
ref: Alikuwa na maonyesho karibu kumi na mbili tofauti ya kufanya wiki hii ya mitindo.

src: We would pack up all our stuff and load them into the truck.
mt: Tukijitahidi kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi zetu zote na kufanya kazi z
ref: Tungefunganya vitu vyetu vyote na kuvipakia kwenye lori.

src: Gill had seen every episode.
mt: Gill alivyoangalia kila kipindi.
ref: Gill alikuwa ameona kila tukio.

src: Last Saturday he came close.
mt: Jumamosi alikuwa karibu.
ref: Jumamosi iliyopita alikaribia.

src: The lovers were oblivious to his presence.
mt: Wawili wakarudi kwa wakati wao.
ref: Wapenzi hao hawakugundua uwepo wake.

src: The bite was red and itchy, but it didn't bother him at first.
mt: Kipigo kilikuwa kijivu na kipindua, lakini hakuwachukia kwanza.
ref: Muumo ulikuwa mwekundu na uliwasha, lakini haikumsumbua mwanzoni.

src: She always got the best grades out of her friends.
mt: Aliweza kufikia kile kile cha kibali kati ya wenzake.
ref: Daima alipata alama bora kuliko marafiki wake.

src: He enjoyed talking to her and spending time with her.
mt: Alizungumza naye na kuwakaribisha nae.
ref: Alifurahi kuzungumza naye na kutumia wakati pamoja naye.

src: One day a man comes in the store and takes it home.
mt: Jumanne mtu mmoja anapata kwenye duka na kuuza kwa nyumbani.
ref: Siku moja mtu anakuja dukani na kuipeleka nyumbani.

src: Her and her mother waited in line for what seemed like two hours.
mt: Alivyopata kwa muda ambao alikuwa anawaona kama dakika 120.
ref: Yeye na mama yake walisubiri katika foleni kwa kile kilichoonekana kama saa mbili.
